ingredients: 1 can cream of chicken soup, reduced sodium (10.75 ounce)
2-Step Chicken.notes: This recipe uses reduced sodium cream of chicken soup.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in a skillet at a medium-high setting.
directions.3: Add chicken and cook for ten minutes.
directions.4: Remove chicken from pan and set aside.
directions.5: Stir the soup and water together in the skillet and heat it to a boil.
directions.6: Return the chicken to the skillet. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for an additional 10 minutes, or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165 °F.

20-Minute Chicken Creole.notes:
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Bell Peppers
Onions
Garlic
Celery
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat pan over medium-high heat (350 °F in an electric skillet). Add vegetable oil and chicken and cook until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165 °F (3-5 minutes).
directions.3: Reduce heat to medium (300 °F in electric skillet).
directions.4: Add tomatoes with juice, chili sauce, green pepper, celery, onion, garlic, basil, parsley, cayenne pepper, and salt.
directions.5: Bring to a boil; reduce heat to low and simmer, covered for 10-15 minutes.
directions.6: Serve over hot, cooked rice or whole wheat pasta.
directions.7: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours.

ingredients: 1 can (15.5 ounces) beans, low-sodium undrained (pinto, kidney, red, or black)
1 can (15 ounces) corn, drained (or 10-oz package of frozen corn)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place the contents of all 3 cans into a pan.
directions.3: Add chili powder to taste.
directions.4: Stir to mix.
directions.5: Continue to stir over medium heat until heated thoroughly.
directions.6: Refrigerate leftovers.

ingredients: 1 green pepper (small, chopped, - may use red or yellow pepper)
1/3 cup fresh parsley (chopped, or 2 tablespoons dried)
8 ounces chickpeas or garbanzo beans (canned, drained, low-sodium)
5 A Day Bulgur Wheat.notes:
Bulgur comes from wheat. It is actually the kernel of wheat, cracked for cooking. It has a nutty, chewy flavor that is sure to please the healthy appetite, and contains fiber. Canola oil is a healthy choice for vegetable oil.

Learn more about:

Onions
Broccoli
Carrots
Bell Peppers
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and chop fresh onion, broccoli, carrots, pepper and parsley (if using fresh parsley).
directions.3: Heat canola oil in a large skillet. Add onions and cook until soft.
directions.4: Add bulgur and stir to coat. Add 2 cups chicken broth to the skillet, bring to a boil.
directions.5: Lower the heat, add remaining vegetables and chickpeas. Cook for 10 minutes or until the liquid is absorbed.
directions.6: Add parsley and stir. Serve warm or cold.

ingredients: 2 cups green pepper (chopped, or use red, yellow, or orange)
5 A Day Salad.notes:
The dressing is not included in the nutritional analysis.

Each serving = 5 cups of vegetables (Eight 5-A-Day servings).

Spinach
Lettuce
Carrots
Celery

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash all of the vegetables and mix them together in a large mixing bowl.
directions.3: Top this colorful meal with the nonfat or low-fat dressing of your choice.

A Simple Mexican Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Cucumbers
Oranges
Lemons
Limes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash the cucumbers, oranges and lemon or lime under cold running water.
directions.3: Slice the cucumbers. Peel and cut the oranges into small pieces.
directions.4: Place cucumber slices and orange pieces in a medium size bowl. Add chili powder, lemon or lime juice and salt.

ingredients: 1 can pineapple chunks (in juice, 20 ounces, drained)
Ambrosia.notes:
Learn more about:

Pineapple
Oranges
Bananas
Grapes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Drain pineapple and oranges. Use juice as beverage.
directions.3: Combine fruit with marshmallows and coconut.
directions.4: Fold in yogurt.
directions.5: Chill.
directions.6: Serve.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 325 °F. In a large mixing bowl, beat the egg whites until they are foamy.
directions.3: Add the cream of tartar and beat until stiff, but not dry. Gradually beat in the sugar
directions.4: Add the vanilla and salt and then gently fold in the flour.
directions.5: Pour the mix into an angel food tubular pan and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until the top is nicely browned.

ingredients: 1 ounce angel food cake mix (3 tablespoons)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Scoop 3 tablespoons of angel food cake mix into a microwave-safe cup or mug.
directions.3: Add 2 tablespoons of vanilla yogurt and stir.
directions.4: Place in the center of the microwave oven and microwave for 1 minute.
directions.5: Take out of microwave and let cool for 1 minute.
directions.6: Using a knife, cut around the sides of the cup to loosen the cake and "dump" it on a plate.
directions.7: Dole 1 tablespoon of whipped topping on top of the cake.
directions.8: Sprinkle raspberries around the angel cake and add sliced strawberries to top.
directions.9: Enjoy.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine all ingredients.
directions.3: Refrigerate until ready to serve.
directions.4: Use within 1-2 days. Chicken salad does not freeze well.

ingredients: 1/4 mini baguette or Italian bread, about 9" long (split lengthwise, or 2 split English muffins)
1/2 cup mozzarella or cheddar cheese (part-skim, shredded)
Anytime Pizza.notes:
Learn more about:

Bell Peppers
Mushrooms

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Toast the bread or English muffin until slightly brown.
directions.3: Top bread or muffin with pizza sauce, vegetables and low-fat cheese.
directions.4: Sprinkle with Italian seasonings as desired.
directions.5: Return bread to toaster oven (or regular oven preheated to 350 °F).
directions.6: Heat until cheese melts.

ingredients: 2 chicken breasts (skinless, cooked, diced, about 2 cups)
16 lettuce leaves (Bibb, Romaine, green or red leaf)
Apple & Chicken Salad.notes:
Weekly Menu Planning Tip: When you're planning a dinner with chicken cook up extra chicken breast and refrigerate for later use in this salad.
Serve with 8 ounce non-fat milk and 1 slice rustic whole grain bread.

Apples
Celery
Lettuce

directions.1: Cut apples in quarters; remove core and chop.
directions.2: In a medium size bowl, mix all ingredients, except lettuce.
directions.3: To serve, arrange lettuce on serving plates top with apple and chicken salad.

ingredients: 2 1/2 medium apples, sliced (14 oz. of sliced apples)
Apple Banana Salad with Peanuts.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with 8 ounce non-fat milk and one slice of rustic whole-grain bread.

Tips on how to select and store bananas:

Choose bananas that are slightly green on the stem and tip. They should be firm, without bruises.
Store unripe bananas at room temperature. Store ripe bananas in refrigerator for up to two weeks; peel may turn black.

Learn more about:

Lettuce
Bananas
Apples

directions.1: Whisk together dressing ingredients.
directions.2: Slice bananas.
directions.3: In a large salad bowl, toss mixed greens, banana and apple slices, peanuts, and dressing.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Beat butter with sugar until creamy.
directions.3: Add eggs one at a time, beating until well blended.
directions.4: Add flour, baking powder, and lemon rind, beat 4 minutes.
directions.5: Pour into greased 9-inch spring-form pan.
directions.6: Arrange the apples on the batter, sprinkle with 2 teaspoons sugar.
directions.7: Bake 1 hour at 350 °F.
directions.8: Remove from pan, brush apples with jam, cool.

ingredients: 4 carrots (large, peeled and cut into chunks)

Apples
Carrots
Oranges
Ginger

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large pot over high heat, combine all ingredients, bring to a boil.
directions.3: Reduce heat to medium and simmer until soup reduces to about 8 cups of liquid, about 3 to 4 hours.
directions.4: Skim fat from surface and serve.
directions.5: Store leftover soup covered in refrigerator for up to 3 days.

ingredients: 2 cups apples (sliced, to place on cake)
Apple Chunk Cake.notes:
Batter will be very thick. This is normal.
Learn more about:

Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.4: In a large bowl, mix sugar, oil and eggs together. Beat well.
directions.5: In a separate bowl, combine flour, salt, cinnamon, and baking soda. Add to egg batter and mix well.
directions.6: Add apple chunks and applesauce to the batter. Stir to combine.
directions.7: Coat an 8x8 inch baking pan with vegetable oil spray, and pour in batter.
directions.8: Bake until done, about 1 hour.
directions.9: Place apple slices on top of apple cake and serve.

Apple Cinnamon Bars.notes:
You can use applesauce (16 ounces) or canned apples in place of fresh apples. You can use either peeled or unpeeled apples.
Learn more about:

Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Put the flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, brown sugar, and oats in the mixing bowl. Stir together.
directions.4: Add the margarine to the bowl. Use the 2 table knives to mix the ingredients and cut them into crumbs.
directions.5: Lightly grease the bottom and sides of the baking dish with cooking spray.
directions.6: Spread half of the crumb mixture in the greased baking dish.
directions.7: Remove the core from the apples and slice them. Put the apple slices into the baking dish.
directions.8: Top the apples with the rest of the crumb mixture.
directions.9: Bake in the oven for 40-45 minutes.
directions.10: Cut into squares. It will fall apart easily.

ingredients: 5 cups apple (tart, cored, peeled, and chopped)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Lightly oil a 13x9x2 inch pan.
directions.4: In a large mixing bowl, combine apples with sugar, raisins, and pecans; mix well. Let stand 30 minutes.
directions.5: Stir in oil, vanilla, and egg. Sift together flour, soda, and cinnamon; stir into apple mixture about 1/3 at a time, just enough to moisten dry ingredients.
directions.6: Turn batter into pan. Bake 35-40 minutes. Cool cake slightly before serving.

Apple Coleslaw.notes:
Add salt and pepper to taste.

Cabbage
Carrots
Apples
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash your hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash the cabbage. Cut it into fine shreds, until you have 2 cups of cabbage.
directions.3: Peel the carrot. Grate it with a grater.
directions.4: Chop half a green pepper into small pieces.
directions.5: Remove the core, and chop the apple.
directions.6: Put the cabbage, carrot, green pepper, and apple in a large mixing bowl. Stir together.
directions.7: Put the yogurt, mayonnaise, lemon juice, and dill weed in a small bowl. Stir together to make a dressing.
directions.8: Pour the dressing over the salad. Toss to mix.

ingredients: 8 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breast (cut to 1/2" cubes)
1 3/4 cups canned yellow corn (15.2 ounce can, no-salt-added, drained)
2 red apples, such as Braeburn, Empire, or Fuji (chopped, skin on)
1 can can (15 oz) black beans (no-salt-added, drained and rinsed)
Apple Corn Chili.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with a whole-grain tortilla and an 8 ounce glass of fat-free (skim) milk.
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Corn
Apples

directions.1: In a stockpot, heat 1 tbsp. olive oil; add chicken and brown (about 5 minutes). Remove chicken from pan.
directions.2: Heat remaining olive oil in same pot; add onions and garlic and sauté until soft.
directions.3: Add corn and sauté until golden brown. Add apple, cumin, and cayenne pepper (if desired); cook about 3-4 minutes. Let cool about 5 minutes.
directions.4: Set aside about 1 cup of mixture. Purée remainder in food processor or blender, adding a portion of water, if needed, and return to pot.
directions.5: Add browned chicken, black beans, chiles, bouillon, and water. Bring to boil and simmer about 15 minutes. Chicken should be cooked to 165 ºF.
directions.6: To serve, ladle soup in bowls and top with non-puréed portion of apple corn mixture.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Toss lettuce, apples, walnuts, cranberries, and onions in a large bowl.
directions.3: Add dressing; toss to coat. Serve immediately.

Apple Crisp.notes:
For different tastes, try other fruits like cherries, pears, peaches, or plums.

Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Grease the bottom and sides of the square pan.
directions.4: Remove the cores from the apples. Slice the apples. Spread the sliced apples on the bottom of the pan.
directions.5: Cut the margarine into small pieces and put in a medium-sized bowl.
directions.6: Add the oatmeal, flour, brown sugar and cinnamon.
directions.7: Using two knives, cut the margarine into the mixture until it looks like small crumbs.
directions.8: Sprinkle the mixture over the top of the apples.
directions.9: Bake in the oven for about 20 minutes.

Apple Oatmeal Muffins.notes:
Optional toppings: raisins, walnuts.

Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Place 6 cupcake holders in baking tin.
directions.4: In a mixing bowl, add milk and applesauce. Stir until blended.
directions.5: Stir in flour, oats, sugar, baking powder, and cinnamon. Mix until moistened (do not over mix).
directions.6: Gently stir in the chopped apples.
directions.7: Spoon into cupcake holders.
directions.8: Bake for 15-20 minutes or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean.
directions.9: Cool in pan 5 minutes before serving. Store unused portions in an airtight container.

ingredients: 3 apples (such as Honeycrisp, cored and cut into 1” chunks and unpeeled)
Apple Pistachio Crisp.notes:
Serving Suggestion: Serve with an 8 oz. glass of fat-free (skim) milk, 3 oz. boneless, skinless chicken breast, and ½ cup green beans.

Apples
Lemons

directions.1: Place rack in center of oven and preheat to 350 ºF.
directions.2: Place sliced apples, raisins, and lemon juice in 8x8 inch pan or baking dish; toss.
directions.3: In a bowl, mix remaining ingredients except melted margarine.
directions.4: Add melted margarine and mix until texture is consistent. Sprinkle over apple-raisin mixture.
directions.5: Bake uncovered 45-50 minutes or until apples are tender.

ingredients: 2 tablespoons lite mayonnaise-type dressing (or light mayonnaise)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix orange juice with salad dressing or mayonnaise.
directions.3: Toss apples, celery, raisins and nuts with the dressing mixture.

Apple Salad with Sweet & Tangy Yogurt Dr.notes:
Nutrition analysis was done using 1/2 cup low-fat vanilla yogurt.

Apples
Celery
Carrots

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash apples, celery, and carrots before dicing/grating.
directions.3: Toss apples with lemon juice.
directions.4: Add celery, carrots and raisins.
directions.5: Fold yogurt into apple mixture.
directions.6: Cover. Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.
directions.7: Refrigerate leftovers.

Apple Sandwiches.notes:
Sprinkle the peanut butter with grated carrot, chopped nuts, seeds or granola instead of, or along with, the raisins.
Try other nut or seed butters, such as almond, hazelnut or sunflower seed.
Use other dried fruit pieces, such as cherries or cranberries.

Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cut apple in half from the stem down and lay each half cut-side down on a cutting board. Slice each half into 6 half-round slices and cut out the core.
directions.3: Spread 1/2 teaspoon peanut butter on one side of each apple slice.
directions.4: Put 4 to 6 raisins on top of the peanut butter on one apple slice. Top with another apple slice, peanut-butter side down. Squeeze gently.
directions.5: Continue with remaining apple slices.

Apple Slice Pancakes.notes:
To test the griddle to see if it is hot, sprinkle it with a few drops of water. When the drops sizzle and dance, you are ready to cook! The easiest way to pour the batter onto the hot griddle is to use a 1/4 cup measuring cup for each pancake. If the first pancake is too brown, lower the heat.
Learn more about:

Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Lightly coat a griddle or skillet with cooking spray and heat over medium heat.
directions.3: Peel, core and thinly slice apple into rings.
directions.4: In a large mixing bowl, combine ingredients for pancake batter. Stir until ingredients are evenly moist. (Small lumps are ok! Over-mixing makes pancakes tough.)
directions.5: For each pancake, place apple ring on griddle and pour about 1/4 cup batter over apple ring, starting in the center and covering the apple.
directions.6: Cook until bubbles appear. Turn and cook other side until lightly brown.

ingredients: 1 can tuna, packed in water (6.5 ounces, drained)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and peel the apple. Chop it into small pieces.
directions.3: Drain the water from the can of tuna.
directions.4: Put the tuna, apple, yogurt, mustard, and honey in a medium bowl. Stir well.
directions.5: Spread 1/2 cup of the tuna mix onto each 3 slices of bread.
directions.6: Top each sandwich with a washed lettuce leaf and a slice of bread.

ingredients: 1/2 cup pumpkin puree (canned or from scratch)
1/3 cup almond butter (or crunchy peanut butter)

directions.1: Mix together dip ingredients.
directions.2: Serve with apple slices.

ingredients: 1 medium red apple, such as Jonathan or Gala (halved, cored, and diced, about 1 1/2 cup total)
1 medium jalapeno pepper (seeded (if desired) and finely chopped OR 1/4 tsp dried pepper flakes)
1 1/2 tablespoons chopped fresh sage (or 1 1/2 tsp dried rubbed sage)
Apple-Sage Wild Rice Stuffing.notes:
Chef's Notes: Use any of your favorite nuts in place of pecans. Or, leave them out if someone is allergic.

Materials: You will need a large skillet, measuring cups, measuring spoons, mixing spoon, and a sharp knife.
Learn more about:

Apples
Cranberries
Celery
Onions

directions.1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pecans and cook 2-3 minutes or until beginning to brown, stirring frequently. Set aside on separate plate.
directions.2: Heat 1 teaspoon of the oil over medium heat. Cook the celery and onion 8 minutes or until beginning to lightly brown on edge, stirring occasionally.
directions.3: Add the apples and cook 4 minutes or until tender crisp.
directions.4: Stir in the pecans and the remaining ingredients and cook 3-4 minutes or until the rice mixture is heated, stirring occasionally.

Apple-Stuffed Squash.notes:
Learn more about:

Apples
Winter Squash

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cut squash into halves and remove seeds. Place in a glass dish, cover with plastic wrap and microwave on high for 5 minutes.
directions.3: Melt butter in a separate bowl in the microwave. Mix in apples, sugar, and cinnamon. Microwave for 1 1/2 minutes.
directions.4: Spoon apple filling into each squash half. Cover and microwave on high for 3-5 minutes until squash and apples are tender.
directions.5: Serve warm.

ingredients: 1/8 cup walnuts (chopped, may use pecans or almonds)
Apple, Fennel & Chicken Salad with Cousc.notes:
Weekly Menu Planning Tip : When you are planning a dinner with chicken, cook up extra chicken breast and refrigerate for later use with another recipe.
Serve with 8 ounce non-fat milk.
Learn more about:

Apples
Spinach

directions.1: Slice chicken breasts crosswise into 1/2 inch strips.
directions.2: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in large skillet over medium heat.
directions.3: Add chicken, cook 8-10 minutes until done, stirring occasionally, remove from heat.
directions.4: While chicken is sautéing, cook couscous according to package directions, let cool.
directions.5: Core and chop apples, place in large bowl; toss with 1 tablespoon lemon juice.
directions.6: Chop fennel bulb (discarding stem and fronds) and add to bowl.
directions.7: In a small bowl, whisk remaining oil and lemon juice with balsamic vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper.
directions.8: Add chicken, couscous, spinach, and nuts to bowl with apples and fennel.
directions.9: Drizzle with dressing, toss to coat, and serve.
directions.10: Can be made several hours ahead and refrigerated.

Applesauce.notes:
Serving suggestion: Add 1 tablespoon cinnamon and stir before serving.
Additional sugar can be added to increase sweetness. Brown sugar can be used instead of white.
Learn more about:

Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and then cut apples in quarters. Apples can be peeled, but fiber will be decreased.
directions.3: Combine apples and water in saucepan. Heat to boiling. Turn heat to low as soon as the water is boiling.
directions.4: Simmer over low heat for 15 to 20 minutes or until apples are tender. Stir occasionally to prevent sticking.
directions.5: Stir in sugar and heat until sugar is dissolved.

Applesauce Cookies.notes: To check cake for doneness, pierce top of cake with a toothpick. Cake is done when toothpick comes out clean.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Prepare pan or cookie sheet (see below).
directions.3: Cream together sugar, shortening, and egg.
directions.4: In a separate bowl, combine baking soda, flour, salt, and cinnamon. Mix well.
directions.5: Stir flour mixture into shortening mixture just until moist.
directions.6: Add applesauce, raisins, and nuts (if using).

directions.1: Wash hands well with soap and warm water.
directions.2: Pre-heat the oven to 350 °F. Grease two 8x4x2 inch loaf pans.
directions.3: Toast walnuts in an ungreased skillet pan. Stir while heating on medium-low heat for 5-7 minutes. They are done when they are brown and smell nutty. Set aside to cool.
directions.4: Mix applesauce, egg, sugar, oil and vanilla in a large bowl.
directions.5: Mix flour, baking soda, cinnamon, and nutmeg together in a smaller bowl.
directions.6: Pour flour mixture into applesauce mixture.
directions.7: Stir in raisins and cooled toasted nuts.
directions.8: Pour half of the batter into each greased pan. Bake for 45-55 minutes.
directions.9: Remove cakes from the oven. Cool for 10 minutes. Remove from pans to finish cooling. For best taste, let cakes cool a few hours before serving.

ingredients: 1/4 cup dry milk powder, non-fat instant

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water and clean food preparation area.
directions.2: In a medium mixing bowl, combine applesauce, dry milk powder, water, eggs, and oil.
directions.3: Add flour, sugar, cinnamon, and baking powder.
directions.4: Stir until mixture has only small lumps.
directions.5: Place large skillet on medium-high heat.
directions.6: Spray skillet with non-stick cooking spray.
directions.7: Pour 1/2 cup batter onto skillet.
directions.8: Turn pancake when bubbles form on top of batter.
directions.9: Cook the other side for about 1 minute or until golden brown.

Apricot & Lemon Chicken.notes:

Apricots
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Rub cumin over chicken and place in skillet.
directions.3: Cook on medium-high for 6 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Remove from pan and keep warm.
directions.4: Add apricot spread, lemon juice, and water to skillet. On medium heat, stir until smooth.
directions.5: Spoon sauce over chicken and serve warm.

ingredients: 1 large, ripe tomato (cored, seeded, and finely chopped, about 1/2 cup)
1/4 small red onion (finely chopped, about 1/4 cup)
Argentinean Grilled Steak with Salsa Cri.notes:

Tomatoes
Garlic
Onions
Herbs

directions.1: In a small bowl, mix together tomato, onions, parsley, olive oil, vinegar, garlic, oregano, low-sodium adobo seasoning and crushed red pepper.
directions.2: Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or up until 48 hours.

Argentinian Chimichurri Sauce.notes:

Garlic

Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place all the ingredients in a blender or food processor and pulse until well chopped, but not pureed.
directions.3: Spoon the sauce over grilled meats, poultry, seafood, or vegetables. This sauce can also be used as a marinade.

ingredients: 1 can (14.5 oz) low-sodium diced tomatoes (including liquid)
Arroz Con Pollo.notes:
Learn more about:

Bell Peppers
Garlic
Onions

directions.1: To trim, lay chicken thighs on the cutting board, skin side up. Push the chicken down so the excess fat is on the cutting board (the excess is the part that isn’t right on top of the chicken). Using kitchen scissors or a sharp knife, cut off excess fat and discard. Pat chicken dry with paper towels, and discard towels.
directions.2: Place the skillet over medium high heat and when it is hot, add the chicken thighs, skin side down and cook until browned, then flip, about 5 minutes on each side.
directions.3: Turn the heat off, carefully remove the chicken from the skillet and transfer to the plate. Pour off all but 1 tablespoon fat.
directions.4: Reheat the skillet over low heat and add the onion, pepper, garlic, cumin, and oregano and cook until the onion is softened, about 10 minutes.
directions.5: Add the uncooked rice and tomatoes and stir well.
directions.6: Add the water and bouillon cube and bring to a boil over high heat. Return chicken to pan, skin side down, turn the heat down to low and cover.
directions.7: Cook chicken for 20 minutes and then carefully flip so that the skin side is up.
directions.8: Cover and cook for an additional 20 minutes. Serve right away.

Arroz Con Pollo (Chicken and Rice).notes:
Learn more about:

Bell Peppers
Onions
Garlic
Tomatoes
Peas

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large skillet heat oil and brown chicken on both sides.
directions.3: Add green pepper, onion, and garlic and cook for about 5 minutes.
directions.4: Add tomato, chicken broth, bay leaf, salt pepper to taste.
directions.5: Cover and cook for 20 minutes.
directions.6: Add rice, stir well, cover and simmer for 20-30 minutes longer, or until all liquid has been absorbed and chicken is tender.
directions.7: Add peas, cook until hot.

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups shredded Savoy or Napa cabbage
Asian Mango Chicken Wraps.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with an 8 ounce glass of non-fat milk.

Mangos
Bell Peppers

Carrots
Cabbage

directions.1: Cut mangos, vegetables, and chicken. Place in a mixing bowl and toss until well mixed.
directions.2: In a small mixing bowl, whisk together cream cheese, peanut butter, and soy sauce.
directions.3: To assemble: lay out tortillas on a flat surface. On each tortilla, spread 1/4 of cream cheese mixture and top with mango, vegetable, and chicken mix. Roll up tightly, tucking in ends of tortilla. Secure with toothpicks.
directions.4: To serve, cut each wrap in half.
directions.5: If not serving immediately, refrigerate; keeps well overnight.

Asparagus with Gremolata Sauce.notes:
Learn more about:

Asparagus
Citrus Fruits
Lemons
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook asparagus in a large pot of boiling water until tender, about 4 minutes.
directions.3: Drain: rinse with cold water to cool quickly, and drain again.
directions.4: Pat dry; wrap in a paper towel and then plastic wrap and refrigerate.
directions.5: Melt margarine in a heavy large skillet over medium-high heat.
directions.6: Add lemon peel and garlic and stir for 30 seconds.
directions.7: Add asparagus and toss to coat.
directions.8: Sprinkle with lemon juice. Sauté until asparagus is heated through and coated with Gremolata sauce, about 3 minutes.
directions.9: Transfer to platter. Sprinkle with parsley and serve.

ingredients: 3 tablespoons mandarin orange juice (reserved from oranges)
2 cans 11 oz cans mandarin oranges (drained, reserve juice)
12 ounces cooked chicken breast (cut into chunks)
Asparagus, Mandarin Orange, Chicken, and.notes:
Weekly Meal Planning Tip: When you're planning a dinner with chicken, cook up extra chicken breast and refrigerate for later use in this salad.
Learn more about:

Asparagus
Oranges

directions.1: In a small bowl, whisk vinaigrette ingredients, set aside.
directions.2: Cook rice according to package directions.
directions.3: Place whole trimmed asparagus in a large skillet with 1 1/2 inches of water.
directions.4: Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 2-5 minutes.
directions.5: Rinse with cool water and cut into 1-inch pieces.
directions.6: In a medium size bowl, toss all ingredients.

ingredients: 6 russet potatoes (medium, 3-4 inch, peeled and sliced into 1/4 inch slices)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Prepare a large casserole baking pan by coating lightly with oil or cooking oil spray.
directions.3: Place a layer of potatoes in pan, using approximately 1/4 of potatoes.
directions.4: Sprinkle layer with 1/4 cup chopped raw onion, 1/4 of the cheese, 1/2 tablespoon margarine, 1 tablespoon flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and sprinkling of black pepper.
directions.5: Repeat layers, making a total of 4.
directions.6: Meanwhile heat milk over low heat.
directions.7: Pour warm milk over all ingredients in casserole dish.
directions.8: Bake at 350 °F for one hour.
directions.9: Refrigerate leftovers within two hours.

Aunt Barbara's Chocolate Squash Cake.notes:
Other Ideas:

Use a greased 9x13 inch pan. Bake for 45 minutes.
To lighten cake, try 6 egg whites in place of whole egg.
Replace 1/2 cup oil with 1/2 cup applesauce.

Learn more about:

Summer Squash

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Grease and flour a 10-inch tube or bundt pan.
directions.3: In a large bowl, combine cake mix and cinnamon.
directions.4: Add eggs, water, and oil. Blend until combined, then beat with an electric mixer for 2 minutes on medium speed.
directions.5: Fold in squash. Add nuts if you like.
directions.6: Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 50 minutes to 1 hour, until cake springs back when lightly touched.

ingredients: 2 teaspoons sage, dried (or 2 Tablespoons fresh, coarsely chopped)
Autumn Vegetable Succotash.notes:
Can use dry or fresh herbs. Add others as desired.
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Bell Peppers
Summer Squash and Zucchini
Lima Beans
Corn

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large deep skillet over medium-high heat, add oil.
directions.3: Add onion; cook until translucent (2 minutes). Add garlic, bell peppers, zucchini, squash, lima beans, and corn.
directions.4: Season as desired; cook, stirring, until vegetables are tender (10 minutes or longer).
directions.5: Stir in sage and serve.

Avocado and Corn Salsa.notes:
Learn more about:

Avocados
Corn
Tomatoes
Herbs
Limes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Toss avocado, corn, tomatoes, cilantro, lime juice, and salt in a medium bowl.
directions.3: Chill one hour and then serve.

ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped fresh basil (plus 2 tablespoons for garnish)
Avocado Breakfast Bruschetta.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with an 8 ounce glass of fat-free (skim) milk.
Learn more about:

Avocados
Tomatoes
Onions
Herbs

directions.1: Dice avocado, tomatoes, and green onions.
directions.2: Peel and chop hard-boiled eggs.
directions.3: Reserving 2 tbsp. basil for garnish, gently toss first five ingredients in a small bowl. Add pepper to taste.
directions.4: Toast baguette slices and smear with ricotta cheese.
directions.5: Top with avocado mix and garnish with chopped basil.

ingredients: 1/2 cup 100% apple juice or white grape juice
Avocado Melon Breakfast Smoothie.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with one slice toasted whole-wheat bread.
Learn more about:

Avocados
Honeydew Melon
Limes

directions.1: Cut avocado in half, remove pit.
directions.2: Scoop out flesh, place in blender.
directions.3: Add remaining ingredients; blend well.
directions.4: Serve cold. (Keeps well in refrigerator up to 24 hours. If made ahead, stir gently before pouring into glasses.)

ingredients: 8 ounces frozen pre-cooked grilled chicken strips (about 8 strips) (thawed, cut into bite-size pieces)
Avocado, Potato, and Grilled Chicken Sal.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with an 8 ounce glass of non-fat milk, 1 slice of whole-grain bread, and apple slices.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Avocados
Onions
Lemons
Bell Peppers

directions.1: In a medium sauce pan, boil potatoes about 20 minutes, until just tender; run under cold water to cool, and cut into chunks.
directions.2: Peel avocado and cut into chunks; coat with lemon juice.
directions.3: Whisk olive oil, vinegar, yogurt, and pepper in a small bowl.
directions.4: Place all ingredients in large bowl. Gently toss.

ingredients: 1 cup pecans (chopped, or try walnuts or peanuts)

directions.1: Heat oven to 350 ºF. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl, except raisins, mix well.
directions.2: Bake in 13x9 inch baking pan at 350 ºF for 25 to 30 minutes or until golden brown. Stir every 5 minutes.
directions.3: Stir in raisins. Cool thoroughly. Store in tightly covered container.

Baked Apples and Sweet Potatoes.notes:
Learn more about:

Sweet Potatoes
Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Boil 5 sweet potatoes in water until they are almost tender.
directions.3: After the sweet potatoes cool, peel and slice them.
directions.4: Peel the apples. Remove the cores, and slice the apples.
directions.5: Preheat the oven to 400 °F.
directions.6: Grease the casserole dish with butter or margarine.
directions.7: Put a layer of sweet potatoes on the bottom of the dish.
directions.8: Add a layer of apple slices.
directions.9: Add some sugar, salt, and tiny pieces of margarine to the apple layer.
directions.10: Repeat steps 6, 7, and 8 to make more layers of sweet potatoes, apples, and sugar/salt.
directions.11: On the top layer of apples, sprinkle the rest of the brown sugar and margarine pieces.
directions.12: Sprinkle the top layer with nutmeg.
directions.13: Mix the hot water and honey together. Pour the mix over the top layer.
directions.14: Bake for about 30 minutes until apples are tender.

ingredients: 1/2 cup raisins, or other dried chopped fruit
Baked Bananas.notes:
Try adding ½ teaspoon (or more) cinnamon or a dash of cayenne to the other toppings.
When bananas are peeled or cut, the flesh starts to brown. Browned bananas might not look attractive but they are safe to eat. Reduce browning by peeling or cutting just before using.

Learn more about:

Bananas

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Lightly grease a 9x13 inch pan.
directions.4: Arrange the split bananas in the pan.
directions.5: Top evenly with brown sugar, small pieces of margarine, raisins, and pecans.
directions.6: Bake for 30 minutes.

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups navy, kidney, or lima beans (dry, sorted, and rinsed)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine apple juice and water. Bring to a boil.
directions.3: Add beans and simmer for 2 1/2 hours until beans are tender.
directions.4: Drain beans, reserve the liquid.
directions.5: Put beans and other ingredients in greased baking dish.
directions.6: Cover and bake at 250 °F for 3 to 4 hours.
directions.7: Uncover the last hour of baking and add some reserved liquid if beans become dry.

ingredients: 2 cups grated or finely chopped cauliflower rice (about half a medium head)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Lightly grease a baking sheet.
directions.4: In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients and mix well.
directions.5: Press mixture together to make about 15 small balls or logs and put them on the baking sheet with space between each one.
directions.6: Bake for 20 minutes or until cooked through. For extra crispy tots, broil for an extra 2 minutes. Watch closely to avoid burning.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Put the chicken in a baking pan or casserole dish.
directions.4: Sprinkle with garlic powder and pepper to taste.
directions.5: Bake for 1 hour.

Baked Chicken Nuggets.notes:
To remove bone from chicken thigh:

Place chicken on cutting board. Remove skin from thighs.
Turn chicken thighs over.
Cut around bone and remove it.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Remove skin and bone; cut thighs into bite-sized pieces.
directions.3: Place cornflakes in plastic bag and crush by using a rolling pin.
directions.4: Add remaining ingredients to crushed cornflakes. Close bag tightly and shake until blended.
directions.5: Add a few chicken pieces at a time to crumb mixture. Shake to coat evenly.

ingredients: 1 chicken (raw, cut into pieces, skin removed)
Baked Chicken with Vegetables.notes:
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Carrots
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Place potatoes, carrots, and onions in a large roasting pan.
directions.4: Put chicken pieces on top of the vegetables.
directions.5: Mix water, thyme, and pepper. Pour over chicken and vegetables.
directions.6: Spoon juices over chicken once or twice during cooking.
directions.7: Bake at 400 °F for one hour or more until browned and tender.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Thaw frozen fish according to package directions, if using frozen fillets.
directions.3: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.4: Separate fish into four fillets or pieces.
directions.5: Place fish in ungreased 13x9 baking dish.
directions.6: Combine paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, pepper, oregano, and thyme in a small bowl.
directions.7: Sprinkle seasoning mixture and lemon juice evenly over fish.
directions.8: Drizzle margarine evenly over fish.
directions.9: Bake until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 20-25 minutes.

ingredients: 4 4-ounce white fish fillets (frozen, or cod or perch)
1 teaspoon lemon juice (or fresh lemon, sliced thin)
1 tablespoon parsley flakes (dried or fresh chopped)
Baked Fish and Vegetables.notes:
Learn more about:

Lemons
Onions
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 450 °F.
directions.3: Separate and place fish fillets in center of each tin foil square.
directions.4: Combine frozen vegetables and diced onion in bowl and mix. Spoon vegetables around fillets.
directions.5: Sprinkle with lemon juice (or top with lemon slice) and add parsley on top. Fold ends of tin foil together to form leak-proof seal.
directions.6: Bake for 10 minutes. Serve.
directions.7: Refrigerate leftovers.

ingredients: 1 pound fish fillets (fresh or frozen, unbreaded)
Baked Fish with Creole Sauce.notes:
Atlantic cod fillets used for nutrition analysis.
If fish is more than one layer thick in baking dish, cooking time will be longer.

Learn more about:

Onions
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Thaw fish in refrigerator overnight.
directions.3: Preheat oven to 375 °F.
directions.4: Arrange fish in a single layer in baking dish.
directions.5: Top fish with onion and pepper slices.
directions.6: In a separate bowl, mix tomato sauce, chili powder, salt, and pepper.
directions.7: Pour tomato sauce mixture over fish and vegetables.
directions.8: Cover dish and bake until fish flakes easily with a fork (20-30 minutes).
directions.9: Refrigerate leftovers.

ingredients: 3 1/2 pounds whole chicken (skinned and cut into 10 pieces)
1 1/2 cloves of garlic (thinly sliced, or 1 tsp garlic powder)
4 teaspoons thyme sprigs (4 fresh sprigs, or 1 tsp dried thyme)
Baked Lemon Chicken.notes:
Learn more about:

Garlic
Herbs
Onions
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine salt, pepper, garlic, and thyme.
directions.3: Lay chicken pieces into a 11x13 inch baking pan. Sprinkle seasonings over chicken.
directions.4: Combine onions, stock, and lemon juice in a sauce pan. Heat to a boil.
directions.5: Pour hot lemon mixture around chicken. Top each chicken piece with a lemon slice.
directions.6: Bake for 30 minutes at 400 °F until golden brown and juices are clear colored.

Baked Lentils Casserole.notes:
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Carrots
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine lentils, water, seasonings, onion, and tomatoes.
directions.3: Place in 2 quart casserole dish.
directions.4: Cover tightly with lid or foil.
directions.5: Bake at 350 °F for 30 minutes.
directions.6: Remove from oven and add carrots. Stir.
directions.7: Cover and bake 30 minutes longer.
directions.8: Remove cover and sprinkle cheese on top.
directions.9: Bake, uncovered 5 minutes, until cheese melts.

ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, 90% lean (or ground turkey)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix all ingredients, shape into balls (about 24 meatballs).
directions.3: Arrange on baking sheets that have been sprayed with non-stick cooking spray.
directions.4: Bake at 425 °F for 12-15 minutes. It is best to use a food safety thermometer to check for doneness. It should read 160 °F for ground beef and 165 °F for ground turkey.
directions.5: If meatballs are being saved for future use, chill rapidly; package in amounts needed per meal and freeze immediately.

ingredients: 1 teaspoon thyme sprigs (leaves removed and crushed)
Baked Parmesan Fish.notes:
Talapia fillets used in cost & nutrition analysis.
Suggest serving over pasta or rice.

Learn more about:

Herbs
Mushrooms
Garlic
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Place cheese, flour, and thyme in paper bag.
directions.3: Individually coat fish by gently shaking in bag; discard coating ingredients.
directions.4: Place fillets in baking pan on rack. Bake for 20 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with fork.
directions.5: Heat skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, mushrooms, green onions, and garlic. Cook, stirring frequently, until onions are tender. Season with ground black pepper.
directions.6: Serve baked fish topped with mushroom mixture.

Baked Pork Chops.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Trim fat from pork chops. Place chops in a 13x9 inch baking pan.
directions.3: Spread onion and peppers on top of chops. Sprinkle with pepper and salt. Refrigerate for 1 hour.
directions.4: Preheat oven to 375 °F.
directions.5: Cover pan and cook 30 minutes.
directions.6: Uncover, turn chops and re-cover with onions and peppers, and continue cooking for an additional 15 minutes or until internal temperature reaches 145 °F.
directions.7: Garnish with fresh parsley.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Pierce each potato several times with a fork. Microwave on high until tender, about 3-4 minutes per potato.
directions.3: Steam mixed vegetables until hot.
directions.4: Mix the sour cream with the herbs and pepper.
directions.5: Split the potatoes in the center and fill with steamed veggies. Top with sour cream and serve hot.

ingredients: 2 cups pumpkin (about 1 small pumpkin, peeled and cut into cubes)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 325 °F.
directions.3: Place pumpkin cubes in a baking dish and sprinkle with sugar and salt.
directions.4: Cover pan with foil and bake until soft.
directions.5: Sprinkle with cinnamon.

ingredients: 1 clove garlic (minced, or 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder)
1 package tofu (firm or extra firm, water packed, 14 ounces, drained)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Line a rimmed baking sheet with foil.
directions.3: Drain water from tofu. Wrap tofu in paper towels. Let set for about 5 minutes.
directions.4: While tofu is draining, combine soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and vegetable oil in a small bowl.
directions.5: Slice tofu into 1/2 inch thick slices. Place tofu slices on foil lined baking sheet.
directions.6: Pour soy sauce mixture over tofu. Using a spatula or pancake turner, gently turn slices over to coat both sides with sauce.
directions.7: Bake tofu for 15 minutes. Turn slices over and bake for another 15 minutes. Tofu should be light golden brown and firm.
directions.8: Serve hot in place of meat or cut into slices or cubes and add to a stir-fry, fried rice, soup, or salad.

ingredients: 3 whole wheat flour tortillas, 10" across (or corn)
Baked Tortilla Chips.notes: Corn tortillas may also be used for less calories and fat.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven or toaster oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Lightly grease a baking sheet with the cooking spray.
directions.4: Cut tortillas into 8 sections (as if you were cutting a pizza) and place on baking sheet.
directions.5: Spray tops of tortilla sections with cooking spray and lightly salt, if desired.
directions.6: Bake for 10 minutes, until crisp and light brown, watching closely so the chips don't burn.

ingredients: 2 pounds trout fillets (or other fish, cut into six pieces)
Baked Trout.notes:
Learn more about:

Limes
Tomatoes
Onions
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Rinse fish and pat dry. Place in baking dish.
directions.4: In a separate dish, mix remaining ingredients together and pour over fish.
directions.5: Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until fork-tender.

Banaha Bread.notes: Tip: Spice up your bread with peppers, onions, and peas. It can be refrigerated and reheated in a pan or microwave oven.

directions.1: In a large pot, bring 6 cups of water to a boil over medium to high heat.
directions.2: Boil corn shucks for about 10 minutes. Remove carefully.
directions.3: Strip a few shucks into strings. Tie two strings together to make longer strings.
directions.4: In a medium-sized bowl, mix the dry ingredients.
directions.5: Keep mixing and slowly add a little water until the mixture is firm enough to handle easily.
directions.6: Form cornmeal mixture into 8 oval shaped balls about 3 inches long.
directions.7: Wrap the balls in corn shucks and tie the ends closed with the corn shuck strings.
directions.8: Gently put wrapped balls into the large pot of boiling water. The pot should be about 2/3 full of water. Cover the pot with a lid and cook for 30-45 minutes over medium to high heat.
directions.9: Remove corn shuck covering and serve hot.

ingredients: 1/4 cup blueberries or strawberries (fresh or frozen)
Banana Berry Muffins.notes:
Learn more about:

Bananas
Blueberries
Strawberries

directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Spray a 12-cup muffin pan with non-stick cooking spray.
directions.2: In a medium-size bowl, combine applesauce, sugar, dried egg mix, banana, and water. Mix well.
directions.3: In a large bowl mix flours, oats, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
directions.4: Add the applesauce mixture to the bowl with the dry ingredients; mix just until the batter is moist.
directions.5: Gently add berries into the mixture.
directions.6: Fill each muffin cup about 3/4 full of batter.
directions.7: Bake for 25-30 minutes until lightly brown.
directions.8: Cool for 10 minutes and remove from pan.

Banana Bread.notes:
The key to good banana bread is to use well-ripened bananas that are covered with brown speckles. Try using half whole wheat flour to add some fiber.
Learn more about:

Bananas

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Peel the bananas. Put them in a mixing bowl. Mash the bananas with a fork.
directions.4: Add the egg, oil, milk, sugar, salt, baking soda, and baking powder. Mix well with the fork.
directions.5: Slowly stir the flour into the banana mixture. Stir for 20 seconds until the flour is moistened.
directions.6: Lightly grease the bread pan with a little oil or cooking spray. Or, line the pan with wax paper.
directions.7: Pour the batter into the bread pan.
directions.8: Bake for 45 minutes until a toothpick inserted near the middle comes out clean.
directions.9: Let the bread cool for 5 minutes before removing it from the pan.

Banana Cocoa Yogurt Pops.notes:
Create your own yogurt pops and experiment with different flavors or try out one of these recipes:

Strawberry Yogurt Pops
Tropical Yogurt Pops
Strawberry Kiwi Yogurt Pops

Learn more about:

Bananas

directions.1: Mash banana with a fork.
directions.2: Mix banana and yogurt well.
directions.3: Stir in cocoa powder.
directions.4: Divide into 4 small paper cups (or 8 mini muffin cups) and place in popsicle sticks (or cut paper straws).
directions.5: Freeze.
directions.6: Enjoy as a frozen treat!

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: In a large mixing bowl, cream shortening and sugar using an electric mixer. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well.
directions.4: In a medium mixing bowl, combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
directions.5: Add dry ingredients (flour mixture) and bananas to creamed mixture (the egg mixture). Mix well until combined.
directions.6: Place paper baking cups in muffin tin or lightly coat muffin tin with cooking spray. Fill muffin cups 2/3 full of batter.
directions.7: Bake 20-22 minutes, until golden brown. Remove cupcakes from muffin tin and place on a rack to cool.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water. Make sure utensils and counter top are clean.
directions.2: Mash bananas, mix with yogurt and water.
directions.3: Add quick (not instant) oats. Mix well.
directions.4: Add optional add-ins if you wish. Keep them minimal.
directions.5: Add spices, to taste (optional).
directions.6: The batter should be thick and easily spoonable.
directions.7: Grease a baking sheet. Place a tablespoon of dough on the sheet, thin out to a flat disk. Repeat with remaining dough. Refrigerate if any is remaining in bowl.
directions.8: Bake at 350-375 °F for 20 minutes. Flip and bake on other side 15 minutes to make crisper crust.

ingredients: maple syrup (optional, to serve with pancakes)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a small saucepan of boiling water, cook the lentils for 15-20 minutes, until soft. Drain well and set aside.
directions.3: In a large bowl, stir together the oats, flour, brown sugar, cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. In a smaller bowl, whisk together the yogurt, milk, oil, eggs, and vanilla. Add to the dry ingredients along with the banana and lentils, and stir until just combined.
directions.4: Set a heavy skillet over medium-high heat, add a drizzle of oil and wipe it around with a paper towel to coat the bottom of the pan.
directions.5: Cook about 1/2 a cup of batter at a time, spreading it out with the back of a spoon if needed (it will be thick). Cook for a couple of minutes, until bubbles begin to break through the surface and the bottom is golden. Keep the heat to medium, as these will take longer to cook through that most pancakes, and you do not want to burn the bottoms.
directions.6: Flip with a thin spatula and cook until they are golden on the other side, and springy to the touch. Keep the pancakes warm on a rack set on a baking sheet in a 250 °F oven while you finish cooking the rest.
directions.7: Serve drizzled with maple syrup (optional).

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Put the margarine in a small saucepan. Melt it on low heat.
directions.4: Put all the ingredients in a mixing bowl. Mix really well.
directions.5: Let the mix stand for about 5 minutes, until the oats are wet.
directions.6: Lightly grease the cookie sheet.
directions.7: For each cookie, spoon out about 1 tablespoon of dough and drop it onto the greased cookie sheet.
directions.8: Bake the cookies for 15 to 20 minutes.
directions.9: Let the cookies cool on the cookie sheet for about 1 minute.
directions.10: Move the cookies to wire racks or a towel. Let them cool completely.

Banana Pancakes with Apple Topping.notes:
Infants 12 months and under should NOT be given honey.
Learn more about:

Bananas
Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Beat eggs. Beat in milk, honey, and oil.
directions.3: Add flours and baking powder.
directions.4: Slice bananas and add to mixture.
directions.5: Coat a large, non-stick frying pan or griddle with non-stick cooking spray. Warm the pan over medium heat for 2 minutes.
directions.6: Spoon 1/4 cup of the batter onto the heated griddle for each pancake (adjust more or less depending on pancake size).
directions.7: Cook until the tops are bubbly and the pancakes are dry around the edges. Flip and cook for 2-3 minutes or until golden on both sides. Place pancakes on a platter and keep warm.
directions.8: Repeat steps 5 and 6 until batter has been used, using more nonstick cooking spray as needed.

Banana Split Oatmeal.notes:
The banana split oatmeal can be a snack by itself.
Learn more about:

Bananas

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a microwave safe cereal bowl, mix together the oatmeal and salt. Stir in water.
directions.3: Microwave on high power for 1 minute. Stir. Microwave on high power for another minute. Stir again.
directions.4: Microwave an additional 30-60 seconds on high power until the cereal reaches the desired thickness. Stir again.
directions.5: Top with banana slices and frozen yogurt.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix all ingredients together in large mixing bowl.
directions.3: Place in individual serving dishes and chill until ready to serve, up to 1 hour.
directions.4: This dessert looks great when topped with a sprinkle of ground cinnamon.

Banana Walnut Oatmeal.notes:
You can substitute 2 cups water or 2 cups skim milk for the reconstituted non-fat dry milk.
Learn more about:

Bananas

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a small saucepan, combine reconstituted non-fat dry milk, salt, and additional water. Heat over medium heat until steaming hot, but not boiling.
directions.3: Add oats and cook, stirring until creamy, 1 to 2 minutes.
directions.4: Remove the pan from heat and stir in mashed banana and maple syrup. Divide between 4 bowls, garnish with walnuts, and serve.

ingredients: 1 cup diced green, red, yellow, or orange bell pepper
Barley Jambalaya.notes:
To save time, cook barley up to 2 days in advance. Refrigerate until ready to use. Add to pot in step 7 above. Or, use another whole grain you have made in advance, like brown rice.
When doubling this recipe, do not double cayenne pepper unless you prefer a very spicy dish.
For a vegetarian option, use cooked or canned pinto or black beans, rinsed and drained, in place of meat.

Materials: You will need a can opener, colander, cutting board, large pot with lid, measuring spoons, medium pot with lid, mixing spoon, and a sharp knife.

directions.1: In a colander, rinse barley under cold water.
directions.2: In a medium pot over high heat, bring barley, water, and bay leaves to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cover. Cook barley until tender and water is absorbed, about 20-30 minutes.
directions.3: In a colander, drain barley. Set aside.

ingredients: green or red bell pepper, chopped (1/2 cup, optional)
1 cup mushrooms (fresh sliced, or 1- 4 ounce can mushrooms, drained)
1 teaspoon low-sodium bouillon (vegetable, beef or chicken)
Barley Pilaf.notes:
This can be used as a side dish, or stuffing for pork chops or chicken.
To serve as a main dish, add 2 cups of any chopped cooked meat during the last fifteen minutes of cooking.
If using quick-cooking barley the recipe can be prepared in 15 minutes or less. Reduce water to 2 cups and cook for 10 to 15 minutes.


Learn more about:

Onions
Celery
Bell Peppers
Mushrooms

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place a medium pan over medium heat; add vegetable oil, onion and celery. Cook, stirring often until onion is soft.
directions.3: Add bell pepper (if using), mushrooms and pearl barley. Stir well.
directions.4: Add water and bouillon and stir to dissolve bouillon. Bring to a boil, lower heat and cover pan.
directions.5: Cook for 50 to 60 minutes or until barley is tender and liquid is absorbed.

ingredients: 1 cup skim milk (or reconstituted non-fat dry milk)
Basic Custard.notes: An additional egg can be added during step 1.

directions.1: Beat egg and sugar together in a saucepan.
directions.2: Add milk.
directions.3: Place saucepan with egg/milk mixture in another pan containing 1-2 inches boiling water.
directions.4: Stir custard constantly while cooking. Cook until foam disappears and custard coats the spoon. Remove from heat.
directions.5: Add flavoring and stir. Pour into individual dishes and cool in the refrigerator. Custard will be soft.

ingredients: fat-free milk (1/2 cup optional, only if adding carrots, raisins or walnuts)
Basic Muffins.notes:
Tip: Muffins turn out better when mixed by hand.
Learn more about:

Carrots

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Line muffin tin with paper baking cups or grease bottom of tin with cooking spray.
directions.4: Cream margarine and sugar with an electric mixer, or by hand.
directions.5: Add egg, milk, and applesauce, mixing well.
directions.6: Blend in cinnamon, baking soda, salt, and flour.
directions.7: Add carrots, raisins, and/or walnuts if desired. If any of these items are added, also add milk and mix.
directions.8: Fill muffin tins 2/3 full and bake for 15 to 18 minutes.

ingredients: 1 cup vegetables (chopped, broccoli, zucchini, or mushrooms)
Basic Quiche.notes:
Learn more about:

Broccoli
Zucchini
Mushrooms

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 375 °F.
directions.3: Shred the cheese with a grater. Put it in a small bowl for now.
directions.4: Chop the vegetables until you have 1 cup of chopped vegetables.
directions.5: Cook the vegetables until they are cooked, but still crisp.
directions.6: Put the cooked vegetables and shredded cheese into a pie shell.
directions.7: Mix the eggs, milk, salt, pepper, and garlic powder in a bowl.
directions.8: Pour the egg mix over the cheese and vegetables
directions.9: Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
directions.10: Let the quiche cool for 5 minutes before serving.

Basic Soup and Sauce Mix.notes: The final product of this recipe is intended to be used as an ingredient in other recipes. It is not intended as a ready-to-eat product.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine all ingredients in a plastic bag.
directions.3: Mix well.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and cut 5 large collard leaves, removing the thick stems.
directions.3: Place greens in a pot with about 1 inch of water, cover with a lid, and bring to a boil.
directions.4: After water boils, reduce to low heat and steam for about 3-5 minutes.
directions.5: Add salt and pepper, to taste.

Batido (Smoothie).notes:
One cup of low-fat milk, soy, rice, almond or coconut milk can be used instead of yogurt. 
Strawberries, blueberries, or raspberries can be used in addition to or instead of papaya.
See how to make this recipe and more on USDA's MyPlate Kitchen YouTube site.

Learn more about:

Bananas

directions.1: Put all the ingredients in the blender.
directions.2: Put the lid on tightly. Turn the blender to a medium setting and blend until the ice is chopped and the mixture is smooth, about 1 minute.
directions.3: Serve right away or cover and refrigerate up to 4 hours.

ingredients: 3/4 cup cheddar cheese (shredded, smoked or regular)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oven to 450 °F.
directions.3: Slice English muffins in half and place on ungreased, large cookie sheet.
directions.4: Cut up bell pepper.
directions.5: Spread barbecue sauce on English muffins to within ¼ inch of edges. Top with chicken, cheese and bell pepper.
directions.6: Bake 7 to 12 minutes or until cheese is melted.

ingredients: 2 cups kidney beans (one 15 ounce can, drained, low-sodium)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 300 °F.
directions.3: Peel the onion, and chop it into small pieces.
directions.4: Drain the liquid from the cooked (or canned) kidney beans.
directions.5: Mix the rice, chopped onion, and beans in a bowl.
directions.6: Put each tortilla on a flat surface.
directions.7: Put 1/2 cup of the rice and bean mix in the middle of each tortilla.
directions.8: Fold the sides of the tortilla to hold the rice and beans.
directions.9: Put each filled tortilla (burrito) in the baking pan.
directions.10: Bake for 15 minutes.
directions.11: While the burritos are baking, grate 1/2 cup cheese.
directions.12: Pour the salsa over the baked burritos. Add cheese.

Bean Dip.notes:
If you don’t have a blender, you can mix the first 4 ingredients in a medium bowl and mash with a fork. Then stir in the onion and cheese.
You can store this dip in the fridge for up to 4 or 5 days.

Learn more about:

Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Drain the kidney beans, but save the liquid in a small bowl
directions.3: Place the beans, vinegar, chili powder, and cumin in a blender. Blend until smooth. Add enough saved bean liquid to make the dip easy to spread.
directions.4: Stir in the chopped onion and grated cheese.
directions.5: Store in a tightly covered container and place in the fridge
directions.6: Serve with raw vegetable sticks or crackers.

ingredients: 4 cups pinto beans (2 cans, 15-ounce low-sodium cans or cooked)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place beans in a large bowl and mash coarsely with a fork or potato masher; stir in chili powder.
directions.3: Wrap tortillas in a damp paper towel. Microwave on high for 45 seconds, or until tortillas are soft and warm.
directions.4: Divide bean mixture among tortillas and spread down center of tortilla. Sprinkle cheese on bean mixture.
directions.5: Roll tortillas to enclose mixture.
directions.6: Spray a 9x13 inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray
directions.7: Place enchiladas, seam side down, into baking dish.
directions.8: Cover with foil and bake at 350 °F for 20 minutes or until heated through.
directions.9: Serve warm with salsa.

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups water (can take up to 2 cups water)
2 cups egg noodles, uncooked (or any shaped pasta)
2 servings of Eating Smart Seasoning Mix (1/2 cup)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Brown 3/4 pound ground beef in a large skillet, drain the fat.
directions.3: Add water, egg noodles or pasta, and seasoning mix. Stir.
directions.4: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer covered for 15-20 minutes or until noodles are tender.
directions.5: Taste; then add a small amount of salt, if needed.
directions.6: Refrigerate leftovers.

ingredients: 7 medium potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced
3 Servings Eating Smart Seasoning Mix (3/4 cup)
Beef & Potatoes.notes:
Be creative! Add chopped, cooked vegetables or frozen vegetables such as onion, carrots, peas, green beans, or corn after simmering. 
Learn more about:

Potatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and peel the potatoes.
directions.3: Collect, slice, and measure all ingredients before starting to prepare the recipe.
directions.4: Brown ground beef in a large skillet. Drain the fat.
directions.5: Add water, potatoes, and seasoning mix. Stir to combine with the beef.
directions.6: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20-30 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
directions.7: Uncover and cook until excess water is evaporated.
directions.8: Taste; then add a small amount of salt, if needed.
directions.9: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours. Eat within 3 to 5 days.

ingredients: 1 can low sodium beef broth (14.5-ounce can)
1 can no salt added cut green beans (14.5-ounce can)
1 can no salt added stewed tomatoes (14.5-ounce can)
Beef & Vegetable Soup.notes:

Onions

Carrots

Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: In 4-quart saucepan over medium-high heat in hot oil, cook ground beef until well browned on all sides, stirring frequently.
directions.2: With slotted spoon, remove beef to bowl. In drippings remaining in saucepan over medium heat, cook onion and garlic until tender-crisp.
directions.3: Add beef broth, carrots, green beans, stewed tomatoes, basil and ground beef; over high heat, heat to boiling.
directions.4: Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 10 to 15 minutes to blend flavors, stirring occasionally.
directions.5: Stir in cooked egg noodles.

ingredients: 1 3/4 cups green salsa (or enchilada sauce, 1-16 ounce jar)
1 can pinto or kidney beans, low-sodium (rinsed and drained, 15 ounces)
Beef and Bean Chile Verde.notes:
Learn more about:

Bell Peppers
Onions
Tomatoes
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place meat, bell pepper, tomatoes, and onion in large sauce pan. Heat on medium 8-10 minutes, stirring frequently until the meat is browned; drain fat.
directions.3: Add garlic, chili powder and cumin; cook until fragrant (15 seconds).
directions.4: Stir in salsa and bring to a boil.
directions.5: Reduce heat and simmer; cover and cook 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
directions.6: Add beans and cook until heated.

ingredients: 1 green cabbage head (washed and cut into bite-sized pieces)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Chop cabbage and onions, set aside.
directions.3: In a large skillet, cook the ground beef on medium heat until browned. Drain the fat. Set beef aside.
directions.4: Spray skillet with non-stick cooking spray. Cook onions on medium heat until soft.
directions.5: Add cabbage to the onions and cook until cabbage starts to brown.
directions.6: Stir the beef into the cabbage and onion mixture.
directions.7: Season with garlic powder, salt (optional), and pepper. Add red pepper flakes (optional) to the cabbage if you like it spicy.

ingredients: 1 1/2 cans low-sodium whole kernel corn (about 23 ounces)
Beef and Vegetable Soup.notes:
Tip for cooking ground beef: The recommended safe minimum internal temperature for ground beef is 160 °F, as measured with a food thermometer.

Corn
Carrots
Tomatoes
Potatoes
Onions

directions.1: In a large pan, brown ground beef over medium heat for 8-10 minutes. Drain off fat.
directions.2: Add corn, carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, and onions to pot.
directions.3: Cook for 25 minutes over medium heat. Stir every 10 minutes.
directions.4: Add macaroni, garlic powder, and onion powder to pot.
directions.5: Cook for 20 minutes over medium heat. Stir every 10 minutes.

ingredients: 1 pound ground beef (or 1 can, about 24 ounces, canned beef)
2 cups steamed green beans (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium green beans)
1 1/2 cups fresh cooked corn kernels (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium corn)

directions.1: In a large pot, add water to rice and bring to a boil. Cover and cook on low heat for 15 minutes (do not remove the lid) until water is gone.
directions.2: While the rice is cooking, put ground beef in a large pan and cook over medium heat on the stove for 8 to 10 minutes. Drain fat.
directions.3: Let rice stand for about 3 minutes. Arrange rice on a platter like a doughnut ring. Set aside.
directions.4: Add green beans, corn, tomato sauce, garlic powder, and onion powder to pan with meat.
directions.5: Cook until steaming hot. Pour into center of rice ring and serve.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a small bowl, put the bouillon cube in 2 cups hot water. Stir it until the bouillon cube dissolves. This will make 2 cups of beef broth.
directions.3: In a medium bowl, stir together the broth, orange juice, allspice, and pepper.
directions.4: Peel and chop the onion, to make 1/2 cup chopped onion.
directions.5: Put 2 tablespoons water in the skillet. Heat on medium.
directions.6: Put the onion in the skillet. Simmer it until tender.
directions.7: Add the roast to the skillet. Brown it on all sides.
directions.8: Pour the broth mix over the meat in the skillet.
directions.9: Cover and simmer for 2 hours.

ingredients: 1 can stewed tomatoes (15 ounces, low sodium)
2 cans hominy (2-14.5 oz cans or 1-1 lb. 13 ounce can)
Beef Pozole Soup.notes:
Note: Skinless, boneless chicken breasts may be used instead of beef cubes.

Onions
Garlic
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large pot, heat oil. Brown beef cubes.
directions.3: Add onion, garlic, salt, pepper, cilantro, and enough water to cover the meat.
directions.4: Cover pot and cook over low heat until meat is tender.
directions.5: Add tomatoes and tomato paste. Continue cooking for about 20 minutes.
directions.6: Add hominy and continue cooking another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, over low heat. If too thick, add water for desired consistency.

Beef Stroganoff.notes:
Note: If thickening is desired, use 2 teaspoons cornstarch. The calories are the same as flour, but cornstarch has double the thickening power. These calories are not figured into the nutrients per serving.

Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cut beef into 1-inch cubes. Heat 1 teaspoon oil in non-stick skillet. Sauté onion for 2 minutes.
directions.3: Add beef and sauté for additional 5 minutes. Turn to brown evenly. Remove from pan and keep hot.
directions.4: Add remaining oil to pan; sauté mushrooms.
directions.5: Add beef and onions to pan with seasonings.
directions.6: Add wine and yogurt; gently stir in. Heat, but do not boil.
directions.7: Serve with macaroni.

ingredients: 1 can diced tomatoes, undrained, low-sodium (14.5 ounces)
2 Servings Eating Smart Seasoning Mix (1/2 cup)
Beefy Macaroni and Cheese.notes:
Swiss cheese used in nutrition analysis and costing.
Learn more about:

Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Brown ground beef in a large skillet; drain the fat.
directions.3: Add water, macaroni, tomatoes, and seasoning mix; stir.
directions.4: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer, covered for 15-20 minutes or until macaroni is tender.
directions.5: Remove from heat and add 1/2 cup grated cheese.
directions.6: Taste; then add a small amount of salt if needed.
directions.7: Refrigerate leftovers.

ingredients: salt and ground black pepper, to taste
2 3/4 cups whole beets, well drained and each cut in half (or 16-ounce can)
1/2 cup reduced fat crumbled blue cheese

directions.1: Prepare dressing: In small bowl combine cider vinegar, Dijon mustard, and sugar. Gradually add olive oil until well blended. Season with salt and pepper.
directions.2: Prepare Salad: In large bowl combine beets and white kidney beans; toss with dressing.
directions.3: To serve, place arugula leaves on platter or in serving bowl; top with beet mixture.
directions.4: Sprinkle with crumbled blue cheese and walnuts.

ingredients: 2 cups sliced cooked beets (fresh or low-sodium canned)
1 head of lettuce (washed and torn into pieces)
Beets, Beans, and Greens.notes:
Learn more about:

Beets
Garlic 
Lemons
Lettuce

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: To make dressing, combine lemon juice, garlic, mustard, oil, salt and pepper (optional) in a large bowl.
directions.3: Place the sliced beets in a small bowl. Toss 1 tablespoon of the dressing with the beets to coat.
directions.4: Toss the greens and beans with the remaining dressing in the large bowl.
directions.5: Place onto plates and top with beets.

ingredients: 1 small head green or Napa cabbage
Bell Pepper and Apple Coleslaw.notes:
Learn more about:

Cabbage
Bell Peppers
Apples

directions.1: Whisk together dressing ingredients.
directions.2: Shred or thinly slice cabbage.
directions.3: Cut apple and pepper into small chunks.
directions.4: Place cabbage, apples, pepper and almonds in large bowl.
directions.5: Drizzle with dressing and toss.

Bell Pepper and Potato Salad.notes:

Potatoes
Herbs
Bell Peppers
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook potatoes in boiling water over high heat until tender, about 10 minutes.
directions.3: Drain well and let cool.
directions.4: Place potatoes in a medium bowl and set aside.
directions.5: In a small bowl, combine dressing, mustard, parsley, and seasonings.
directions.6: Pour mixture over potatoes and toss well.
directions.7: Carefully stir in bell peppers and green onions.
directions.8: Cover and chill until ready to serve.

ingredients: 4 slices whole-grain bread (4-6 slices, dry or toasted, cubed)
Bell Pepper and Vidalia Onion Strata wit.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with 8 ounce glass of fat-free (skim) milk and 1/2 cup cantaloupe chunks.

Onions
Bell Peppers
Tomatoes

directions.1: Pack rack in center of oven and preheat oven to 350 ºF.
directions.2: Cut Vidalia onion into slices vertically; reserve about 1/4 of onion. Heat oil in a 10-inch non-stick skillet. Sauté onion and pepper slices for 5-8 minutes, until tender and just starting to brown. Remove from heat.
directions.3: Beat eggs, egg whites, milk, and pepper in large bowl, set aside.
directions.4: Spray 8- or 9-inch baking pan (square or round) with cooking spray.
directions.5: Arrange bread cubes in bottom of pan. Sprinkle with shredded cheese.
directions.6: Add sautéed vegetables and pour in egg mix.
directions.7: Bake uncovered for 45 minutes, until set. Egg dishes should be cooked to 160 ºF.
directions.8: While strata is baking, prepare salsa, by dicing and mixing cherry tomatoes, garlic, and remaining Vidalia onion.

ingredients: 2 teaspoons seasoning (try a mixture-chili powder, garlic powder, ground cumin, pepper)
2 cups cooked chicken, shredded or chopped (or beans or tofu -- or try a combination)
Bell Pepper Nachos.notes:
Try topping with chopped green onions or black olives.
Try adding cilantro on top for more flavor.

Learn more about:

Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Wash bell peppers, remove seeds and cut into bite-sized pieces. Arrange pieces close together in a single layer on a large foil-lined baking sheet.
directions.4: In a medium bowl, combine salsa, seasonings and meat, beans or tofu. Spoon the mixture evenly over pepper pieces. Top with cheese.
directions.5: Bake for 15 minutes, or until peppers are heated through and cheese is melted. Serve warm.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine yogurt, banana, and juice and mash with a fork until most chunks are gone.
directions.3: Wash and slice strawberries.
directions.4: Top the berries with the yogurt banana mixture.
directions.5: Top with honey and cinnamon.

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups berries (unsweetened frozen blueberries, sliced strawberries, or raspberries, thawed)
Berry Bread Pudding.notes:
In the summer, fresh berries can be used.
Learn more about:

Strawberries
Raspberries
Blueberries

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine the thawed berries and sugar (if you choose to use the sugar).
directions.3: Layer a spoonful of berries on the bottom of a small 2 cup deep dish. Cover the berries and the bottom of the dish with a layer of bread. Continue layering berries and bread until the dish is full, finishing with a layer of bread.
directions.4: Cover the dish with plastic wrap and place a plate or bowl over the top of the berry dish that fits just inside of it. Place a heavy object on top to press down on the fruit and bread layers.
directions.5: Refrigerate overnight. Check the dish to be sure juice does not run over the top. You may need to replace the heavy object with a lighter one to prevent spills.
directions.6: Serve with a dollop of vanilla yogurt or a sprinkle of powdered sugar.

Berry Good Dessert.notes:
Unflavored gelatin can be found in the same aisle as flavored gelatin.
Learn more about:

Strawberries

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and slice the berries and then place in a shallow dish (9x9 inch brownie pan works well).
directions.3: Combine gelatin and grape juice in a small pan and warm over low heat until the gelatin dissolves (about 5 minutes).
directions.4: Pour gelatin and grape juice over berries and refrigerate until firm (about 1 hour).

ingredients: 4 cups quick rolled oats (or whole wheat flour)
Better Baking Mix.notes:
To use old fashioned oats, whirl the oats in a blender about 30 seconds to make smaller flakes.
Better Baking Mix is used in the following recipes:

Drop Biscuits
Easy-As-A-Mix Pizza
Muffins
Pancakes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large mixing bowl, stir all ingredients until well mixed.
directions.3: Store in a closed, covered can or rigid plastic container, or sealed heavy plastic bag.
directions.4: Label and date the container. Use within 6 months.
directions.5: Stir lightly before use in recipes.

ingredients: 1/2 cup chicken broth, low-sodium (or low-sodium vegetable broth)
1 can black beans, low-sodium (drained and rinsed)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2:
Before starting to prepare the recipe:
	
Wash red or green pepper and cilantro (if using).
Wash and juice the lime into a small bowl (if using).
Drain and rinse the black beans and corn (if using canned corn).
Collect, mince, and measure all ingredients.
directions.3: Wash red or green pepper and cilantro (if using).
directions.4: Wash and juice the lime into a small bowl (if using).
directions.5: Drain and rinse the black beans and corn (if using canned corn).
directions.6: Collect, mince, and measure all ingredients.
directions.7: Bring broth to a boil in a small pot, and stir in couscous.
directions.8: Cover the pot, and remove it from the heat. Let stand for 5 minutes.
directions.9: In a large bowl, whisk together oil, vinegar, cumin, and lime juice (if using).

directions.11: Fluff the couscous well with a fork, breaking up any chunks. Add to beans and vegetables, and mix well.
directions.12: Taste. Add salt and black pepper if desired.
directions.14: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours. Eat within 3 to 5 days.

ingredients: 1/2 cup bell pepper (green or red, chopped)
1 can black beans, low-sodium (15 ounce, drained and rinsed)

1 clove garlic (chopped, or 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder)

directions.4: Pour dressing over bean mixture and stir to mix evenly. Chill for at least one hour. Serve cold as a side dish or main dish.

ingredients: 1 medium sweet potato (cooked and cut into pieces)

directions.7: Heat a pan on high heat and spray with nonstick cooking spray.
directions.8: Brown quesadilla about one minute on each side until the inside is warm and the cheese is melted.

ingredients: 1 can (15.5 oz) low-sodium black beans (drained and rinsed with cold water)

Black Bean Burgers.notes:

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mash beans with canola oil and mix with onion and tomatoes.

directions.4: Divide bean mixture between the tortillas.
