Broccoli
Carrots
Cauliflower
Apples
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Toss all ingredients together in a large mixing bowl.
directions.3: Refrigerate until ready to serve, up to 6 hours.
directions.4: Serve chilled.

ingredients: 5 cloves garlic (use 4-6 cloves, minced or 1 to 1 1/2 teaspoons of garlic powder)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cut bok choy crosswise into easy-to-eat pieces.
directions.3: In a medium skillet over medium-high heat, sauté garlic in oil until fragrant. If using garlic powder, add with salt in the next step.
directions.4: Add bok choy and stir quickly. Add salt. Stir until greens are wilted and stem pieces are tender-crisp. Serve hot.

ingredients: 1/2 pound lean ground beef (15% fat or less)
2 packages instant ramen-style noodles, broken into small pieces (3 ounces each)
1 package frozen stir-fry vegetables, any type (16 ounces)
1 tablespoon fresh ginger (or 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger)
2 cloves garlic, minced (or 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder)
Garlic Ginger Ramen with Beef.notes:
Try adding more seasonings such as red pepper flakes, cayenne pepper, or jalapeno pepper.
Pour fat from cooked meat into a metal container. Let it cool; then dispose of it in the garbage can.

Learn more about:

Onions
Ginger
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large skillet over medium-high heat (350 °F in an electric skillet), brown the ground beef. Drain fat from the skillet. Drain fat from the skillet. (See Notes.)
directions.3: Add water and ONE seasoning packet to cooked beef and mix well.
directions.4: Add vegetables, green onion, ginger, and garlic. Bring to a boil over high heat.
directions.5: Add ramen noodles, reduce heat to low, and simmer 3 to 5 minutes until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.

Garlic Stuffed Chicken.notes:
Learn more about:

Garlic
Herbs
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a small saucepan, bring water to a boil. Add garlic; cook for 10 minutes. Drain garlic, peel and cut into thin slices. In a small bowl, combine garlic, 1/2 cup of chopped parsley, lemon zest, and seasoning. Mix well.
directions.3: Loosen skin from each chicken breast to form a pocket. Place about 1 teaspoon of garlic mixture under skin of each breast. Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
directions.4: Add chicken skin-side down; cook until golden, about 4 minutes. Turn chicken; reduce heat to medium.
directions.5: Cover and cook until no longer pink in center, about 10 to 12 minutes. Transfer chicken to a plate. Wipe any fat away from the skillet.
directions.6: Add remaining chopped parsley, broth, and lemon juice to pan. Bring to a boil; cook for 1 minute. Spoon mixture over chicken.

ingredients: 3 medium tomatoes (ripe, skinned, seeded, and roughly chopped, about 3 3/4 cup or 2 pounds)
1 small cucumber (peeled, seeded, and roughly chopped, about 1 1/2 cup)
1 green pepper (seeded and roughly chopped, about 1 cup)
2 teaspoons minced garlic (or 4 cloves fresh garlic, finely chopped)
1 small tomato (seeded and finely chopped, about 1 cup)
1/2 small red onion (finely chopped, about 1/2 cup)
1/2 green bell pepper (seeded and finely chopped, about 1/2 cup)
Gazpacho.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with Spanish Garlic Shrimp, Garlic and Spanish Rice, and a glass of non-fat milk to make the meal complete.
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Cucumbers
Bell Peppers
Garlic
Onions

directions.1: Tear bread into small pieces; transfer to medium bowl and cover with 1 cup water.
directions.2: Soak until bread is saturated, about 15 minutes.
directions.3: Squeeze water from bread, discarding soaking water.
directions.4: In bowl of blender or food processor, add bread, tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, garlic, and 1/4 cup of water.
directions.5: Blend until well combined, about 1 minute.
directions.6: With motor running, add oil in steady stream until well blended.
directions.7: Stir in vinegar, season with low-sodium adobo.
directions.8: Strain puréed soup through small-hole strainer, into soup terrine, pressing firmly to pass all liquid through strainer, discard any solids.
directions.9: Cover terrine; transfer to refrigerator.
directions.10: Chill at least 1 hour, or up to 48 hours.
directions.11: To serve, divide soup evenly among serving bowls.
directions.12: Garnish with tomatoes, onions, peppers, and eggs.

Gazpacho Soup.notes:
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Cucumbers
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Chop the tomato, cucumber, and peppers into very small pieces.
directions.3: Put all the ingredients in a large glass or plastic bowl.
directions.4: Stir well with a wooden or plastic spoon.
directions.5: Chill in the fridge for 1 to 2 hours before serving.

Ginger Bread Mix.notes:
Use this mix to make Ginger Orange Muffins.
Learn more about:

Ginger

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix well.
directions.3: Store mix in a covered jar until ready to use.

Ginger Orange Muffins.notes: 2 servings of Ginger Bread Mix = 2 cups

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Combine the Ginger Bread Mix and bran cereal in a bowl.
directions.4: Beat the egg slightly in another bowl.
directions.5: Add the egg and other ingredients to the gingerbread and cereal mixture.
directions.6: Stir only until combined. Let stand for 15 minutes.
directions.7: Fill 12 muffin cups (well-greased pans or paper liners) 2/3 full.
directions.8: Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until done in the center.

ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil or cooking oil
Gingery Quinoa with Green Beans.notes:
Learn more about:

Green Beans
Ginger

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Toast to quinoa in a dry skillet over medium heat, stirring constantly for about 3 minutes.
directions.3: Put quinoa in a medium pot and add water or broth.
directions.4: Bring to a boil, then let simmer until all of the water is absorbed and quinoa is tender (10 to 20 minutes).
directions.5: Set aside and leave uncovered to cool.
directions.6: While quinoa is cooling, microwave the green beans until just tender.
directions.7: Rinse in cold water to stop the cooking process.
directions.8: In a large bowl, combine the quinoa, olive oil or cooking oil, sesame oil, green beans, lemon juice, soy sauce, and fresh or ground ginger. Stir well.
directions.9: Season with salt and pepper.
directions.10: Serve at room temperature.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Peel the carrots. Cut in half lengthwise, then cut into 1 inch pieces.
directions.3: Melt the margarine in a heavy saucepan on low heat.
directions.4: Add the carrots. Stir to coat them with the margarine.
directions.5: Add the water, salt, and pepper.
directions.6: Cover and simmer for about 15 minutes until tender.
directions.7: Drain the water.
directions.8: Add the sugar.
directions.9: Cover the pan.
directions.10: Shake the pan back and forth on the burner for 1 minute.
directions.11: Cook for 1 more minute, until the carrots are glazed but not brown.

Glazed Meatloaf.notes:
When using ground turkey add an extra egg
Recipe can also be used to make burger patties

Learn more about:

Onions
Bell Peppers
Garlic
Herbs

directions.1: Preheat the oven to 325 °F. Lightly grease a baking sheet
directions.2: Put a skillet over medium heat and when it is hot, add the oil. Add the onion, bell pepper, garlic, and thyme and cook about 10 minutes until golden.
directions.3: Lower the heat and add the water and tomato paste. Cook about 10 minutes until the onion is soft and most of the liquid has been absorbed. Set aside to cool. Add the mustard, salt and pepper.
directions.4: While the onion mixture is cool, put the ground beef, 4 tablespoons rolled oats and the egg in the bowl and gently mix, by hand.
directions.5: Add the cooled onion mixture and gently mix again until everything is thoroughly incorporated. Do not over mix.
directions.6: Form the mixture into a loaf about 8x4 inches and put on the prepared baking sheet.
directions.7: To make the glaze: Put the tomato paste and mustard in a small bowl and mix well. Rub on top of the meatloaf and sprinkle with the remaining 2 tablespoons rolled oats.
directions.8: Put in the oven to cook about 1 hour until deep brown and cooked throughout. Serve right away or cover and refrigerate up to 2 days.

ingredients: 4 small potatoes (2 cups diced, with skin on)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place the vegetable oil in a large soup pot or Dutch-oven style pan. Heat over medium-high.
directions.3: Add the onion and sauté until golden, about 2 to 3 minutes.
directions.4: Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. Bring to a boil and then lower the heat to a simmer. Cook uncovered until the peas are tender, about 45 minutes. Serve hot.

ingredients: 10 slices whole wheat bread, cubed (or white bread or buns, dry)
1 teaspoon parsley, dried (or 1 Tbsp fresh parsley chopped)
2 apples (optional - medium, pared, cored and chopped, or 1/4 cup raisins)
Grandma's Stuffing.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Celery
Herbs
Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Put cubes in a large bowl. Set aside.
directions.4: Put water in medium saucepan. Add onion, celery, parsley, salt, and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes. Do not drain. Pour over bread cubes.
directions.5: Stir in milk and egg. Gently stir in apples, and raisins, if desired.
directions.6: Spoon into a greased 2-quart baking dish.
directions.7: Bake at 350 °F for 1 hour.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Peel and grate the carrots.
directions.4: Put the honey and peanut butter in a large saucepan. Cook on low heat until they melt.
directions.5: Remove the pan from the heat. Turn off the burner.
directions.6: Add oatmeal, raisins, carrots, and coconut to the saucepan. Stir well, and let it cool until you can safely touch it with your hands.
directions.7: Put the mix into a 9x13 inch baking pan.
directions.8: Press the mix firmly into the bottom of the pan.
directions.9: Bake for 25 minutes.
directions.10: Cut into 24 bars.

ingredients: 3/4 cup dry roasted cashews (unsalted, coarsely chopped)
Grape and Cashew Salad Sandwich.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with a side of raw baby carrots and 1 cup of sparkling water with a lemon wedge.
Learn more about:

Grapes
Celery
Herbs
Lettuce

directions.1: In a medium bowl, mix cottage cheese, grapes, celery, cashews, parsley, and ground black pepper.
directions.2: Toast bread and build sandwiches following steps 3 and 4.
directions.3: Spread 1/4 salad mix on 4 of the bread slices.
directions.4: Add two lettuce leaves to each sandwich; top with 2nd bread slice.

ingredients: 1/2 cup diced Anaheim chili, fresh or canned
1 clove garlic, minced or 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder
Grape Salsa.notes:
Try adding chopped cucumber for more crunch.
Learn more about:

Grapes
Onions
Herbs
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine all ingredients in a medium bowl and mix well. Let stand at least 1 hour. Drain off excess liquid before serving.

ingredients: 4 1/2 cups fresh spinach, washed and drained
1 can sliced mushrooms, drained (2 ounce cans)
1 cup water chestnuts, diced (5 oz can)
Grapefruit Spinach Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Spinach
Mushrooms
Grapefruit

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Tear spinach coarsely and place in large salad bowl.
directions.3: Add mushrooms, water chestnuts, and grapefruit.
directions.4: Mix together oil, vinegar, grapefruit juice, soy sauce, hot pepper sauce, salt, and dry mustard.
directions.5: Toss dressing with spinach mixture and serve.

ingredients: 1/2 pound chicken, thawed, cut up, and skin removed from each piece
1 cup tomatoes, diced, or 1/2 can, about 8 ounces, low-sodium diced tomatoes
Great Northern Bean Soup.notes:
Tip for cooking chicken: The recommended safe minimum internal temperature for chicken is 165 °F, as measured with a food thermometer.
Learn more about:

Onions
Tomatoes

directions.1: In a medium-sized bowl, soak beans in 3 cups of water overnight.
directions.2: Drain the water and rinse beans.
directions.3: In a large pot, brown onion, chicken, and ham in oil over medium to high heat for about 5 minutes.
directions.4: Add water, beans, and salt to pot. Mix well.
directions.5: Bring pot to a boil and cook for 5 minutes.
directions.6: Lower heat and cook for about 1 hour. Stir pot every 15 minutes.
directions.7: Add tomatoes and vinegar to pot. Keep cooking over low heat for about 20 minutes. Serve hot.

ingredients: 1 pound pork cutlets (or 4 boneless pork chops)
Greek Pork Chops.notes:
Lemon, lime, or orange juice can be used instead of red wine vinegar.
Learn more about:

Herbs
Garlic

directions.1: Put the pork, oil, vinegar, oregano, and garlic in the glass or ceramic bowl, or in a sealed plastic bag and mix well. Cover bowl and refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight.
directions.2: Sprinkle the pork with the salt and pepper.
directions.3: Place a large skillet on the stove over high heat. When hot, add the pork to the dry skillet, waiting about 30 seconds between each addition.
directions.4: Cook about 7 minutes on each side until crispy. Serve right away.

ingredients: 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, cut in half
1/4 cup black olives, cut in half
Greek Salad with Chicken.notes:
Learn more about:

Garlic
Herbs
Lettuce
Tomatoes
Cucumbers
Onions

directions.1: To make the dressing, add Greek yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper to a small bowl. Mix well to combine.
directions.2: Cover dressing and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
directions.3: Wash lettuce and tear into bite-sized pieces. Place in large salad bowl and add tomatoes, cucumbers, red onion, olives, and chicken.
directions.4: Sprinkle with feta cheese.
directions.5: Top with yogurt dressing and enjoy.

ingredients: 3 cups green beans (fresh, cut into 1-inch lengths)
Green Bean and Mushroom Medley.notes:

Green Beans
Carrots
Onions
Mushrooms

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place green beans and carrots in 1 inch of boiling water. Cover, and cook until tender but still firm. Drain.
directions.3: Add oil to heated skillet. Sauté onions and mushrooms until almost tender. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 3 minutes.
directions.4: Stir in green beans, carrots, lemon pepper, and garlic salt. Cover, and cook for 5 minutes over medium heat.

ingredients: 1 can low-sodium green beans, drained (about 15 ounces)
Green Bean and Rice Casserole.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Green Beans
Tomatoes

directions.1: In a medium-sized pan, cook onions in vegetable oil until they start to turn light brown.
directions.2: Add the rice, green beans, tomatoes, and water.
directions.3: Bring to a boil.
directions.4: Cover the pot with a lid and cook over low heat for 10 minutes.

ingredients: 1 can green beans, low sodium (14.5 ounce, drained, cut)
Green Bean Saut\u00e9.notes:

Onions
Mushrooms
Garlic
Green Beans

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Spray a skillet with non-stick cooking spray.
directions.3: Sauté onions, mushrooms, and garlic.
directions.4: Add green beans and heat thoroughly.

ingredients: 3 1/2 cups frozen green beans (16 oz bag)
Green Beans and New Potatoes.notes:
Learn more about:

Green Beans
Potatoes
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Add all ingredients to a large stock pot and cover with water.
directions.3: Bring to a boil and reduce to medium heat.
directions.4: Cook until green beans and potatoes are tender.

ingredients: 6 cups green beans (about 1 pound, ends snipped)
1 can tomatoes, low-sodium (14.5 ounce can, drained and chopped)
Green Beans with Tomatoes and Basil.notes:
Learn more about:

Green Beans
Onions
Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook beans in a large saucepan of boiling water for 5 minutes; beans will still be crisp. Drain and rinse under cold running water. Set aside.
directions.3: In a large frying pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and cook 2-3 minutes until softened.
directions.4: Add tomatoes, basil and parsley. Cook 3 minutes to heat and combine flavors.
directions.5: Stir beans into pan and cook 5-6 minutes. Season with salt and pepper (optional).

ingredients: 1 can low-sodium sliced potatoes, drained (about 15 ounces)
1 tablespoon green onion (or wild onion), chopped
Green Onion Omelet.notes:
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Tomatoes
Onions

directions.1: Open and drain can of sliced potatoes. Cut sliced potatoes into strips.
directions.2: In a large skillet over medium heat, lightly brown potatoes in the vegetable oil for  5 to 10 minutes.
directions.3: In a mixing bowl, add egg, egg whites, milk, and salt. Mix well
directions.4: Stir in ham, tomatoes, and green (or wild) onions.
directions.5: Pour egg mixture over potatoes in the skillet.
directions.6: Cover skillet and continue to cook eggs over medium heat until firm, not runny (about 8 minutes).
directions.7: Cut the omelet into four pieces and serve.

ingredients: 2 cups fresh asparagus, large spears (cut into 1" pieces)
1/2 yellow or red bell pepper (cut into 1/2" pieces)
12 ounces fresh or frozen large raw shrimp (peeled and deveined)
1 1/2 cups dry quinoa (cooked according to package directions)

Grilled Asparagus and Shrimp Quinoa Sala.notes:

Asparagus
Bell Peppers
Garlic
Lemons
Herbs

directions.1: Place vinaigrette ingredients in a small bowl and whisk; set aside.
directions.2: Cut vegetables as directed.
directions.3: Heat grill and grilling tray.
directions.4: Place vegetables and shrimp in a large bowl; add about 1/3 of the vinaigrette (about 3 tablespoons) and toss.
directions.5: Spread shrimp-vegetable mixture over hot grilling tray.
directions.6: Grill, turning shrimp and vegetables, until the flesh of the shrimp is an opaque color (about 5 to 6 minutes); remove from grill.
directions.7: Serve grill mixture over cooked quinoa, and drizzle with vinaigrette.

Grilled Cheese with Peaches.notes:
Try this recipe with other leafy greens, such as arugula, and other cheeses.

Peaches
Spinach

directions.1: Heat the 4 teaspoons of vegetable oil in a large non-stick pan over medium heat.
directions.2: Place 4 slices of whole grain bread in the pan.
directions.3: Layer (in this order) one slice of cheese, a handful of spinach, 4 to 6 peach slices, another slice of cheese, and a slice of bread on top of each original slice of bread.
directions.4: After 4 to 5 minutes, flip each sandwich and cook another 4 to 5 minutes.

ingredients: 2 tablespoons fresh or bottled lemon juice
2 small boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 1 lb)
Grilled Chicken and Avocado Quinoa Pilaf.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with non-fat milk and orange slices.
Learn more about:

Herbs
Avocados
Bell Peppers
Onions
Garlic

directions.1: Heat grill.
directions.2: Peel and cut avocado into chunks; place in a medium bowl.
directions.3: Mix lemon juice, basil, an 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. Drizzle over avocado chunks, toss, and set aside.
directions.4: Cut chicken breasts in half crosswise.
directions.5: Mix 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, and remaining black pepper. Brush mixture on chicken and red bell pepper.
directions.6: Grill chicken and pepper until done. Set chicken breasts aside. Cut pepper into thin strips.
directions.7: While chicken and peppers are grilling, heat remaining olive oil in a large pan, add garlic and onion, and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
directions.8: Add water, bouillon, and quinoa to pan; bring to boil, cover, reduce heat, and simmer until liquid is absorbed and quinoa is cooked (about 15 to 20 minutes).
directions.9: Place quinoa pilaf in a large bowl and add chicken, red peppers, and avocado. Toss gently.

ingredients: 1 can 15.25 ounces peach halves (drained, rinsed, and chopped, about 1 cup)
1/2 red bell pepper (finely chopped, about 1/2 cup)
1 whole jalapeno pepper (rinsed. seeded, and finely chopped)
Grilled Fish Tacos with Peach Salsa.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with a Summer Corn Salad, chock full of vegetables, and a quick Mango Banana Shake for your best taco night yet!
Learn more about:

Peaches
Bell Peppers
Onions
Herbs

directions.1: In a medium bowl, stir together chopped peaches, bell pepper, onions, jalapenos, cilantro, and lemon juice
directions.2: Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.

Grilled Fruit.notes:
If using wooden skewers, thoroughly soak skewers in water prior to using to prevent burning (approximately 30 minutes).
Learn more about:

Pineapples
Peaches
Bananas

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place fruit chunks on a skewer to make kabobs.
directions.3: Grill or broil on low heat until the fruit is hot and slightly golden.

ingredients: 12 ounces boneless leg of lamb, cut into 1-inch cubes (if cubed lamb is not available at your meat market, ask the butcher to prepare it for you)
6 cups shredded Savoy, Napa, or green cabbage
2 tablespoons black or white sesame seeds
Grilled Lamb Salad.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with nonfat milk and orange slices/wedges.
Tips on Cooking Lamb: Cooking temperature: 145 °F (medium-rare); 160 °F (medium); 170 °F (well-done)
Learn more about:

Onions
Cabbage
Carrots

directions.1: Mix marinade/dressing ingredients; divide evenly.
directions.2: Place lamb cubes in a glass dish; pour half of the marinade/dressing over the lamb.
directions.3: Cover and refrigerate at least two hours.
directions.4: In a large bowl, toss cabbage, carrots, jicama (optional), onions, and sesame seeds.
directions.5: Remove lamb and discard marinade.
directions.6: Soak bamboo skewers in water for 30 minutes; divide lamb among the 4 skewers.
directions.7: On hot grill, cook the lamb skewers 5 to 6 minutes per side (or to desired degree of doneness).
directions.8: Remove lamb from skewers, add to salad, and toss.
directions.9: To serve, divide salad evenly on four plates. Drizzle with remaining dressing.

ingredients: 1 pound chicken breast, boneless, skinless (cut into 4 portions)
8 pineapple spears (2-1/2 x 1-1/4 inch, about 1 ounce each)
Grilled Pineapple Ginger Glazed Chicken.notes:
Serve with 8 ounces non-fat milk.
Learn more about:

Ginger
Onions
Zucchini
Bell Peppers
Pineapples

directions.1: To make the glaze, combine pineapple juice, vinegar, brown sugar, soy sauce, ginger and mustard in a medium saucepan set over medium-high heat.
directions.2: Bring to a boil; boil for about 15 minutes.
directions.3: Preheat grill to medium heat. Cook couscous according to package directions.
directions.4: While couscous is cooking, toss chicken breast with oil, salt and pepper.
directions.5: Grill chicken, for 2 minutes per side or until grill-marked. Continue to grill, basting and turning with Pineapple Ginger Glaze, for 5 to 6 minutes or until cooked.
directions.6: Grill onion, zucchini, red pepper, orange pepper and pineapple spears, basting with Pineapple Ginger Glaze, for 3 to 5 minutes or until grill-marked and tender.
directions.7: Serve chicken with vegetables and pineapple over couscous.
directions.8: Garnish with green onions.

ingredients: 1 cup unsalted canned black beans, drained and rinsed
1 pound large or jumbo shrimp, uncooked
Grilled Shrimp with Cantaloupe Avocado S.notes:
Serve with 8 ounces non-fat milk and brown rice.
Learn more about:

Limes
Avocados
Cantaloupe
Onions
Herbs
Garlic

directions.1: Preheat grill.
directions.2: Slice lime in half. In a small bowl, squeeze juice from one half of lime; reserve other half for garnish.
directions.3: Add remaining salsa ingredients and gently mix.
directions.4: Peel shrimp, leaving the tails on.
directions.5: Skewer shrimp on bamboo skewers.
directions.6: In a small dish mix together canola oil and garlic. Coat shrimp with oil-garlic mix.
directions.7: Grill 4 to 5 minutes or until cooked.
directions.8: To serve, top shrimp with salsa, garnish with lime wedges.

ingredients: 12 ounces boneless choice beef top sirloin
1/4 cup 100% white grape juice or apple juice
Grilled Steak and Peppers Salad with Pea.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with a glass of non-fat milk.
Learn more about:

Bell Peppers
Pears

directions.1: In a small bowl, whisk olive oil, vinegar, grape or apple juice, salt, and herb blend.
directions.2: Boil water and cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain pasta, rinse in cool water.
directions.3: Heat grill, rub peppers with 1/2 tsp olive oil. Grill whole peppers, turning as needed, until skin begins to brown and bubble. At the same time, grill beef sirloin to 145 °F, turning once. Remove from grill, let cool slightly.
directions.4: Slice peppers into strips, discarding seeds and stem. Cut sirloin across the grain into thin slices. Slice pears into thin wedges.
directions.5: Toss arugula and pasta in large bowl.
directions.6: To serve, evenly divide pasta-arugula onto four plates, arrange beef, peppers, and pears on top, drizzle with vinaigrette, and sprinkle with crumbled Gorgonzola cheese.

ingredients: 4 red potatoes, small (scrubbed well and sliced)
1/2 bell pepper (red or green, seeded and sliced)
Grilled Vegetable Packets.notes:
Try different vegetables: Tomatoes, green beans, sweet potatoes, mushrooms, broccoli, carrots, corn... or your favorites.
Be Creative! Use herbs or spices in place of dressing: Chili power, Italian seasoning, basil, oregano, curry powder, or your favorite seasoning!

Learn more about:

Zucchini
Yellow Squash
Potatoes
Onions
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat grill to medium heat or 350 °F.
directions.3: Wash vegetables and slice.
directions.4: Toss in a large bowl. Add dressing and toss until all vegetables are coated.
directions.5: Tear 2 large squares of aluminum foil and place half of the vegetable mixture on each piece. Place an equal piece of foil over the top of vegetable mixture and fold bottom piece with top sheet to form a packet.
directions.6: Place on heated grill for 20 to 30 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. If you don't have a grill, bake Veggie Packets in the oven at 400 °F for 20 to 30 minutes.
directions.7: Before you open the packets, poke holes in the foil with a fork. Be very careful opening the foil as the steam will be very hot and could burn you!
directions.8: Empty vegetables onto serving plate or serve from foil packets.

Grilled Vegetables.notes:
Learn more about:

Garlic
Potatoes
Corn
Eggplant
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix oil and garlic in a large bowl. Add vegetables and toss.
directions.3: Place vegetable on broiler pan or grill. Cook 10 minutes, turning twice until vegetables are tender.
directions.4: Place vegetables on platter. Serve.

ingredients: 1/2 pound ground beef, or ground turkey, or venison (lean)
1 can tomato soup, condensed, low-sodium (10 1/2 ounces)
10 1/2 us fluid ounces water (one soup can full)
Ground Beef Stew.notes:
Learn more about:

Carrots
Potatoes
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Brown meat. Drain fat, if any. Season lightly with salt and pepper (optional).
directions.3: Add soup and 1 can of water to fry pan. Add vegetables.
directions.4: Bring to a boil, then simmer, covered, about 25 minutes or until tender. Remove from heat, cover for last 10 minutes to thicken.
directions.5: Serve. Refrigerate leftovers.

Harvest Vegetable Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Lettuce
Herbs
Parsnips
Carrots
Turnips
Limes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine romaine lettuce and cilantro, and divide onto four plates.
directions.3: Place parsnips, carrots, and turnips into 1 quart of boiling water. Return water to a simmer, cook vegetables for 2 minutes. Strain into a colander.
directions.4: Mix ingredients for the dressing right before use.
directions.5: Place hot vegetables on top of greens and top with homemade dressing.

ingredients: 1/4 pound beef round roast, thawed and chopped
2 cups winter squash, chopped (or 2 cups cabbage, finely chopped)
1 large tomato, chopped (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium diced tomatoes)
Hearty Beef Soup.notes:
Tip for cooking beef roast: The recommended safe minimum internal temperature for beef roast is 145 °F, as measured with a food thermometer.
Learn more about:

Winter Squash
Onions
Celery
Garlic
Herbs
Tomatoes
Bell Peppers

directions.1: In a large pot, brown beef in oil over medium to high heat for 8 to 10 minutes. Drain fat.
directions.2: Add water, squash, onion, celery, garlic, and oregano. If using parsley, add that too. Mix well.
directions.3: Bring pot to a boil. Lower heat and cook for 20 minutes.
directions.4: Add macaroni, tomatoes, green pepper, salt, and pepper.
directions.5: Keep cooking over low heat for 20 minutes. Serve hot.

ingredients: 4 potatoes (baking, peeled and cut in chunks, about 2 pounds)
1 can garbanzo beans, low-sodium (15 ounce, drained)
1/2 cup milk, non-fat (or fortified soy milk)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water
directions.2: Place the potatoes in a large sauce pan and cover with water. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce to a simmer.
directions.3: Add the garbanzo beans 10 minutes after potatoes start cooking. Continue cooking until potatoes are fork tender, about 20 minutes.
directions.4: Drain water and place the sauce pan back on the stove. Mash the beans and potatoes using a potato masher or hand beaters.
directions.5: Add the milk, cheese and seasonings.
directions.6: Reheat if necessary. Serve hot.

ingredients: 1 can tomatoes, diced, low-sodium (14.5 ounce can)
2 cans black beans, low-sodium (15 ounce can, low sodium, drained and rinsed)
Hearty Mexican Soup.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Tomatoes
Potatoes
Herbs
Limes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large pot cook onion, garlic and tomatoes on medium-high heat for 3 minutes. Stir often.
directions.3: Add beans, potatoes and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce to low-medium heat. Cover and continue to cook slowly for 20 minutes.
directions.4: Add cilantro, cumin and lime. Stir and continue to simmer for 10 minutes.
directions.5: Serve warm; sprinkle cilantro on top.

ingredients: kosher salt, freshly ground pepper, and paprika (to taste)
Hearty Salmon Skewers over Brown Rice.notes:
Salmon skewers can be made in the oven or on the grill.
Covering them while on the stove will steam them rather than sear them.

Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Pineapples
Lemons

directions.1: Cook rice according to package instructions and set aside.
directions.2: Clean fish and pat dry.
directions.3: Cut salmon into 24 1/2-inch cubes and coat all sides with topping of kosher salt, freshly ground pepper, paprika, or any desired spice.
directions.4: Cut fruit into cubes and cut tomatoes in half. Set aside.
directions.5: Slide piece of salmon onto skewer, then tomato, then fruit. Repeat 3 times on each skewer (or until skewer is full).
directions.6: Heat 1/2 cup of canola oil in large skillet over medium-high heat for one minute.
directions.7: Place skewers in pan and turn every 2 minutes per side. Squeeze lemon on skewers as they are cooking.
directions.8: To serve, place 1/2 cup rice on plates and with 2 skewers on top. Squeeze a hint of lemon, if desired.

ingredients: 3/4 can chicken broth, low-sodium (low sodium, 14.5 oz)
1 can tomatoes, low-sodium (14.5 oz, broken up)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water
directions.2: Heat broth and water. Add vegetables, meat, and seasonings. Bring to boil. Reduce heat and boil gently, uncovered, for 15 minutes.
directions.3: Add noodles. Cook until noodles are tender, about 10 minutes
directions.4: Remove bay leaf. Serve.

ingredients: 3 cups cauliflower florets (fresh or frozen, thawed)
2 cups broccoli florets (fresh or frozen, thawed)
1 can red kidney beans, low-sodium (15 1/2 ounce, drained)
Hearty Vegetable Salad with Herb Dressin.notes:
Learn more about:

Cauliflower
Broccoli
Carrots
Herbs
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In large bowl, combine all salad ingredients.
directions.3: In a small jar with a tight fitting lid, combine all dressing ingredients and shake well.
directions.4: Pour dressing over vegetables and stir to coat vegetables. Cover; refrigerate 1 to 4 hours to marinate, tossing occasionally.

Heavenly Deviled Eggs.notes:
Garnishes: paprika, cayenne pepper (if you like it hot), pickle relish, sliced scallions, sliced green or black olives.
1/8 teaspoon each of salt and pepper may be substituted for 1 teaspoon of mustard.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put eggs into a saucepan. Cover with cold water.
directions.3: Bring eggs to a simmer (small bubbles) and cook for 12 minutes.
directions.4: Remove from the heat and drain.
directions.5: Crack eggs under cold water and allow to cool. Remove shells.
directions.6: Split eggs in half, lengthwise and remove yolks.
directions.7: Put yolks, dressing and mustard into a small zipper-lock plastic bag to mix.
directions.8: Cut a small hole in a lower corner of the bag. Squeeze mixture into egg white halves. Garnish as desired.

ingredients: 1 pound boneless beef chuck shoulder steak, cut 1-inch thick

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix onion, parsley, vinegar, mustard, garlic powder, and basil or thyme.
directions.3: Place meat in plastic bag and pour in marinade.
directions.4: Close bag securely, place in a bowl and marinate in refrigerator six to eight hours or overnight, turning at least once.
directions.5: Pour off marinade and discard. Place meat on rack in broiler.
directions.6: Broil 15 to 20 minutes or until desired doneness, turning once.
directions.7: Cut into thin slices to serve.

Herb Potato Salad.notes:
The mustard and seasoning make this a tasty potato salad. Try using new red potatoes for added color.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Radishes
Herbs
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Scrub potatoes and cut into cubes.
directions.3: Place in medium saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil.
directions.4: Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 12 minutes or until potatoes are done. Drain.
directions.5: Mix dressing ingredients.
directions.6: Combine hot potatoes, dressing, radishes, basil, thyme, and onion powder. Serve hot or cold.

Herb Spinach Bake.notes:
Milk can be substituted with 4 tablespoons dry milk + 2/3 cup water.
Learn more about

Spinach
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.4: Drain canned spinach to remove liquid.
directions.5: Combine spinach with remaining ingredients in a large bowl.
directions.6: Add to a 8x8 inch baking dish. You may also use a 9x3 inch baking dish, but the spinach bake will be thinner.
directions.7: Cover with foil and bake for 20 minutes.
directions.8: Uncover and bake an additional 5 minutes, or until set.

Herbed Dip.notes:
Serve on crackers, or as dip for fresh raw vegetables.
Learn more about:

Onions
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place all the ingredients in a blender.
directions.3: Blend all the ingredients thoroughly.
directions.4: Pour the mixture into a clean container.
directions.5: Cover and chill.

ingredients: 1 cup cooked and drained, chopped, frozen spinach
Herbed Spinach Quiche Portabella Caps.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with strawberries and orange slices (or other fresh, frozen, or canned fruit), water with lime or lemon slice or wedge.
Learn more about:

Mushrooms
Spinach

directions.1: Place oven rack in center of oven; preheat oven to 375 °F.
directions.2: Remove portabella stems; wipe clean with damp paper towel.
directions.3: Spray baking sheet with cooking spray, and place mushroom caps on baking sheet.
directions.4: In a mixing bowl, whisk together all remaining ingredients, except 1 tbsp Parmesan cheese.
directions.5: Coat 10-inch non-stick pan with cooking spray and heat over medium flame.
directions.6: Cook and scramble egg mixture until it just starts to thicken. Remove from heat.
directions.7: Using a large spoon, scoop partially cooked, hot egg mixture into portabella caps.
directions.8: Sprinkle tops with remaining Parmesan cheese. Bake about 20 minutes.
directions.9: Serve immediately.

ingredients: 2 cups vegetables (any combination of fresh, frozen, or canned)
1/2 teaspoon Italian herbs, basil, or rosemary (dried, crushed)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: If using canned (low-sodium) vegetables, drain, saving 2 tablespoons liquid.
directions.3: Cook onion, herbs, and garlic in the margarine/ butter in a small saucepan until onion is tender.
directions.4: Stir in the vegetables and liquid or add water as needed.
directions.5: Cook and stir until heated through.

ingredients: 2 celery stalks (each piece cut in half lengthwise)
Hiding Rabbits.notes:
Adults: If this recipe is being prepared by children, use a sharp knife to cut off the ends of celery, cut each celery stalk in half, and cut the cauliflower floret in half.

Learn more about:

Celery
Cauliflower

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place one piece of celery in center of plate with the center facing up.
directions.3: Use a butter knife to spread peanut butter on top edges.
directions.4: Place second piece of celery on top, forming a log. Cut log in half.
directions.5: Repeat steps 1-3 with remaining 2 pieces of celery.
directions.6: Place cauliflower florets on ends of each log, securing with remaining peanut butter.
directions.7: Enjoy your Hiding Rabbits.

ingredients: 3 cups fresh cranberries (12 ounces, can also use frozen)
Homemade Cranberry Sauce.notes:
1 cup white grape juice concentrate can be substituted for 1 cup sugar.
Learn more about:

Cranberries
Oranges

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Peel orange and remove seeds.
directions.3: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until mixed well.
directions.4: Heat up and serve over turkey.
directions.5: For thicker sauce to do not blend just heat and serve.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Peel the potatoes, and cut them into chunks.
directions.3: Put the potatoes in a medium saucepan with enough water to cover them.
directions.4: Cook the potatoes on medium heat for 15 minutes or until tender.
directions.5: Remove the potatoes from the heat. Drain the water off the potatoes.
directions.6: Mash the potatoes with a fork or potato masher.
directions.7: Stir in enough milk to make the potatoes smooth and creamy.
directions.8: Add the butter, salt and pepper.

Homemade Pizza Crust.notes: Pizza can be topped with sauce, mozzarella cheese, vegetables, and cooked meats.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix yeast, water, salt, and oil. Add about 1 cup flour to make a stiff dough. The amount of flour may vary slightly.
directions.3: Knead the dough until it is very elastic (will stretch and not make a hole).
directions.4: Use a rolling pin or clean bottle to obtain even thickness.
directions.5: Lay it on a greased baking sheet to rise while you prepare toppings for pizza.
directions.6: Bake at 400 °F with desired toppings until crust is browned and top is bubbly.

Homemade Ranch Dressing.notes:
Be creative! To make a thicker ranch dip, substitute another cup of plain Greek yogurt for the buttermilk.
Learn more about:

Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Collect and measure all ingredients before starting to prepare the recipe.
directions.3: Add the dried onion, salt, garlic powder, and dried parsley to a bowl, and stir gently to combine.
directions.4: Add the Greek yogurt and buttermilk, and stir until spices are evenly distributed.
directions.5: Chill before serving.
directions.6: Keep leftovers refrigerated, and eat within 1 week.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 450 °F.
directions.3: In medium bowl, combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and sugar.
directions.4: In small bowl, stir together buttermilk and oil. Pour over flour mixture and stir until well mixed.
directions.5: On lightly floured surface, knead dough gently for 10 to 12 strokes. Roll or pat dough to ¾-inch thickness. Cut with a 2-inch round biscuit or cookie cutter, dipping cookie cutter in flour between cuts. Transfer biscuits to an ungreased baking sheet.
directions.6: Bake for 12 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm.

Honey Baked Lentils.notes:
Replace 1 cup water with 2 tablespoons sugar, 1 teaspoon oregano, and 2 cups tomato sauce.
Omit the ground beef for a meatless meal that is lower in calories and fat.

Learn more about:

Carrots
Onions
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine rinsed lentils, bay leaf, and 5 cups water in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cover tightly and reduce heat. Simmer 30 minutes. Do not drain. After cooking, discard bay leaf.
directions.3: Chop onion. Combine onions and carrots with 1 cup water. Add to lentils and stir into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
directions.4: Brown ground beef (if using). Drain and discard fat. Add the meat to the lentil mixture.
directions.5: Pour honey over entire casserole.
directions.6: Add herbs if desired.
directions.7: Cover tightly with foil and bake it for one hour at 350 °F.

ingredients: 3 turnips, medium, about 1 1/2 pounds (sliced or cubed)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Peel turnips.
directions.3: Slice or cube turnips, 1/2 inch pieces.
directions.4: In a medium saucepan, combine honey, canola oil and water and bring to a boil.
directions.5: Add turnips, salt and black pepper, cover and bring to a boil.
directions.6: Reduce to simmer and cook for about 10 minutes.
directions.7: Uncover and continue to cook until turnips are golden and glazed, about 10 minutes.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 375 °F. Line a baking pan with foil for easy clean up. Lightly oil the foil.
directions.3: Combine flour and salt in a plastic bag. Shake chicken pieces in flour mixture, remove from bag and place on prepared pan.
directions.4: Bake for 45 minutes.
directions.5: Combine honey, lemon, and rosemary. Spoon mixture over chicken to glaze chicken pieces. Bake another 15 minutes.

Honey Milk Balls.notes: Honey should not be given to children less than one year of age.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix honey and peanut butter.
directions.3: Gradually add dry milk and mix well.
directions.4: Chill for easier handling.
directions.5: With greased hands, form into small balls.
directions.6: Roll in crushed cereal flakes.
directions.7: Chill until firm.
directions.8: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours.

Honey Mustard Dressing.notes:
Try this dressing on cold cooked pasta and vegetables. After serving, keep any leftover dressing in the fridge.
Learn more about:

Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put all the ingredients in a jar or bottle with a lid.
directions.3: Put on the lid. Shake well.
directions.4: Chill in the fridge for at least 1 hour before serving.

Honey Mustard Pork Chops.notes:
Pork chops are done when they reach an internal temperature of 145 °F.
You can substitute 2 tablespoons of honey mustard with 1 tablespoon of honey plus 1 tablespoon of mustard mixed together.

Learn more about:

Oranges

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put the pork chops in the large non-stick skillet.
directions.3: Cook over medium-high heat to brown one side of the pork chops.
directions.4: Use the spatula to turn the chops.
directions.5: Add the rest of the ingredients and stir.
directions.6: Cover the pan and lower the heat.
directions.7: Simmer for 6 to 8 minutes until chops are done.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Lightly grease or spray with non-stick spray a 12x15 inch baking pan with sides.
directions.3: In a small bowl, combine dry milk, flour, baking soda, and spices. Set aside.
directions.4: In a large bowl, thoroughly mix oil, honey, juice, peel, eggs, and pumpkin.
directions.5: Gradually add flour mixture to pumpkin mixture, stirring until smooth.
directions.6: Spread batter onto prepared baking pan. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until golden brown and cake springs back when lightly touched with your finger. Cool. Cut into squares.

Honeydew Summer Salad Wedges.notes:
Learn more about:

Honeydew Melons
Strawberries

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cut melon in half; scoop out seeds.
directions.3: Pat the inside of the melon dry using paper towels.
directions.4: Dissolve gelatin in boiling water.
directions.5: Combine ice water and ice cubes to make one cup.
directions.6: Add to gelatin and stir until slightly thickened.
directions.7: Remove any un-melted ice.
directions.8: Place each melon half in a small bowl to hold straight and firm.
directions.9: Place half of strawberries in each melon half.
directions.10: Pour gelatin mixture over berries.
directions.11: Cover with plastic wrap and chill until firm, about 3 hours.

Hooked on Salmon Sticks.notes:
Canned pink salmon contains soft bones that are a great source of calcium. Take out any large, hard bones, and then mash the small bones with a fork. You can do this and you will never know the bones are there once the fish is cooked. Pink salmon is "swimming" with omega-3 fatty acids -- a "good" thing for your heart. So it's a good idea to get hooked on salmon.
Rinsing your hands in lemon juice and water will get rid of the fishy smell after preparing fish.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large mixing bowl, combine salmon, cracker crumbs, and egg.
directions.3: Divide mixture into 8 balls and shaped into sticks about 4 inches long.
directions.4: Lightly coat a skillet with cooking spray. Add oil and preheat the skillet on medium for 1 to 2 minutes. Add fish sticks and cook for 3 minutes.
directions.5: Flip over and cook about 3 minutes or until golden brown.

ingredients: 1/2 cup brown rice, instant uncooked (or white rice)
3 ounces low-fat smoked turkey sausage ring, quartered lengthwise and cut into 1/4-inch pieces (lowest fat and sodium available)
1 jalapeño pepper, medium (seeded and finely chopped)
1 can black eyed peas (low-sodium, rinsed and drained, 15 ounces)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Prepare the rice using the package directions, omitting the salt and butter/margarine.
directions.3: Meanwhile, in a medium non-stick skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat, swirling to coat the bottom. Cook the sausage for 3 minutes or until richly browned, stirring frequently.
directions.4: Stir in the bell pepper and jalapeño pepper. Cook for 1 minute.
directions.5: Stir in the peas, water, and salt. Cook for 2 minutes, or until the mixture is thickened slightly but some liquid remains. Remove from the heat.
directions.6: Let stand, covered, for 5 minutes so the flavors bend. Stir in the rice. Transfer to a serving bowl.

Horchata.notes: Horchata is a traditional Mexican beverage made with rice and flavored with lime, cinnamon, or sugar.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Pour the rice and water into the bowl of a blender; blend until the rice just begins to break up, about one minute. Let rice and water stand at room temperature for about three hours.
directions.3: Strain the rice water into a pitcher and discard the rice. Stir the milk, vanilla, cinnamon, and sugar into the rice water.
directions.4: Chill and stir before serving over ice.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix all ingredients together.
directions.3: Store in airtight container.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix the cornmeal, salt, and cold water.
directions.3: Pour into the boiling water, stirring occasionally.
directions.4: Cook until thickened, stirring often.
directions.5: Cover and cook over low heat about 15 minutes.
directions.6: Serve hot with milk and sugar.

ingredients: 2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce (or to taste)
4 chicken breast, boneless and skinless, all visible fat discarded (about 4 ounces each) (halved)

directions.1: Lávese las manos con agua y jabón.
directions.2: In a large shallow bowl, stir together the hot pepper sauce, lemon juice, and olive oil.
directions.3: Add the chicken and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes to 8 hours, turning occasionally if longer than 30 minutes. Discard the marinade.
directions.4: Preheat the oven to 375 °F. Lightly spray an 8-inch square baking pan with vegetable oil spray.
directions.5: Put the cornflake crumbs on a plate. Turn the chicken to coat both sides. Transfer to the baking pan.
directions.6: Lightly spray the top of the chicken with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 30 minutes, or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165 °F and the coating is crisp. Transfer to a serving plate.
directions.7: Meanwhile, in a small bowl, whisk together the remaining ingredients. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. Spoon the sauce over the chicken or use as a dipping sauce.

ingredients: 4 ounces ham, cooked and diced (about 1/2 cup)

directions.1: Soak the pinto beans in 3 cups of water overnight in the refrigerator. Drain. Boil the beans in 3 cups fresh water until they are soft. Drain the water and mash the beans into a paste.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Place tortillas on a cookie sheet and bake for 1 to 2 minutes. Remove cookie sheet from oven and let tortillas cool.
directions.4: Spoon 1/4 cup of mashed beans on each tortilla. Drain peas and put 1/4 cup of peas on top of beans. Add 2 tablespoons of diced ham on top of peas.
directions.5: Bake the tortillas for about 8 minutes.
directions.6: In a mixing bowl, mix egg whites with vegetable oil.
directions.7: Cook the egg whites in a nonstick pan over medium heat until firm. Cut the egg into 8 pieces.
directions.8: Place baked tortillas on a plate. Cover ham and mashed beans with a piece of egg.
directions.9: Add 2 tablespoons of salsa on each tortilla, and serve two tortillas per person.

ingredients: 4 tablespoons cheese, shredded cheddar or monterey jack
Huevos Rancheros with Fresh Salsa.notes: Can add fresh lime and peppers as desired.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 450 °F.
directions.3: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.4: Lightly brush tortillas with oil on both sides and place on a baking sheet.
directions.5: Bake for 5 to 10 minutes or until tortillas are crisp on the edges and starting to brown.
directions.6: Remove from oven and set aside.
directions.7: Spray a large skillet with non-stick cooking spray over medium heat.
directions.8: Drop 4 egg whites into skillet, then, break whole eggs over whites to make 4 separate servings.
directions.9: Cook for 2 to 3 minutes per side until eggs are cooked.
directions.10: Place one egg on each tortilla shell and top each with 1 Tablespoon cheese
directions.11: Place under the broiler for about 2 minutes until cheese is melted.
directions.12: Spoon 1/2 cup fresh salsa around the edge of each shell.

ingredients: 2 cups garbanzo beans, cooked (also known as chickpeas)
1 tablespoon sesame tahini [sesame paste] (or substitute peanut butter for a sweet taste)
Hummus.notes:
Serve hummus with fresh raw vegetables, on a piece of pita bread or flour tortilla, on any cracker, or as a sandwich filling on toasted bread.
Learn more about:

Garlic
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mash the garbanzo beans until smooth (if you have a blender, put the beans and lemon juice into it and blend).
directions.3: Add the garlic, lemon juice, tahini and oil. Mix well.

ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (chopped cauliflower, peppers, carrots, or peas)
1 can kidney beans, low-sodium (15 ounces, drained, rinsed)
Indian Vegetable and Rice Skillet Meal.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Ginger
Potatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
directions.3: Add onion, ginger, turmeric, and cumin, and stir while cooking for 1 minute.
directions.4: Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, cover, and reduce heat.
directions.5: Simmer 20 to 25 minutes. Serve hot.
directions.6: Refrigerate leftovers with in 2 to 3 hours.

ingredients: 1 box of instant chocolate pudding mix (3.9 ounce)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Blend the chocolate pudding mix and the soy milk on medium speed for about 15 seconds until the mixture is very smooth.
directions.3: Add the silken tofu and blend again. Scrape the mixture down off the sides to be sure it’s all mixed in. Blend and scrape until well mixed and very smooth.
directions.4: Pour mixture into 4 small serving dishes.
directions.5: Place in the fridge. Chill for at least 2 hours before serving.

ingredients: 1 cup bread crumbs (dry, or cracker crumbs)
Italian Bean Patties.notes:
Serve in place of hamburgers and add toppings.
Serve in place of breakfast sausage.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large bowl, mash beans. Add egg and spices and stir to mix evenly.
directions.3: Stir in bread crumbs. If mixture seems too wet add more breadcrumbs, 1 tablespoon at a time until mixture resembles meatloaf.
directions.4: Shape into little sausages or patties. Roll in cornmeal or flour.
directions.5: Fry slowly in vegetable oil over medium heat until crusty and golden brown.

ingredients: 1 can great northern beans, low-sodium (15.5 ounce)
1 can red kidney beans, low-sodium (15.5 ounce)
46 us fluid ounces tomato juice, low-sodium (or V-8 brand juice)
1 can Italian style or stewed tomatoes (14.5 ounce, low-sodium)
1 can green beans, low-sodium (15 ounce, drained)
Italian Bean Soup.notes:
Freeze leftovers in plastic sealed containers with 1/2-inch air space under the lid.
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Onions
Green Beans
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large pot, combine all ingredients.
directions.3: Cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
directions.4: Serve with Italian or French bread or whole-wheat rolls.

ingredients: 3 tablespoons green onion (chopped, also called scallions)
Italian Broccoli and Pasta.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Broccoli
Herbs
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook noodles according to package instructions (do not include oil or salt), and drain.
directions.3: Spray a medium skillet with non-stick cooking spray; stir-fry onion and broccoli for 3 minutes over medium heat.
directions.4: Add seasonings (but not the Parmesan cheese) and tomatoes; simmer until heated through.
directions.5: Spoon vegetable mixture over noodles and top with Parmesan cheese.

ingredients: 1/2 cup Italian salad dressing, light or reduced fat (can use 1/2 to 3/4 cup)
Italian Pasta Salad.notes:
For a more hearty salad, add strips of cooked ham, a can of cooked red beans or sprinkle with grated cheese.

Learn more about:

Broccoli
Carrots
Bell Peppers
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl.
directions.3: Refrigerate for about 30 minutes before serving.

ingredients: 2 cups corn kernels (or combination of favorite vegetables)
Italian Style Vegetables.notes:
If using fresh green beans, cook for 2 minutes before adding onion.
Learn more about:

Zucchini
Green Beans
Cabbage
Corn
Onions
Garlic
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and trim vegetables. Slice zucchini into 1/2 inch pieces; snap beans into pieces; thinly slice or shred cabbage.
directions.3: Heat oil in frying pan; cook onion over medium heat until soft.
directions.4: Add vegetables and oregano.
directions.5: Cook over medium heat for 5 to 7 minutes or until tender. Add chopped tomatoes at the last minute of cooking. Stir occasionally.
directions.6: Serve immediately.
directions.7: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours.

ingredients: 1 pound package of pasta, any shape (cooked)
Italian Vegetables.notes:
Learn more about:

Broccoli
Cauliflower
Zucchini
Onions
Celery

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put 1 cup of hot water in a saucepan.
directions.3: Add vegetables and cook for 5 minutes.
directions.4: Add tomato sauce, remaining cup of water, basil and salt.
directions.5: Simmer until heated thoroughly.
directions.6: Serve with cooked pasta.
directions.7: Refrigerate leftovers.

ingredients: 2 teaspoons cornstarch, dissolved in 2 teaspoons water

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F. Place unpeeled banana on a baking sheet. Prick the skin of each banana several times with the prongs of a fork. Cook the bananas for about 8 minutes. The skin will turn black.
directions.3: Over moderate heat, cook the butter, water, and sugar to a medium brown color (it will look like caramel). Remove from heat.
directions.4: Combine the milk and cornstarch slurry to the caramel mixture. Stir to dissolve.
directions.5: Return to the heat and bring to a boil, stirring constantly.
directions.6: Remove from heat and cool slightly.
directions.7: Serve on top of the bananas that have been peeled and sliced lengthwise.

ingredients: 8 pieces of chicken, skinless (4 drumsicks, 4 breasts)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine all ingredients except chicken in large bowl. Rub seasonings over chicken and marinate in refrigerator for 6 hours or longer.
directions.3: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.4: Space chicken evenly on non-stick or lightly greased baking pan.
directions.5: Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 40 minutes. Remove foil and continue baking for an additional 30 to 40 minutes or until the meat can easily be pulled away from the bone with a fork.

ingredients: 1 1-oz box instant sugar-free, fat-free vanilla pudding

directions.1: In a large bowl, whisk together the milk and pudding mix; blend well (about 2 minutes).
directions.2: Add yogurt and vanilla extract; blend until smooth.
directions.3: Stir the thawed whipped topping into the mixture.
directions.4: Line the bottom of the parfait cups with a teaspoon of crumbled ginger snaps.
directions.5: Layer 6 banana slices on top of the cookies; then 2 tablespoons of the yogurt mixture on top. Repeat with another layer of the ginger snaps, bananas, and yogurt mixture.
directions.6: Top with cinnamon or crushed cookie for garnish.
directions.7: Cover and chill in refrigerator.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F and grease a 9x13 inch baking pan.
directions.3: In large skillet, melt butter and brown sugar.
directions.4: Remove from heat and stir in remaining ingredients.
directions.5: Spread into pan and bake for 15 to 20 minutes. Cool; cut into squares.

ingredients: 2 pounds cooked meat, cut into 1-inch cubes (use chicken, bacon, shrimp, or smoked pork)
2 cans tomato paste, low-sodium (6 ounces each)
Jollof Rice.notes:
Jollof Rice is a Liberian dish.
Chicken used in nutrition and cost calculations.

Learn more about:

Onions
Tomatoes
Garlic
Green Peppers
Herbs
Ginger

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Sauté cooked meat in oil until slightly brown.
directions.3: In a large kettle, sauté yellow onion, green pepper, and ginger in vegetable oil until onions are soft.
directions.4: Add whole tomatoes and simmer for five minutes.
directions.5: Add tomato paste, 2 quarts water, salt, black pepper, thyme, and red pepper.
directions.6: Add cooked meat, simmer 20 minutes longer.
directions.7: In a 2-quart saucepan, cook rice in 5 cups of chicken stock and water until tender.
directions.8: Add salt and pepper to taste.
directions.9: Pour the rice in a deep bowl and arrange the meat in the center.

Julia\u2019s Saut\u00e9ed & Steamed Coll.notes:
Learn more about:

Collard Greens
Garlic

directions.1: Cut bottom stems from collards.
directions.2: Wash and cut collards into bite-sized pieces. Place in colander to drain.
directions.3: Chop garlic cloves into small pieces.
directions.4: Place olive oil into large skillet. Place on high heat to start.
directions.5: Place collards in skillet. Keep on high heat, turning collards as they saute, about 1 minute in the uncovered skillet. (You will not need to add water because of the water already on the washed collards.)
directions.6: Add garlic cloves and red pepper flakes.
directions.7: Place cover on the skillet to allow collards to steam until they are half their original volume.
directions.8: Turn heat to low and continue steaming until the collards are tender.

ingredients: 1 clove minced garlic or 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder
6 cups kale, chopped (leaf portion, no stems)
1/4 cup freshly squeezed orange juice (1/2 orange)
Kale and Cranberry Stir-Fry.notes:
1 bunch fresh kale (about 8 cups, chopped)
Learn more about:

Cranberries
Onions
Garlic
Oranges
Kale

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Add oil and onion to large skillet. Stir and sauté over medium-high heat (350 °F in an electric skillet) until onion is clear.
directions.3: Add cranberries and garlic. Continue to sauté for 2 to 3 minutes.
directions.4: Add kale. Pour or squeeze orange juice over top of kale. Continue to stir fry for about 5 minutes until kale is wilting and hot.
directions.5: Serve immediately.

ingredients: 1 cup kale (or chard, spinach, or collards)
Kale Chips.notes:
Seasoning suggestions: salt, pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, chili powder, cumin, turmeric, and Parmesan cheese.
Learn more about:

Kale

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper (optional).
directions.3: Wash and dry kale. With a knife or kitchen scissors, carefully remove the leaves from the thick stems. Tear into bite-sized pieces.
directions.4: Place kale pieces on cookie sheet.
directions.5: Drizzle olive oil over kale and then sprinkle with seasonings of choice.
directions.6: Bake 10 to 15 minutes or until kale is crisp and edges are brown but not burned.

ingredients: 1/2 cup cilantro (chopped or torn, stems included)
1 jalapeño chile pepper (seeds removed and diced, optional)
Kale Salad with Yogurt Dressing.notes:
Learn more about:

Kale
Lemons
Limes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and dry kale. Remove stems and tear into bite-sized pieces.
directions.3: Season kale with salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon of olive oil, lemon juice, and lime juice.
directions.4: With your hands, massage kale until you can no longer feel resistance.
directions.5: Season yogurt with salt and pepper, lemon and lime zest and remaining 1 tablespoon of oil. Mix in cilantro and jalapeno pepper, if desired.
directions.6: With a spoon, mix massaged kale with yogurt dressing.
directions.7: Toss pumpkin seeds over salad.

ingredients: 1 cup kale, stems removed and chopped (1 bunch)
Kale with Nuts and Raisins.notes:
Walnuts used for costing and nutrition analysis.
Learn more about:

Garlic
Kale

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: On a baking sheet, toast nuts for 5 minutes.
directions.4: Heat oil in frying pan on medium heat.
directions.5: Add garlic and kale to frying pan and cook for 4 minutes.
directions.6: Add raisins and nuts and cook for 1 minute more.
directions.7: Add salt to taste (optional)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a 2 1/2 quart casserole dish add the chicken broth, lentils, onions, brown rice, water, spices, and 1/4 cup mozzarella cheese.
directions.3: Cover and bake at 350 °F for 2 hours, adding more broth if casserole seems dry.
directions.4: Top with remaining cheese and bake another 2 or 3 minutes until all the cheese is melted.

ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, 85% lean (coarsely ground, if available)
Kibbeh Khamoustah.notes:
Kibbeh Khamoustah is a Kurdish dish. Kibbeh, or dumplings, are stuffed with meat, traditionally lamb or beef, and served with soup.
Learn more about:

Garlic
Onions
Swiss Chard
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Fry ground beef in a small amount of oil.
directions.3: Prepare the dough by mixing matzo meal, semolina, water, and salt.
directions.4: Wet hands and shape into walnut-sized pieces.
directions.5: Roll out dough into a small circle and fill with 1 Tablespoon of meat.
directions.6: Seal the dough. Continue until all the dough and meat is used.
directions.7: In a large pot, heat a small amount of oil and fry garlic until golden.
directions.8: Add the scallions and Swiss chard. Mix well.
directions.9: Cook about 10 minutes.
directions.10: Cover with water and continue to cook until boiling.
directions.11: Add lemon juice, to taste (optional).
directions.12: Add stuffed dough to soup and cook 15 more minutes.

ingredients: 1 can black beans, low-sodium (15 ounce, drained and rinsed)
Layered Black Bean Dip.notes:
Serve as a dip for raw vegetables such as celery, carrot sticks, and pepper slices.
Learn more about:

Herbs
Tomatoes
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mash beans and mix with onion powder, dried oregano, garlic powder, and cayenne pepper. Spread on a serving dish.
directions.3: Top with salsa, sour cream, green onions, and grated cheese.

Leaf Finger Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Lettuce
Cucumbers
Beets
Carrots

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Lay lettuce leaves on a flat surface. Top each leaf with all ingredients: cucumbers, carrots, beets, and sunflower seeds.
directions.3: Drizzle each leaf with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
directions.4: Slowly roll the leaf with all ingredients.

Leafy Tofu.notes:
You may use other dark green leafy vegetables.
Learn more about:

Spinach

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Drain tofu.
directions.3: Dice tofu into 1-inch cubes.
directions.4: Tear spinach into bite-sized pieces.
directions.5: In a large pan, heat oil and saute tofu cubes for a few minutes. Move tofu to the center of the pan.
directions.6: Add spinach, and soy sauce. Mix.
directions.7: Cover pan and cook until spinach is wilted.
directions.8: Sprinkle toasted sesame seeds.

ingredients: 1 can cream of mushroom soup, low-sodium (10.75 ounces)
1/2 cup cheddar cheese, low-fat shredded (or jack cheese)
Leftover Turkey Casserole.notes:
See how to make this recipe and more on USDA’s MyPlate Kitchen YouTube site.
Learn more about:

Onions
Celery

directions.1: Wash your hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Lightly coat a 9x9x2 inch baking dish with vegetable spray. Cut 6 slices of bread (fresh or day-old) into 1-inch cubes and place half into the bottom of a baking dish.
directions.3: In a bowl, combine turkey, onion, celery, mayonnaise, and pepper. Spoon mixture over bread crumbs.
directions.4: Place remaining bread cubes over turkey mixture and press down slightly with spoon.
directions.5: Combine eggs and milk and pour mixture over cubes. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
directions.6: When ready to bake, preheat oven to 325 °F.
directions.7: Spoon soup over top of casserole.
directions.8: Spread one teaspoon margarine on side of each slice of bread. Cut buttered bread into 1/2-inch cubes and sprinkle on top of casserole.
directions.9: Bake for 60 minutes or until knife inserted in middle comes out clean. Remove from oven and sprinkle cheese over top. Let stand 15 minutes before cutting and serving.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Mix first five ingredients together in mixing bowl.
directions.4: Combine yogurt, lemon peel, oil, egg yolk, and milk together and stir into dry ingredients just until blended.
directions.5: Whip egg whites with mixer until stiff. Fold into corn meal mixture.
directions.6: Pour into round 9 inch cake pan coated with nonstick cooking spray.
directions.7: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until corn cake tests done.
directions.8: For optional lemon glaze: Over low heat blend lemon juice together with powdered sugar. Pierce cake top repeatedly with fork. Slowly pour glaze evenly over the top.

ingredients: 1 cup plain Greek yogurt, fat free (or low-fat)
2 cups Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved lengthwise (1 pound)
Lemon Dill Brussels Sprouts.notes:
Learn more about:

Lemons
Brussels Sprouts

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a small bowl, mix yogurt, dill weed, lemon juice, and salt. Set aside.
directions.3: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, sauté sprouts (cut side down) in margarine or butter until they begin to brown.
directions.4: Stir sprouts and add water. Cover the pan and steam until the water is gone and sprouts are tender crisp, about 3 to 5 minutes.
directions.5: Mix sprouts with lemon dill sauce. Serve warm.

ingredients: 1 egg, slightly beaten (can also use dried egg mix)
7 ounces frozen salmon, thawed, drained, and finely chopped (optional to remove the skin)

directions.1: Mix breadcrumbs, mayonnaise, egg, and lemon pepper in a medium bowl. Add salmon and mix.
directions.2: Measure 1/3 cup of salmon mixture(packed) and form into a round patty. Repeat until you have five salmon patties.
directions.3: Spray a skillet with cooking spray and set stove to medium heat.
directions.4: Place the salmon patties in the skillet and cook until light brown, 5–7 minutes. Flip the patties and cook on the other side until brown. Salmon should reach a final internal cook temperature of 145°F as measured with a food thermometer before serving.

ingredients: 1 lemon, juiced (about 1/4 cup of lemon juice)
Lemon Potatoes.notes:
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Lemons
Garlic

directions.1: Heat the oven to 375 °F.
directions.2: Combine 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 minced garlic clove, and 2 tablespoons of oil.
directions.3: Peel the potatoes and cut into 1-inch pieces.
directions.4: Pour 1 1/2 tablespoon of oil and lemon juice in a casserole dish or small baking pan to coat the bottom of the dish.
directions.5: Place the potatoes in the pan and coat with the oil and lemon juice mixture.
directions.6: Bake about 30 minutes, until potatoes are tender.
directions.7: After removing from the oven, brush the remaining oil and lemon juice on the baked potatoes. Serve warm.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash the spinach. Trim off the stems.
directions.3: Put the spinach, black pepper, and lemon juice in a pan.
directions.4: Cook over medium heat. Let the spinach boil for about 3 minutes, until just tender.

ingredients: 1 cup mandarin orange (4 ounce, slices, drained or your favorite fruit)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine vanilla yogurt and pudding mix; gently stir together.
directions.3: Layer bottom of individual dishes with crushed graham crackers. Reserve a few crumbs to sprinkle on top.
directions.4: Pour pudding mixture over cracker crumbs.
directions.5: Top with mandarin orange slices or your favorite fruit. Sprinkle with remaining crumbs.

Lemonade.notes:
Learn more about:

Lemons
Limes
Oranges

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cut lemon in half crosswise.
directions.3: Place lemon half on juicer. Push and twist to squeeze out the juice.
directions.4: Pour juice into glass. Add about 3/4 cup water.
directions.5: Add sugar, stirring to mix ingredients.

ingredients: 1 can 14.5 ounce low-sodium whole peeled tomatoes (coarsely chopped)
Lentil Barley Soup.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Carrots
Herbs
Tomatoes

directions.1: Place a large soup pot on the stove and add lentils, scallions, carrots, celery, oregano, barley, and water. Bring to a boil.
directions.2: Reduce the heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for one hour.
directions.3: Add the tomatoes and continue cooking about 45 minutes. Just before serving, add vinegar.

ingredients: 2 cans tomatoes, low-sodium, diced or crushed (29 ounce or 2 cans 14 1/2 ounce)
Lentil Chili.notes:
Learn more about:

Onion
Garlic 
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large saucepan, brown beef over medium-high heat, breaking it into bite sized pieces. Drain fat.
directions.3: Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
directions.4: Add lentils, tomatoes, chili powder, and cumin. Cook for about 1 hour until flavors are blended.
directions.5: Serve hot, topped with your favorite chili toppings.

ingredients: 1 sweet potato (scrubbed and diced into 1/4-inch pieces)
1 zucchini (diced into 1/4-inch pieces or 1 cup of frozen zucchini)
2 cups canned low-sodium, diced tomatoes (including liquid or fresh tomatoes)
4 cups kale (washed and chopped into 1/4-1/2-inch pieces)
Lentil Minestrone.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Carrots
Celery
Sweet Potatoes
Zucchini
Tomatoes
Kale

directions.1: Put a soup pot on the stove over medium-high heat. When the pot is hot, add the oil. Add onion and garlic and cook about 7 minutes until golden.
directions.2: Add carrots, celery, sweet potato, and zucchini and cook about 10 minutes until slightly tender.
directions.3: Add tomatoes, lentils, water, and chicken bouillon cube and bring to a boil over high heat. Turn the heat down to low, cover and cook 40 minutes.
directions.4: Add the kale and cook an additional 20 minutes. Serve right away or cover and refrigerate for up to 3 days.

ingredients: 1 garlic clove (crushed, or 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder)
28 ounces spaghetti sauce, low-sodium (1 jar, can use 28-32 ounces)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large sauce pan brown meat. Drain.
directions.3: Add onion and garlic to drained meat. Cook until onions are soft but not brown.
directions.4: Add cooked lentils and spaghetti sauce and bring to a boil. Lower heat and cook gently for 15 minutes.
directions.5: Serve sauce over hot cooked spaghetti noodles.

ingredients: 3 cans diced tomatoes, low-sodium (14.5 ounces each)
Lentil Stew.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Carrots
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat.
directions.3: Add chopped onion.
directions.4: Cook for 3 minutes, or until tender.
directions.5: Stir in garlic powder, carrots, lentils, tomatoes, water, and chili powder.
directions.6: Simmer, uncovered, for about 20 minutes or until lentils are tender.

Lentil Tacos.notes:
Alternate seasoning: 2 tablespoons taco seasoning instead of the other spices.
Learn more about:

Green Peppers
Garlic
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook lentils in 3 cups water for 10 minutes.
directions.3: Add remaining ingredients and simmer for 30 minutes. Add more water if necessary.
directions.4: Serve with corn tortillas. Can also be served over rice or noodles.

ingredients: 2 cups potatoes, sliced (15 ounce can, low-sodium)
Lentil Vegetable Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Peas
Carrots
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Boil 1 cup water in a saucepan.
directions.3: Add the lentils. Cook for 20 minutes over low heat until tender, then drain.
directions.4: Cook the peas for 3 minutes in another saucepan. Then remove from heat.
directions.5: Rinse and drain the peas.
directions.6: Wash, peel, and shred the carrots.
directions.7: Put the cooked lentils, sliced potatoes, peas, and shredded carrots in a bowl.
directions.8: Put the parsley, vinegar, mustard, and olive oil in another bowl. Stir well.
directions.9: Pour the dressing over the lentil vegetable salad.

Lentil Vegetable Soup.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Tomatoes
Herbs
Celery

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Sort lentils.
directions.3: Place lentils in deep pot with water. Bring to a boil and add all ingredients except vinegar.
directions.4: Reduce heat and cover.
directions.5: Cook slowly for 1 hour, adding more water if necessary.
directions.6: Add vinegar.
directions.7: Remove garlic and bay leaf before serving.

Lickety Split Banana Split.notes:
Learn more about:

Bananas
Grapes
Strawberries

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Peel and cut the banana in half, lengthwise.
directions.3: Place the banana on a plate.
directions.4: Top banana with yogurt and sprinkle with cereal and fruit.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat griddle. In medium bowl, stir or sift dry ingredients together.
directions.3: In a separate bowl, beat egg, buttermilk, brown sugar, and oil together. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened; batter should be slightly lumpy.
directions.4: Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake onto sprayed or seasoned hot griddle.
directions.5: Flip the pancake when bubbles appear on surface; turn only once.

ingredients: 1 box instant pudding mix (3.4 ounce), banana or vanilla
1 container of yogurt, fat-free, 8 ounces (or non-dairy whipped topping)
Lisa's Famous Dessert.notes:
1% milk used for nutrition analysis.
Learn more about:

Bananas

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a medium bowl, combine milk and pudding. Beat with wooden spoon, wire whisk, or electric mixer on lowest speed for 2 minutes
directions.3: Gently mix yogurt (or whipped topping) with pudding mixture. Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
directions.4: Layer fruit slices in the bottom of 8 dessert cups.
directions.5: Pour the pudding mixture over sliced fruit. Top with more fruit.
directions.6: Refrigerate until ready to serve, at least 5 minutes. The taste is better if it's refrigerated longer.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a bowl, mix sliced okra, oil, salt, and pepper.
directions.3: Coat a large fry pan with cooking spray.
directions.4: Heat over medium heat, and add okra mixture, turning often with a wooden spoon or spatula.
directions.5: Cook until okra is browned, about 10 minutes.
directions.6: Serve with hot sauce or favorite relish.

ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder (or 1 fresh clove, minced)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine all ingredients in a pint sized jar with tight fitting lid.
directions.3: Shake vigorously to blend ingredients.
directions.4: Store refrigerated.

Lo's Blueberry Coffee Cake.notes:
When tightly wrapped in plastic wrap, this coffee cake will keep for 3 to 4 days in the refrigerator. It also freezes very well.
Learn more about:

Blueberries

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F. Position rack in the center of the oven.
directions.3: In a large bowl whisk together the egg, milk, yogurt, oil and lemon peel.
directions.4: Sift the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt onto the liquid ingredients. Using a fork, stir very lightly, just until ingredients are combined.
directions.5: Gently fold in the blueberries. Pour the batter into an 8- or 9-inch baking pan coated with nonstick spray.
directions.6: In a small bowl combine the topping ingredients. Sprinkle evenly over the cake batter.
directions.7: Bake a 400 °F for 30 to 35 minutes or until the top is lightly browned and a wooden toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
