directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine pear, apple, kiwifruit, and orange in a medium-sized bowl.
directions.3: Pour honey and lemon juice over fruit and gently toss.
directions.4: Scoop up bites of fruit salsa using bites of cinnamon graham crackers (optional).

Pear PB&J Bouquet.notes:
Other materials needed:

paring knife
deep cookie cutter, flower-shaped
measuring spoons
squeeze bottle (optional)

Learn more about:

Pears
Strawberries

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Use a flower-shaped cookie cutter to cut each slide of bread. If bread sticks to cutter, gently push the petals out with your fingers.
directions.3: Wash the pear and dry it with a paper towel. Cut the pear in half, and remove the core. Cut each pear half into four slices, then cut each slice into five pieces. You will only use the center three pieces of each slice, so go ahead and eat the end pieces.
directions.4: Spread 1 teaspoon of peanut butter in a circle in the center of each of the flowers. Place 3 pieces of pear on the peanut butter on each flower. Arrange the pears so the skin is facing out and the white centers are touching in the middle.
directions.5: Drizzle 1/2 teaspoon of strawberry preserves in the center of each flower and over the pears.

Pear Quesadillas.notes:
Learn more about:

Herbs
Onions
Pears

directions.1: Sprinkle cheese, onion, and dried basil on half of each tortilla.
directions.2: Place pear slices on top of other ingredients in each tortilla.
directions.3: Brush each side of folded tortillas with olive oil.
directions.4: Heat each folded tortilla in a non-stick skillet until cheese melts, about 2 to 3 minutes on each side.
directions.5: Cut quesadilla into four pieces and serve immediately.

Pear Rabbit.notes:
Adults: If cooking with kids, use can opener, open pear halves and discard sharp-edged lid.
Learn more about:

Pears

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place 2 pear halves, flat side down, on a small plate to make the body.
directions.3: Use butter knife to cut a tail, ears and feet from another pear half. Add each part to the body.
directions.4: Use butter knife to cut one raisin in half and place on small end for eyes.
directions.5: Enjoy your pear rabbit!

ingredients: 1 cup canned pears, drained and chopped
Pear Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Carrots
Cucumbers
Green Beans
Pears

directions.1: Put salad greens, chopped vegetables, pears, nuts and raisins in a large salad bowl.
directions.2: In a small bowl, whisk together vinegar, yogurt, and orange juice to prepare dressing.
directions.3: Stir dressing into salad mix. Serve.

ingredients: 4 celery stalks (cleaned and cut into 3-inch long pieces)
Pears in a Pod.notes:
Other materials needed:

Paring knife
Small spatula or table knife
Cutting board
Measuring cups


Learn more about:

Celery
Pears

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Spread the peanut butter into the center of the celery pieces.
directions.3: Place the pear chunks on top of the peanut butter.
directions.4: Serve on a plate and enjoy with your friends.

Perfect Pumpkin Pancakes.notes:
If you don't have pumpkin spice on hand, don't worry -- it's just a combination of cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, and cloves. In this recipe, you can substitute 3/4 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg, and 1/8 teaspoon each of ginger and cloves for the pumpkin pie spice.

Safety Tip: You can be sure your skillet or griddle is hot enough for pancakes without burning your hand. Just sprinkle a few (3 or 4) drops of water on the surface. If they dance and sizzle, you are ready to cook. Be sure handles of skillets and pans are always turned toward the center or back of the stove, to prevent the pan from catching on hands or clothes and causing burns.

Learn more about:

Pumpkin

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine flour, brown sugar, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice, and salt in a large mixing bowl.
directions.3: In a medium bowl, combine egg, canned pumpkin, milk, and vegetable oil; mix well.
directions.4: Add wet ingredients to flour mixture, stirring just until moist. Batter may be lumpy. (For thinner batter, add more milk.)
directions.5: Lightly coat a griddle or skillet with cooking spray and heat on medium.
directions.6: Using a 1/4 cup measure, pour batter onto hot griddle. Cook until bubbles begin to burst, then flip pancakes and cook until golden brown, 1 1/2 to 2 1/2 minutes. Repeat with remaining batter. Makes about 1 dozen 3 1/2 inch pancakes.

ingredients: 1 teaspoon margarine or butter (to grease the pan)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: In a medium bowl, stir together the pumpkin, brown sugar, eggs, and oil. Mix well.
directions.4: In a large bowl, mix the flour, oats, cinnamon, baking powder, and baking soda.
directions.5: Add the pumpkin mix to the flour mix. Stir well.
directions.6: Grease a 9x13 inch baking pan with butter or margarine.
directions.7: Pour the batter into the greased baking pan.
directions.8: Bake for 30 minutes.

ingredients: 3/4 pound lean ground turkey or beef
1 can 14.5 ounce low-sodium diced tomatoes (including liquid)
1 can 15.5 ounce low-sodium black beans (drained and rinsed with cold water)
Picadillo.notes:
Dried cranberries can be used instead of raisins.
See how to make this recipe and more on USDA’s MyPlate Kitchen YouTube site.

Learn more about:

Onions
Bell Peppers
Garlic
Herbs
Tomatoes

directions.1: Cook as instructed on the package.
directions.2: Set aside.

Pico de Gallo.notes:
Use to season your family meals or serve with tortilla chips.
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Onions
Herbs
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine all ingredients in a medium bowl.
directions.3: Serve immediately or cover and refrigerate for up to 3 days.

ingredients: 1 cup crushed pineapple in 100% juice (do not drain)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Prepare Angel Food cake recipe, steps 1-4.
directions.4: Add the pineapple to the cake mix.
directions.5: Pour into an ungreased 13x9 inch pan.
directions.6: Bake for 25 to 35 minutes, until golden brown or an inserted toothpick comes out clean.
directions.7: Let cool and serve with whipped topping (optional).

ingredients: 2 cups cooked, cubed chicken breast (about 8 oz.)
4 6-1/2 inch whole wheat pita pockets (or 8 4-inch pita pockets)
Pineapple Avocado Chicken Salad.notes:
Serve with 8 ounce non-fat milk.
Learn more about:

Avocados
Pineapples
Bell Peppers
Carrots
Cabbage
Onions

directions.1: Mash 1/2 avocado in a small dish; add yogurt, rice vinegar, salt, and pepper.
directions.2: Cut remaining avocado into small chunks and mix together with pineapple, bell pepper, carrots, cabbage, green onion, and chicken.
directions.3: Add dressing; mix gently.
directions.4: Fill pita pockets and serve.

ingredients: 1 can pineapple (20 oz. can crushed or chunks)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Coat frying pan with nonstick cooking spray and set heat to low.
directions.3: Once pan heats up, add chicken. Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
directions.4: Cook uncovered until chicken begins to brown, then add crushed pineapple and water.
directions.5: Cover chicken until chicken is tender.
directions.6: May serve over rice.

ingredients: 1 cup pineapple chunks, fresh or canned

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place yogurt and fruit in large plastic bag and flatten. Freeze overnight.
directions.3: Combine fruit, yogurt, and juice in food processor or blender and blend until smooth.
directions.4: Serve immediately or place back in the freezer to harden until ready to serve, up to 1 hour, stirring occasionally. Stir before serving.

Pineapple Pork.notes:
Serve with cooked rice.
Learn more about:

Bell Peppers
Pineapples
Ginger

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cut the green pepper into strips.
directions.3: Heat the oil in a large skillet.
directions.4: Place pork chops on the heated skillet. Sprinkle the salt on top.
directions.5: Cook the pork for 5 minutes on low heat on each side.
directions.6: The pork should lose its pink color when it’s cooked enough.
directions.7: Remove the cooked pork from the skillet. Place it in a serving dish.
directions.8: Put the green pepper slices in the skillet.
directions.9: Stir the in pineapple chunks with their juice.
directions.10: Stir in the ginger and cinnamon.
directions.11: Simmer for about 3 to 5 minutes.
directions.12: Spoon the pineapple mixture over cooked pork.

ingredients: 1 cup pineapple, crushed, undrained (8 ounce can)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Lightly coat an oven safe 2 quart casserole dish with nonstick spray or oil.
directions.3: In a large mixing bowl, beat together eggs, milk, and sugar.
directions.4: Add undrained crushed pineapple, cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla.
directions.5: Stir in cooked rice. Pour into prepared casserole dish.
directions.6: Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until a knife inserted in center of pudding comes out clean.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Grease or lightly spray with non-stick cooking spray, a 9x13 inch pan.
directions.3: In a large bowl, beat eggs, sugar, vanilla, and oil. Add zucchini.
directions.4: In a separate bowl, combine baking powder salt, baking soda, and flour. Add dry ingredients to creamed mixture.
directions.5: Stir in fruit and nuts, if using.
directions.6: Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, or until cake springs back when lightly pressed with your finger.

ingredients: 1 cup peas, green, fresh or frozen
Pink Party Salad.notes:
The skin can be left on the apple to increase fiber and save time.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Beets
Peas
Apples
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Boil the potatoes in 2 cups of water in a deep kettle. Cover and cook over moderate heat for about 20 minutes, until the potatoes are tender.
directions.3: When thoroughly cool, dice potatoes and place in a big bowl.
directions.4: Add diced beets and mix with the potatoes.
directions.5: Set aside 1/4 cup of peas for garnishing and add the rest to the bowl.
directions.6: Save 1 egg to use as a garnish. Chop the rest and add to the bowl.
directions.7: Peel the skin off the apple and remove the core. Cut the apple into small pieces, place in a small bowl, and sprinkle with lemon juice. Add apple to the salad.
directions.8: Add the vinegar, olive oil, and sugar.
directions.9: Mix thoroughly. Chill and serve.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Spray a small non-stick skillet with non-stick cooking spray.
directions.3: Over medium heat, break egg into pan; break yolk.
directions.4: When egg is done turn over sprinkle with cheese and top with pepperoni (optional). Cook until cheese is melted.
directions.5: Open bun, spread with pizza sauce and top with cooked egg.

Pizza Meat Loaf.notes:
Learn more about:

Green Peppers
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Lightly grease 9 inch pie plate with vegetable oil. Pat turkey into pie plate.
directions.3: Cover turkey with waxed paper. Cook in microwave on high; rotate plate 1/4 turn after 3 minutes. Cook until turkey reaches an internal temperature of 160 °F, about 5 more minutes. Drain excess liquid. OR -  Place turkey in 350 °F oven; bake until turkey reaches an internal temperature of 160 °F, about 30 to 35 minutes. Drain any excess liquid.
directions.4: Top cooked turkey with vegetables, spaghetti sauce, and cheese.
directions.5: Return turkey to either the microwave or oven and heat until cheese is melted, about 1 to 2 minutes.

Pocket Fruit Pies.notes:
This easy snack helps work fruit into a daily diet. Tortillas, with a variety of toppings, make great snack builders.
Safety Tip: Allow pie to cool slightly before tasting -- the steam and sugar can burn.

Learn more about:

Peaches
Pears
Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Warm tortillas in microwave or oven to make them easier to handle.
directions.3: Peel and chop fruit into pieces.
directions.4: Place 1/4 of the fruit on half of each tortilla.
directions.5: In a small bowl, stir together brown sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Sprinkle over fruit.
directions.6: Roll up the tortillas, starting at the end with the fruit.
directions.7: Place on an greased baking sheet and make small slashes to allow steam to escape. Brush with milk and sprinkle with additional sugar, if desired.
directions.8: Back at 350 °F in oven for 8 to 12 minutes or until lightly brown.
directions.9: Serve warm or cool.

ingredients: 1 can whole kernel corn mixed with green and red peppers (11 ounces, drained)
6 ounces cheese, cheddar, reduced fat, shredded
1 can black or pinto beans, low-sodium (15 ounces, rinsed)
Polenta with Pepper and Cheese.notes:
Learn more about:

Corn
Bell Peppers
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a medium sauce pan, bring the water to a boil. Gradually add the cornmeal or polenta. Reduce heat to low.
directions.3: Continue stirring, add the corn, chilies, and the salt. Cook 6 to 8 minutes or until mixture thickens, stirring occasionally.
directions.4: Gently stir in the margarine, cheese, and beans.
directions.5: Remove from the heat and transfer to a serving dish.
directions.6: Garnish with red bell pepper rings and cilantro.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Pop popcorn.
directions.3: Mix popped corn, raisins, and cereal in a large bowl.
directions.4: Mix sugar and cinnamon in small dish.
directions.5: Drizzle melted margarine or butter over mixture.
directions.6: Add sugar and cinnamon mixture.
directions.7: Shake or stir until all ingredients are evenly distributed.

ingredients: 2 cups onions, cut in wedges (about 1/2 pound or 2 medium )
2 cups potatoes, diced (about 12 ounces or medium)
2 cups baby carrots (or 3/4 pound regular carrots, sliced)
Pork Loin Roast with Veggies.notes:
Wash and cut potatoes and onion into chunks about the same size as baby carrots.
Use a meat thermometer. Cooked pork can be pink even when the meat has reached a safe temperature.
For safety and quality, allow meat to rest for at least three minutes before slicing.

Learn more about:

Onions
Potatoes
Carrots

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: In a bowl mix veggies with 1 tablespoon oil, salt, and pepper.
directions.4: Lay veggies around the edge of a 9x13 inch pan and put in oven.
directions.5: Use a small bowl to make the rub. Mix the brown sugar, garlic, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, and 1/4 teaspoon salt in the bowl.
directions.6: Sprinkle the rub over the loin. Press gently so the rub sticks to the roast. Wash your hands after handling the raw meat.
directions.7: Heat the remaining 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add the loin. Brown the sides of meat. Turn after about 2 to 3 minutes per side.
directions.8: Transfer the pork to the center of the pan with veggies. Bake for about 40 minutes. A meat thermometer should read 145 °F. Check the temperature after 30 minutes in the oven.
directions.9: Remove from oven. Let set for 5 minutes. Slice and serve.

ingredients: 8 red potatoes, peeled and quartered (or 2 cans, about 30 ounces, low-sodium sliced potatoes, drained)
2 turnips, peeled and quartered (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium sweet potatoes, drained)
Pot Roasted Beef.notes:
Tip for cooking beef roast: The recommended safe minimum internal temperature for beef roast is 145 °F, as measured with a food thermometer.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Turnips
Onions
Carrots

directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.2: Season the roast with salt and pepper.
directions.3: In a large pan, brown the roast in the oil over medium to high heat for 10 to 12 minutes. Drain fat.
directions.4: Use a large iron skillet or roasting pan. Put the roast in the middle of the pan. Add the potatoes, turnips, onions, and carrots around the roast.
directions.5: Pour the tomato juice over the roast and vegetables.
directions.6: Cover the pan with a lid or foil and bake for 1 hour or until potatoes are cooked.
directions.7: If desired, cut roast into one inch chunks. Mix and serve.

ingredients: 1 can cream of mushroom soup, reduced sodium (10.75 ounces)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Peel onion and dice into 1/4-inch pieces.
directions.3: Cook ground beef and onions in a skillet until the meat is browned. Drain of fat.
directions.4: Add mushroom soup and 1/2 can water.
directions.5: Use a brush to scrub potatoes under cold running water. Slice potatoes into 1/2-inch thick pieces and places in the bottom of a casserole dish.
directions.6: Spread meat and soup mixture over potatoes.
directions.7: Bake at 350 °F for 45 minutes until potatoes are tender and casserole is bubbly and browned.

ingredients: 2 cups potatoes (cold, mashed, made from instant potato flakes)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put mashed potatoes into a bowl.
directions.3: Add flour and onion. Mix well.
directions.4: Pat potato mixture on a lightly floured board until 1/2 inch thick.
directions.5: Cut with a 3-inch round cutter.
directions.6: Place on a baking sheet, cover and refrigerate until just before cooking.
directions.7: Heat oil in a frying pan or griddle.
directions.8: Fry cakes over medium heat, turning to brown on both sides. Serve immediately.

ingredients: 6 small red potatoes, skins on (1 pound)
2 teaspoons vegetable oil or cooking spray
8 ounces lean ground turkey (15% fat or less)
Potato Nachos.notes:
Try other toppings, such as guacamole or reduced-fat sour cream or plain yogurt.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Lettuce
Tomatoes
Cucumbers
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Slice potatoes into small circles about 1/4 inch thick.
directions.3: Lightly coat the potato slices with oil (or spray for 3 seconds with cooking spray).
directions.4: Arrange slices on a baking sheet in a single layer. Bake in the oven at 450 °F for 25 to 30 minutes, depending on desired darkness.
directions.5: Meanwhile, add ground turkey and chili powder to a skillet. Cook, stirring over medium heat (300 °F in an electric skillet) for 8 to10 minutes or until turkey browns.
directions.6: Remove potatoes from the oven.
directions.7: Transfer baked potatoes to an oven-safe dish. Top with turkey and sprinkle with cheese. Put back in the oven to melt the cheese, about 2 minutes.
directions.8: Remove from oven and top with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, cilantro, and salsa.

Potato Salad.notes:
Leave on the potato peels for more fiber and other nutrients. 
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions
Celery

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Scrub the potatoes, and peel them.
directions.3: Cut the potatoes into 1-inch cubes.
directions.4: Put the potatoes into a saucepan. Cover with water.
directions.5: Bring the potatoes to a boil on medium heat.
directions.6: Let the potatoes simmer for 15 minutes until they’re soft.
directions.7: Drain the hot water, and let the potatoes cool.
directions.8: While the potatoes are cooling, peel and chop some onions until you have 1 cup of chopped onions.
directions.9: Chop the celery until you have 1/2 cup of chopped celery.
directions.10: Put the chopped onion and celery in a medium mixing bowl.
directions.11: Add the mayonnaise and pickle relish. Stir together.
directions.12: Add the cooled potatoes. Stir again.
directions.13: Cover the bowl. Put in the fridge for at least 2 hours before serving.

Potato Skins with Buffalo Chicken.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with a glass of non-fat milk and apple slices.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions
Tomatoes
Celery

directions.1: Center oven rack and preheat oven to 425 °F.
directions.2: Place chicken in a sauté pan, add water, and cover. Simmer for 20 minutes and remove from pan; let cool slightly. When chicken is cool enough to handle, shred using two forks, one in each hand.
directions.3: While chicken is simmering, wash and scrub potatoes with a clean vegetable brush under running water and slit each one lengthwise about 1-inch deep.
directions.4: Place potatoes in a microwave-safe dish and microwave on high, uncovered, for about 10 minutes. Let cool slightly.
directions.5: Slice each potato in half length-wise, scoop out potato, leaving a 1/4 inch shell. Mash potato together with hot pepper sauce, sour cream, margarine, and milk. Fold in blue cheese and shredded chicken.
directions.6: Spoon mixture into potato skins slightly denting center (to hold fresh toppings after baking).
directions.7: Place filled potato skins on a 9x13 inch baking sheet and bake about 15 to 20 minutes until tops are golden brown.
directions.8: Dice tomatoes and green onions. Cut celery stalks into four inch sticks.
directions.9: To serve, top potatoes with onions and tomatoes. Serve celery sticks on the side for scooping potato contents.

ingredients: 1/4 pound chicken, thawed, cut up, and skin removed from each piece
6 small red potatoes, chopped (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium sliced potatoes)
1/4 cup white rice, uncooked (or brown rice)
1 cup peas (or 1/2 can, about 8 ounces, low-sodium green peas)
1/2 teaspoon cayenne or jalapeño chilies, diced (optional)
1/2 cup fresh parsley or cilantro, chopped (optional)
Potato Soup.notes:
Tip for cooking chicken: The recommended safe minimum internal temperature for chicken is 165 °F, as measured with a food thermometer.
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Potatoes
Peas
Herbs

directions.1: In a large pot, brown onion and garlic in oil over medium to high heat for 5 minutes.
directions.2: Add chicken to pot and brown for about 5 minutes.
directions.3: Add water, potatoes, rice, and chili powder to pot.
directions.4: Bring pot to a boil, and cook for 15 minutes.
directions.5: Lower heat and cook for about 15 to 20 minutes. Stir pot every 10 minutes.
directions.6: Add peas and cook for about 8 minutes. If using cayenne or jalapeño chilies, add that too. Mix well.
directions.7: Remove pot from heat. If using parsley or cilantro, add that now.
directions.8: Mix well and cover for 5 minutes. Serve hot.

ingredients: 1 2/3 cups frozen hash browns, country style (about 12 ounces, thawed)
6 egg whites from large eggs (3/4 cup)
1/2 cup cheese, reduced-fat sharp cheddar, shredded
1/2 cup cheese, reduced fat Monterey Jack, shredded
Potato Spinach Casserole.notes:
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Green Peppers
Onions
Spinach 
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 425 °F.
directions.3: Wash your hands and work area.
directions.4: In large bowl, combine hash browns, green pepper, 1/4 cup onion, salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
directions.5: Spray a 8x8 inch baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. Press potato mixture into bottom.
directions.6: Bake until lightly browned around edges, 20 to 25 minutes.
directions.7: In large bowl, stir together evaporated milk, egg whites, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, cheeses, spinach, remaining 1/4 cup onion, and tomatoes.
directions.8: Reduce oven temperature to 350 °F.
directions.9: Pour mixture over potato crust. Bake uncovered until center is set, 40 to 45 minutes.
directions.10: Cover and let stand for 10 minutes. Cut into 6 pieces. Serve hot. Cover and refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours.

ingredients: 3/4 cup non-fat ricotta cheese (or cottage cheese)
1 1/2 cups reduced sodium pasta sauce (about 1/2 of 24-oz jar)
Potato Spinach Lasagna.notes:
Serve with sparkling water, lemon slice, and a slice of rustic grain bread.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions
Garlic
Spinach

directions.1: Preheat oven to 375 °F.
directions.2: Bring water to a boil in large sauce pan.
directions.3: Thinly slice potatoes, add to boiling water and cook 5 minutes, drain and rinse with cool water; drain again.
directions.4: Heat olive oil in medium skillet, add onions and garlic; sauté about 2 to 3 minutes until just starting to brown.
directions.5: Add spinach, sauté 1 more minute.
directions.6: Remove from heat and drain off liquid.
directions.7: In a medium bowl, mix cheese with egg until well blended.
directions.8: Add layers to 8 inch square baking dish as follows, using about 1/4 of each: pasta sauce, potato slices, sautéed spinach mixture and cheese mixture.
directions.9: Repeat layers until all ingredients are used.
directions.10: Cover with foil.
directions.11: Bake about 35 to 40 minutes.
directions.12: Remove foil and bake an additional 10 minutes until cheese is melted.

ingredients: 2 1/2 cups kale (curly Italian or other variety, approx. 6 oz.)
1 can 15 oz. no salt added black beans (drained and and rinsed)
Potato, Black Bean, & Kale Skillet.notes:
Serve with 8 ounce glass of non-fat milk, chicken breast, and orange slices.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Garlic
Onions

directions.1: Dice potatoes into 1/4 inch pieces.
directions.2: Chop kale.
directions.3: Heat oil, in large skillet over medium heat, Add garlic and onions; cook 2 to 3 minutes until just starting to brown.
directions.4: Add diced potatoes, chili, salt, and pepper to skillet, cover with lid and cook 8 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
directions.5: Add chopped kale and black beans. Cook about 3 to 5 more minutes, stirring gently.
directions.6: Serve with Greek yogurt.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 425 °F.
directions.3: In a small bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water, add honey and let set for a few minutes.
directions.4: In a large mixing bowl, measure flour and salt.
directions.5: Add yeast mixture to flour mixture and stir until it forms a smooth ball. Add a little more flour if the dough is sticky.
directions.6: Knead dough on countertop or dough board until it forms a smooth ball. Add a little flour if the dough is sticky.
directions.7: Divide dough into 12 pieces about the size of a walnut. Roll each ball into a snake and then twist to make a pretzel, letter, or other fun shape.
directions.8: Place pretzels on a baking sheet lightly coated with cooking spray. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden brown.

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups cider or white vinegar (or a combination of both)
8 100% whole wheat dinner rolls or slider buns
Pulled Pork Sandwich with Red Cabbage an.notes:
1 bag coleslaw mix can be used instead of red cabbage.
Leftovers can be served with brown rice or wrapped in a whole wheat tortilla.

Learn more about:

Cabbage
Carrots

directions.1: Put everything in the slow cooker and turn the heat to medium. Cook, undisturbed, for 8 hours or until it is fork-tender (about 190 °F with a meat thermometer).
directions.2: Remove the pork from the slow cooker but keep the liquid. While still hot, use two forks to shred the meat. Remove any fat found between the shreds.
directions.3: Skim as much fat as possible from the liquid in the slow cooker. Add about 1 cup of the cooking liquid to the shredded pork.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Blend white beans, onion, and water with a potato masher or blender till smooth.
directions.3: In a large pot, add the pumpkin, juice, cinnamon, nutmeg, black pepper, and salt. Stir.
directions.4: Add the blended bean mix to the pot.
directions.5: Cook over low heat for 15 to 20 minutes, until warmed through.

Pumpkin Angel Food Cake.notes:
Angel food cake pan can be turned upside down onto a glass bottle. Suggest serving with whipped topping.
Learn more about:

Pumpkins

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Prepare Angel Food cake recipe, steps 1-4.
directions.4: In a large bowl, beat all ingredients with an electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds. Then, beat on medium speed for 1 minute.
directions.5: Pour into an ungreased 10-inch angel food cake pan.
directions.6: Bake 37 to 47 minutes or until golden brown and cracks are dry.
directions.7: Remove from oven and immediately turn pan upside down until cooled.

Pumpkin Bread.notes:
Substituting yogurt for eggs and oil reduces fat and cholesterol.
Learn more about:

Pumpkins

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: In a large mixing bowl, beat together pumpkin, sugar, oil, and yogurt.
directions.4: In a medium bowl, combine the flours, baking powder, soda, cinnamon, and salt. Add to pumpkin mixture, stirring until just moistened.
directions.5: Stir in raisins.
directions.6: Pour into 2 greased 9x5x3 inch loaf pans and bake for about 1 hour.
directions.7: Cool on a wire rack for 10 minutes; remove from pan and cool completely.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Place the cream cheeses, eggs, and sugar in a large mixing bowl. Mix at medium speed until creamed. Add the remaining ingredients and mix at medium speed until ingredients are well mixed.
directions.4: Spoon the mixture evenly in each pie crust and place both in the oven for approximately 50 minutes until pies look firm in the middle.

ingredients: 1 green bell pepper (cored, seeded and chopped )
2 cloves garlic (finely chopped or 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder )
1 can diced tomatoes with juice, low-sodium
1 can kidney beans, low-sodium (or other beans if desired)
Pumpkin Chili.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Bell Peppers
Garlic
Tomatoes
Pumpkins

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in a large pot over medium high heat.
directions.3: Add onion, bell pepper, jalapenos and garlic and cook, stirring frequently until tender, about 5 minutes.
directions.4: Add turkey and cook until browned.
directions.5: Add tomatoes, pumpkin, water, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper and bring to a boil.
directions.6: Reduce heat to medium low then add beans.
directions.7: Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes more.
directions.8: Ladle chili into bowls and serve.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Whisk all the dry ingredients together. Add pumpkin and water.
directions.3: Fold the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients until just combined. Fold in chocolate chips.
directions.4: Place batter into 24 prepared muffin tins and bake at 350 °F for 10 to 12 minutes.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Mix pumpkin, brown sugar, eggs, and oil thoroughly.
directions.4: Blend dry ingredients and add to pumpkin mixture.
directions.5: Add raisins and nuts.
directions.6: Drop by teaspoonfuls on greased cookie sheet.
directions.7: Bake 10 to 12 minutes until golden brown.

Pumpkin Mac & Cheese for One.notes:
Low-fat cheddar cheese used in nutrition analysis and for costing purposes.
Why add pumpkin? Adding pumpkin mixture in addition to the cheese soup lowers the total calories and boosts nutritional fiber and vitamin A.

Learn more about:

Pumpkins

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Stir the "wet" ingredients (soup, pumpkin purée, milk, and mustard), and heat in microwave for 45 to 60 seconds; stir again until creamy.
directions.3: Add cooked pasta to cream and sprinkle cheese on top. Heat another 30 to 45 seconds or until cheese melts.

ingredients: 1 can pumpkin, 15 ounces (or 2 cups cooked mashed squash such as Hubbard)
2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice (or 1 teaspoon cinnmamon, 1/2 teaspoon ginger, 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg and 1/4 teaspoon cloves)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large bowl mix pumpkin, salt and pumpkin spice together.
directions.3: Slowly stir in milk and mix well. Add instant pudding mix and stir for 2 minutes until it thickens. Refrigerate until serving time.

ingredients: 6 ounces jumbo pasta shells (about 12 jumbo pasta shells)
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder (or 2 cloves garlic, minced)
Pumpkin Ricotta Stuffed Shells.notes:
Freeze unused pumpkin and add to soup, chili or pancake recipes.
Learn more about:

Pumpkins
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Cook pasta shells according to package directions. Drain and place each on a baking sheet to cool.
directions.4: In a medium bowl, stir together ricotta, pumpkin, spices, and all but 1 tablespoon of the cheese. Reserve the 1 tablespoon cheese for topping.
directions.5: Spread pasta sauce in the bottom of a baking dish that holds all the shells in a single layer. Fill each shell with about 3 tablespoons of pumpkin mixture and place shells close together on top of the sauce.
directions.6: Cover pan with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove foil, sprinkle with remaining cheese, and bake for 15 minutes more.

ingredients: 1/4 pound beef round roast, thawed, sliced thinly
2 tablespoons maple syrup (or 2 tablespoons brown sugar)
Pumpkin Soup.notes:
Tip for cooking beef roast: The recommended safe minimum internal temperature for beef roast is 145 °F, as measured with a food thermometer.
See how to make this recipe and more on USDA’s MyPlate Kitchen YouTube site.

Learn more about:

Pumpkins
Onions

directions.1: In a medium-sized pot, bring water to a boil.
directions.2: Add beef roast to boiling water. Boil for 5 to 10 minutes.
directions.3: Add pumpkin, maple syrup, and pepper to pot. If using cinnamon, add that too. Mix well.
directions.4: Lower heat and cook for about 10 minutes.
directions.5: Put 2 teaspoons of onion on top of each bowl of soup. Serve hot.

Pupusas Revueltas.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Peppers
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a non-stick skillet over low heat, sauté chicken in oil until chicken turns white. Constantly stir the chicken to keep it from sticking.
directions.3: Add onion, garlic, green pepper, and tomato. Cook until chicken mixture is cooked through. Remove skillet from stove and let mixture cool in the refrigerator.
directions.4: While the chicken mixture is cooling, place the flour in a large mixing bowl and stir in enough water to make a stiff tortilla-like dough.
directions.5: When the chicken mixture has cooled, mix in the cheese.
directions.6: Divide the dough into 24 portions. With your hands, roll the dough into balls and flatten each ball into a 1/2 ich thick circle. Put a spoonful of the chicken mixture in the middle of each circle of dough and bring the edges to the center. Flatten the ball of dough again until it is 1/2 inch thick.
directions.7: In a very hot, iron skillet, cook the pupusas on each side until golden brown.
directions.8: Serve hot.

Purple Cow.notes:
Substitute 1 cup milk and 1 cup water for 2 cups water and 1/3 cup nonfat dry milk
Learn more about:

Grapes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place all ingredients in blender or food processor.
directions.3: Secure lid and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

ingredients: 1/2 cup cheddar or colby jack cheese (grated - cojack)
Quesadilla con Huevos.notes:
Kids can make these as plain as they like or can add ingredients such as peppers, tomatoes, mushrooms, or onions. Quesadillas make a great breakfast or lunch that's easy and quick. Instead of using a microwave, you can heat the tortillas on a skillet or griddle until the cheese melts.
Safety Tips: The melted cheese is hot, so wait a minute before eating. Use a knife or pizza wheel to cut the quesadilla into wedges for serving.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put 2 tablespoons cheese and 1/4 of the scrambled eggs on each tortilla.
directions.3: Heat 2 quesadillas at a time in microwave on high for 30 to 45 seconds or until cheese melts.
directions.4: Top with salsa and fold tortilla in half to serve.
directions.5: Add parsley if desired.

ingredients: 1 can green beans, low-sodium (14.5 ounce, drained, or other vegetable)
1 can tuna packed in water (6.5 ounces, drained and flaked)
Quick 'N Cool Summer Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Green Beans
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Prepare elbow macaroni according to package directions and drain.
directions.3: Add vegetables, tuna, onions, cheese, and pickles.
directions.4: Mix yogurt, salad dressing, lemon juice, salt, and seasoned pepper.
directions.5: Toss with macaroni mixture.
directions.6: Chill before serving.
directions.7: Refrigerate leftovers promptly.

ingredients: 3 tablespoons real bacon bits or pieces
Quick and Easy Baked Potato Salad.notes:
This salad may be served right away, but is best if refrigerated for at least one hour to allow flavors to blend.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions
Herbs

directions.1: Place whole potatoes (do not poke holes) into microwave-safe dish.
directions.2: Cover dish. (If covering dish with plastic wrap, poke small holes in plastic.)
directions.3: Microwave on high for 10 to 12 minutes depending on strength of microwave.
directions.4: Use oven mitts or a towel to remove dish from microwave. Carefully remove cover from dish due to steam build up and let cool.
directions.5: Cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces and place in a large bowel with remaining ingredients. Stir and mix well.

ingredients: 6 ounces part-skim mozzarella cheese, shredded (1 1/2 cups)
Quick and Easy Pizza.notes: *Make it whole grain! To make whole grain pizza crust, substitute 1 cup of 100% whole wheat flour for 1 cup of the all-purpose flour. Increase the water to 1 cup, and increase the baking time to 20 minutes.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 375 °F.
directions.3: Collect, shred, and measure all ingredients before starting to prepare the recipe.
directions.4: In a medium bowl, mix 1 cup flour, yeast, sugar, and water with a spoon.
directions.5: Gradually stir in the other cup of flour until the mixture forms a ball.
directions.6: Dust a cutting board or clean countertop surface with flour. Put the ball of dough on the surface, then use your clean hands to knead the dough on the surface for about 5 minutes.
directions.7: Spray a bowl with nonstick cooking spray. Put the dough in the bowl, and cover it with a clean dishtowel. Put the bowl on the oven while it is preheating (but not on a burner that is turned on), and let it sit for 10 to 15 minutes (preheating the oven will cause the stovetop to be slightly warm and will help the dough rise).
directions.8: Spray a 12-inch x 16-inch baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Spread the dough into an even layer on the baking sheet. Spread the dough into an even layer on the baking sheet. For a thicker crust, use a smaller baking sheet.
directions.9: Add a thin layer of the Easy Marinara Sauce from the Eating Smart, Being Active Let's Cook! Cookbook, leaving a 1/2 inch crust on all edges.
directions.10: Add the shredded cheese and pizza toppings. Be careful not to put too many toppings on the pizza, or it will be soggy.
directions.11: Bake for approximately 15 minutes until the crust is brown and the cheese melts and is slightly browned in spots.
directions.12: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours. Eat within 3 to 5 days.

ingredients: 1 cup shredded reduced-fat sharp cheddar cheese
Quick and Easy Potato Casserole.notes:
Use regular salt and a dash of garlic powder in place of garlic salt if you like.
To make a Tex-Mex potato casserole, omit Dijon mustard and garlic salt. Layer potatoes with 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chilies and 1/2 cup canned black beans. Use reduced fat cheddar or Mexican cheese blend. Add 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon dried cilantro, and 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin to broth. Cook as directed above. Delicious served with avocado wedges.

Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions

directions.1: Spray an 8-inch microwave-safe baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. Place 1/3 of the potatoes and 1/2 of the onions on the bottom of the dish and sprinkle with 1/3 the cheese and 1/2 the herbs.
directions.2: Repeat layers, then top with the last 1/3 of the potatoes, layering potatoes so that there is a solid layer of potatoes with no gaps; sprinkle with remaining cheese.
directions.3: Stir together stock, Dijon mustard, and garlic salt, and pour over the potatoes.
directions.4: Cover with plastic wrap and microwave on HIGH until internal temperature registers 165 °F on a food thermometer, about 20 minutes.
directions.5: Use oven mitts or a towel to remove dish from microwave; carefully remove cover due to steam build-up and serve.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Over medium high heat cook bacon for 3 to 4 minutes.
directions.3: Add the rest of the ingredients and bring to a boil.
directions.4: Reduce heat to simmer and allow to cook until the peas are tender, about 30 minutes.
directions.5: Serve hot.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Leave frozen corn in the fridge overnight to defrost. If you forget to do this ahead of time, defrost it in the microwave.
directions.3: Drain and rinse the black beans.
directions.4: Combine all ingredients together and serve as a side dish.

ingredients: 1 can tomatoes, low-sodium (14.5 ounce, broken up)
2 cups chicken broth, low-sodium (14.5 ounce can)
Quick Chicken & Vegetable Soup.notes:
Use only cooked chicken for this recipe.
This easy recipe has much less sodium than canned soups.

Learn more about:

Onions
Tomatoes
Potatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put the tomatoes, potatoes and broth in the pot. Cook on medium heat until they boil.
directions.3: Add the onion. Turn the heat to low, and simmer for 10 minutes.
directions.4: Add the remaining ingredients.
directions.5: Cover the pan.
directions.6: Cook for at least 5 more minutes over low heat until vegetables are tender.

ingredients: 1 can kidney beans, low-sodium (15 1/2 ounces, with liquid)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Thoroughly cook ground beef in skillet until browned (internal temperature of 160 °F). Do not undercook ground beef. Carefully wash your hands and any surfaces that have come in contact with raw meat.
directions.3: Drain off fat into container.
directions.4: Stir in kidney beans with liquid, tomato sauce, onion, and chili powder.
directions.5: Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes.
directions.6: Refrigerate or freeze leftovers within 2 hours of cooking. Use refrigerated leftovers within 4 days.

ingredients: 1 can sliced peaches, packed in juice (15 ounce)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 375 °F.
directions.3: Open the can of peaches. Pour the peaches and their juice into the casserole dish. Heat them on the stovetop until they bubble.
directions.4: Slightly beat 1 egg.
directions.5: In a mixing bowl, mix the egg, sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, and margarine.
directions.6: Drop spoonsful of this mixture on top of the hot, bubbling peaches.
directions.7: Use pot holders to carefully remove the casserole dish from the stove.
directions.8: Put the casserole dish in the oven. Bake for about 30 to 40 minutes.

Quick Skillet Lasagna.notes:
To decrease fat and cholesterol, omit the beef and add vegetables such as broccoli or zucchini to the sauce.
Learn more about:

Onions
Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Chop onion. Cook beef and onion, in  a large frying pan until beef is brown and onion is tender. Drain off excess fat.
directions.3: Add tomatoes, tomato paste, parsley, water, and garlic powder to the beef mixture. Bring to a boil and simmer until sauce is thick, about 25 minutes.
directions.4: Cook noodles in a separate saucepan according to package directions. Drain.
directions.5: Add cooked, drained noodles to the beef mixture. Stir to prevent sticking.
directions.6: Mix cheeses and drop by spoonfuls into the frying pan.
directions.7: Cover and heat over low heat about 5 minutes.
directions.8: Refrigerate leftovers.

ingredients: 1 can cream of mushroom soup, low-sodium (10.75 ounce)
1 can tuna (6.5 ounces, packed in water, drained)
Quick Tuna Casserole.notes:
To lower sodium content, use reduced-sodium cream of mushroom soup.
Learn more about:

Peas

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Bring 1 quart of water to a boil in a large pot and cook the egg noodles in the water for 2 minutes.
directions.4: Cover the pot, remove from heat, and let stand for 10 minutes.
directions.5: In the meantime, mix the water, soup, and milk together in a bowl.
directions.6: Combine tuna and peas with the mixture and pour into a 1-quart casserole dish.
directions.7: Drain the noodles well and combine with the tuna mixture.
directions.8: Sprinkle the top with bread crumbs if desired.
directions.9: Bake for 30 minutes.

ingredients: 1 can black beans, low-sodium (15.5 ounce can, rinsed and drained)
Quinoa and Black Bean Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Herbs
Onions
Tomatoes
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Rinse the quinoa in cold water. Boil water in a saucepan, and then add the quinoa.
directions.3: Return to boil, and then simmer until the water is absorbed, 10 to 15 minutes. Cool for 15 minutes.
directions.4: While quinoa is cooking, mix olive oil, lime juice, cumin, coriander, chopped cilantro, and scallions in a small bowl, and set aside.
directions.5: Combine chopped vegetables with the black beans in a large bowl, and set aside.
directions.6: Once quinoa has cooled, combine all ingredients and mix well.
directions.7: Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.

ingredients: 4 medium bell peppers (red, yellow, and orange)
Rainbow Bell Pepper Boats with Garbanzo.notes:
Learn more about:

Bell Peppers
Kale

directions.1: Preheat oven to 375 °F.
directions.2: Cook rice according to package directions.
directions.3: Slice bell peppers in half vertically and remove seeds.
directions.4: Reserve about half of garbanzo beans; mash remaining portion with a fork.
directions.5: Mix rice with kale, garbanzo beans (mashed and whole), nuts, salt, and pepper.
directions.6: Fill peppers with mix; place in baking dish and cover.
directions.7: Bake about 30 minutes.
directions.8: Remove lid and bake more 5 more minutes.

ingredients: 1 can red kidney beans, low-sodium (15.5 ounces, drained and rinsed)
1 can black beans, low-sodium (15.5 ounces, drained and rinsed)
Rainbow Veggie Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Carrots
Squash
Zucchini

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix all the vegetables together in a large bowl.
directions.3: Pour dressing over vegetables.
directions.4: Sprinkle with pepper.
directions.5: Stir gently, coating all vegetables.
directions.6: Cover and refrigerate at least 8 hours.

ingredients: 1 eggplant (peeled and cut into 1 inch cubes)
1 can diced tomatoes, undrained, low-sodium (14.5 ounces)
Ratatouille.notes:
Optional: Use a bag of frozen vegetables. It will be more economical than fresh vegetables and contain less sodium than canned vegetables.
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Bell Peppers
Eggplant
Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in a large saucepan and sauté onion, garlic, bell peppers, and eggplant until tender, about 15 minutes.
directions.3: Add tomatoes and basil, cook about 10 minutes. Add pepper and parsley before serving.
directions.4: Serve hot. Cover and refrigerate within 2 hours.

ingredients: 1 cup frozen spinach (thawed and squeezed to remove excess liquid)
1/2 cup shredded Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese
1 can 15.5 ounce low-sodium red kidney beans (drained and rinsed with cold water)
Red Bean Quesadilla.notes:
Black beans or white cannellini beans can be used instead of kidney beans.
Learn more about:

Spinach
Avocados

directions.1: Using a fork, mash beans in a bowl until slightly chunky. Add no-salt seasonings such as garlic powder and dried or fresh herbs, if desired.
directions.2: Place 1 tortilla on a plate and top with half the mashed beans.
directions.3: Top the beans with 1/2 cup of the spinach.
directions.4: Top the spinach with half the cheese.
directions.5: Top the cheese with half the avocado. (optional)
directions.6: Put the other tortilla on top of the avocado, gently pressing it down so the top half sticks.
directions.7: Repeat with the remaining 2 tortillas.
directions.8: Place a nonstick skillet on the stove over medium and heat until warm, then place 1 quesadilla in the dry skillet. Cook until golden brown, about 1 to 2 minutes on each side. (Or put the plate in the microwave and heat until the cheese melts, about 45 seconds.)
directions.9: Repeat with the remaining quesadilla.
directions.10: Cut each quesadilla into quarters. Serve warm.

ingredients: 1 cup red bell pepper (chopped - could also use green pepper)
Red Beans and Rice.notes:
See how to make this recipe and more on USDA’s MyPlate Kitchen YouTube site. 
Learn more about:

Onions
Celery
Herbs
Garlic
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Pick through beans to remove bad beans. Rinse beans thoroughly.
directions.3: In a 5-quart pot, mix beans, water, onion, celery and bay leaves. Bring to boiling; reduce heat.
directions.4: Cover and cook over low heat for about 1 to 1/2 hours or until beans are tender. Stir and mash beans against side of pan.
directions.5: Add garlic, parsley, thyme, salt, black pepper, and green pepper.
directions.6: Cook uncovered, over low heat, until creamy, about 30 minutes. Remove bay leaves. Serve over hot cooked rice.

ingredients: 2 pounds pork (cut into small pieces save some fat)
3 dried red chiles (more or less depending on taste)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash chilies, removing stems and seeds. Place in blender with 1 cup water and blend into paste.
directions.3: Put pork fat into deep skillet until there is enough on the bottom of the skillet to prevent meat from sticking. Discard remaining fat.
directions.4: Brown pork lightly. Add the chili paste and mix well, adding water if mixture is too thick. Add oregano and garlic. Cover pan and simmer slowly for one hour.

ingredients: 1 tablespoon fresh basil (chopped or 1 tsp dried basil)
1 tablespoon oregano leaves (crushed or 1 tsp dried oregano)
ground red pepper (or cayenne, to taste)
cooked chicken breast (1/2 pound diced into 1/2-inch pieces, optional)
Red Hot Fusilli.notes:
If pre-cooked chicken is not available, cook 3/4 pound raw chicken and chop into 1/2 inch pieces when cooled down.
Learn more about:

Garlic
Herbs
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in a medium saucepan. Saute garlic and parsley until golden.
directions.3: Add tomatoes and spices. Cook uncovered over low heat 15 minutes or until thickened, stirring frequently. If desired, add chicken and continue cooking for 15 minutes until chicken is heated through and sauce is thick.
directions.4: Cook pasta firm in unsalted water.
directions.5: To serve, spoon sauce over pasta and sprinkle with coarsely chopped parsley. Serve hot as a main dish and cold for the next day's lunch.

ingredients: 1 potato, medium grated (about 1/2 pound, peeling is optional)
Parmesan cheese, grated or other cheese (2 tablespoons, optional)
2 tablespoons canola oil (or olive oil, for cooking)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Add the lentils to a medium saucepan and add water to cover by about an inch. Bring to a boil, then lower heat to a simmer and cook until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain and set aside.
directions.3: Meanwhile, remove the excess water from the potato: you can either squeeze it by the handful, or put the entire pile on a clean tea towel and wring it out.
directions.4: Crack the egg in a medium bowl and beat it lightly. Add the potato, cooked lentils, garlic, green onion, and cheese and hot sauce if you're using them in a medium bowl. Add the salt and a good grinding of black pepper, and stir until combined.
directions.5: Heat a large skillet over medium heat, then add a generous drizzle of oil (1-2 tablespoons). Working in batches, so as not to crowd the pan, add clumps of the potato-lentil mixture (about the size of a golf ball or slightly larger works well), and flatten each as soon as it's in the pan, making them about a half inch thick.
directions.6: Cook for about 4 to 5 minutes per side, until the latkes are deeply golden brown and cooked through. Add a little more oil to the pan for each additional batch. Serve immediately or keep the latkes warm in a 200 °F oven for up to an hour.

ingredients: 1 cup water (optional almond milk or coconut milk)
Red Monster Smoothie.notes:
Learn more about:

Kale
Spinach
Strawberries
Bananas
Blueberries
Pineapple
Oranges

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Using a blender, mix the greens and the liquid of your choice.
directions.3: Gradually add in the rest of the ingredients, blending after each addition.
directions.4: Separate into two cups and reserve one serving for later.

ingredients: 6 cups thinly sliced green cabbage (about 1/2 head)
Red Potato and Cabbage (Colcannon).notes:
Use any all-purpose potatoes such as yellow or white. Russet potatoes are also good but you may want to peel through the rough skin after scrubbing them.
Try adding cilantro on top for more flavor.

Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions
Cabbbage

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Scrub potatoes, but do not peel. Cut into quarters. Cook in boiling water or steam until tender, about 15 to 20 minutes.
directions.3: While potatoes cook, heat butter or margarine in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onion and cook until it becomes clear, about 3 to 5 minutes.
directions.4: Add cabbage and cook, stirring occasionally, until cabbage begins to brown, about 4 to 6 minutes.
directions.5: Reduce heat to low. Add milk, salt, and pepper. Cover and cook until cabbage is tender, about 6 to 8 minutes.
directions.6: Drain potatoes. Add cabbage mixture to potatoes. Mash with a potato masher or large fork to reach desired texture. Serve warm.

Red Potato Salad.notes:
Red or white potatoes can be used.
Dijon mustard can be substituted for yellow mustard.

Learn more about:

Potatoes
Celery
Onions

directions.1: To prepare sauce, combine yogurt, mayonnaise and mustard in a small bowl. Mix well and refrigerate.
directions.2: Wash potatoes and place in pot. Cover with water about 1 inch above potatoes.
directions.3: Bring water and potatoes to a boil and simmer until potatoes are fork tender.
directions.4: Drain potatoes and set aside to cool.
directions.5: When potatoes are cooled, cut into bite-sized cubes. Place cut potatoes into large bowl.
directions.6: Add celery, onions, salt, and pepper to potatoes. Top with sauce and mix well.
directions.7: Garnish with parsley and enjoy.

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups dry pinto beans (sorted and rinsed)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook beans and reserve some of the cooking liquid before draining.
directions.3: Sauté onions and garlic in oil until onions become clear. Add a little water if vegetables stick.
directions.4: Mash half of the beans, and add to onion and garlic. Continue to sauté for 10 minutes, stirring frequently. Allow some of the mashed beans to brown.
directions.5: Add cumin. Add remaining beans and continue cooking until they are warmed through.
directions.6: Water or liquid from beans may be added to keep the beans soft and mushy.

Rhubarb Blueberry Crisp.notes:
Try strawberries instead of blueberries.
Try apple, orange, or cranberry blend 100% fruit juice.

Learn more about:

Rhubarb
Blueberries

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: In a medium bowl, stir together brown sugar, flour and oats. Mix in the margarine or butter and set aside.
directions.4: Spread the rhubarb and blueberries in an 8x8 inch baking dish and set aside.
directions.5: In a medium saucepan, mix cornstarch and sugar and stir in the juice. Cook over medium heat, stirring all the time, until the mixture has thickened. Turn off the heat.
directions.6: Stir in vanilla and pour the mixture over the rhubarb and blueberries.
directions.7: Crumble oat mixture on top of the fruit.
directions.8: Bake for 45 minutes or until topping is browned and fruit is bubbling at edges. Serve warm or cold.

ingredients: 1 cup chopped fruit (try a mixture - apples, bananas, raisins, berries, peaches)
2 tablespoons chopped nuts (try walnuts or almonds)
Rice Bowl Breakfast with Fruit and Nuts.notes:
Use any combination of fresh, canned, frozen, and dried fruit in this recipe.
You can use any leftover cooked grain in this recipe. Try white or wild rice, quinoa, barley, or oatmeal.
Skim milk, apples, and walnuts were used for nutrition and cost analysis.
Learn more about fruits and what's in season now.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine cooked rice, milk and cinnamon in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on HIGH for 45 seconds. Stir and heat for another 45 to 60 seconds, or until rice mixture is heated through.
directions.3: Divide rice mixture between two bowls. Top with fruit and nuts. Serve warm.
directions.4: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours.

ingredients: 1 cup crushed pineapple in juice (8 ounce can)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put aside 1/4 cup of drained pineapple.
directions.3: Mix all other ingredients together in a medium-sized bowl.
directions.4: Serve in small dishes.
directions.5: Top with the remaining crushed pineapple.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In sauce pan, heat milk and water.
directions.3: Add rice, bring to boil, lower heat to simmer; stir mixture every 10 minutes. Cook uncovered until rice is tender, about 30 minutes.
directions.4: In large bowl, mix eggs, 3/4 cup evaporated milk, vanilla, and sugar. Set aside.
directions.5: Add remaining 1/4 cup evaporated milk to rice mixture.
directions.6: Spoon 1 cup of rice mixture into egg mixture and stir. Pour egg-rice mixture into remaining rice.
directions.7: Heat pudding until it boils, stirring continuously. Remove from heat, and sprinkle with cinnamon.

Rice Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Peas
Celery
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix rice, vegetables, and raisins in a medium-sized bowl.
directions.3: Mix mayonnaise, dressing and salt in a small bowl. Stir into rice/vegetable mixture.
directions.4: Refrigerate leftovers.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oven to 350 °F. Grease a 12-inch pizza pan or baking sheet.
directions.3: Cook rice following directions on the package; set aside.
directions.4: Grate cheese; set aside.
directions.5: Crack egg and place in mixing bowl, stirring to blend. Measure and add 2 cups cooked rice, 1 cup grated cheese, and salt. Mix well to combine ingredients.
directions.6: Spread rice mixture in prepared pan, pressing firmly and making outer edge slightly raised.
directions.7: Spread tomato purée evenly over rice mixture.
directions.8: Place pan in oven. Bake for 25 minutes.
directions.9: Remove pan from oven sprinkle pizza with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes longer or until cheese melts.
directions.10: Remove pizza from oven. Cut into 12 slices.

ingredients: 1 cup pear halves (canned, drained and sliced)
Rise and Shine Cobbler.notes:
Learn more about:

Peaches
Pears
Oranges

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large microwave-safe bowl, mix peaches, pears, prunes, and vanilla extract.
directions.3: Rub an orange against a grater to remove 1 teaspoon of the orange peel. Then, cut the orange in half and squeeze 1/4 cup orange juice. Add orange peel and juice to fruit mixture. Stir.
directions.4: Top with granola.
directions.5: Microwave on high for 5 minutes. Let stand for 2 minutes.
directions.6: Spoon into 4 bowls and serve warm.

Roast Chicken.notes:
For more flavor, try other seasonings like 1 teaspoon rosemary or thyme.
Serve with mashed sweet potatoes.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 375 °F.
directions.3: Combine Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, and pepper (optional).
directions.4: Rub chicken with oil, then rub with spice mixture.
directions.5: Place chicken, breast side down, in roasting pan or Dutch oven.
directions.6: Bake, uncovered, until internal temperature reaches at least 165 °F.
directions.7: Let chicken rest for 10 minutes before cutting.

ingredients: 3 pounds turkey breast half (with skin and bones)
chicken broth, low sodium (or margarine, for basting, optional)
Roast Turkey Breast with Rosemary, Sage,.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Carrots
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Place turkey breast in roasting pan along with onion and carrot.
directions.4: Mix spices with olive oil. Rub turkey with olive oil.
directions.5: Roast turkey at 400 °F for 15 minutes. Baste with margarine and chicken broth (optional).
directions.6: Reduce turkey temperature to 350 °F and roast turkey, basting every 20 minutes with pan juices (or margarine and chicken broth), about 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until meat thermometer inserted in thick part of meat registers 165 °F.
directions.7: Remove to carving board and let rest for 10 minutes.

Roasted Bell Peppers.notes:
No Italian seasoning? Use 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon dried basil, and 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder.
Learn more about:

Bell Peppers
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 450 °F.
directions.3: Wash bell peppers and remove tops and seeds. Cut peppers in half and rub with vegetable oil. Place cut side up on a rimmed baking sheet and sprinkle with Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
directions.4: Roast until peppers are tender and blistered in spots, about 30 to 35 minutes.

Roasted Brussels Sprouts.notes:
Try adding other seasonings with the lemon juice such as red pepper flakes or parmesan cheese.
Learn more about:

Brussels Sprouts
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Wash and trim Brussels sprouts. Cut large Brussels sprouts in half from top to bottom; leave small Brussels sprouts whole.
directions.4: In a large bowl, toss Brussels sprouts with the oil, salt, and pepper.
directions.5: Place Brussels sprouts in a single layer on a large baking sheet. Lining the baking sheet with foil or baking parchment will help with clean-up.
directions.6: Roast for 20 to 30 minutes, stirring once after 10 to 15 minutes. Sprouts should be tender and browned.
directions.7: Remove from oven and drizzle with lemon juice.

ingredients: 3 cups Brussels sprouts (fresh or frozen halved vertically, about 3/4 pound)
1/2 cup non-fat ricotta cheese (or cottage cheese)
Roasted Brussels Sprouts, Potatoes, and.notes:
Serve with 8 ounce non-fat milk and orange slices.
Learn more about:

Brussels Sprouts
Potatoes
Onions
Garlic

directions.1: Preheat oven to 325 °F.
directions.2: In a 2 quart baking dish coated with cooking spray, toss Brussels sprouts, potatoes, onion, and garlic with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper.
directions.3: In a small bowl, mix cheese with milk.
directions.4: Coat chicken breasts with remaining olive oil.
directions.5: Nest among vegetables in baking dish.
directions.6: Top with cheese mix.
directions.7: Cover with foil and bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until chicken is done.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Remove outer leaves of cauliflower. Cut florets off the stem. Wash and drain.
directions.3: Combine oil, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Toss the cauliflower florets in the oil mixture.
directions.4: Spread cauliflower on a large rimmed baking sheet.
directions.5: Roast in the oven at 450 °F for 15 to 20 minutes until the cauliflower starts to soften and begins to brown.
directions.6: Sprinkle with cheese. Continue to roast for 5 to 10 minutes.

Roasted Cauliflower Steaks.notes:
Try other seasonings such as cumin, oregano, and cayenne pepper or basil, thyme, and red pepper flakes.
Serve steaks topped with tomato or other sauce.
Freeze extra lemon juice to use later.
To roast florets rather than steaks: In a large bowl, mix all ingredients and pour onto a large baking sheet. Roast 20 to 30 minutes or until browned and tender.

Learn more about:

Cauliflower
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Lightly grease a large baking sheet.
directions.4: Slice cauliflower from top to bottom through the core into 1- to 1 1/2- inch thick steaks. Put steaks on the baking sheet along with end pieces, flat side down.
directions.5: In a small bowl, mix the rest of the ingredients, except cheese.
directions.6: Spoon on and spread or brush the cauliflower with half the mixture. Roast for 20 minutes.
directions.7: Remove baking sheet from the oven, carefully turn the steaks and spread the rest of the mixture. Roast for 15 to 20 minutes or until the cauliflower is browned and tender.
directions.8: Sprinkle with cheese, if desired, and serve.

ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) garbanzo beans, low-sodium (drained and rinsed)
spices of your choice, optional (try garlic, paprika, sage, etc.)
Roasted Chickpeas (Garbanzo Beans).notes:
Cool thoroughly before storing in a tightly covered container.
Eat by the 1/4 cup handful, or sprinkle on salads and other dishes for a nice crunch!
Optional: Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese during the last 10 minutes of baking. But don’t do this earlier, as it can cause chickpeas to burn.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Drain and rinse the beans until there is no foamy residue. Pick out the skins and discard. Wrap the drained beans in a clean towel to dry thoroughly.
directions.4: Measure oil into a 9x13 baking dish or foil lined pan. Pour beans into dish, sprinkle with salt and spices. Mix oil and spices well to coat all the beans.
directions.5: Bake for 45 to 60 minutes, stirring or shaking every 15 minutes. Longer makes more crunch, but watch to prevent burning!

ingredients: 1 pound potatoes (3 medium or 3 cups cubed)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 450 °F.
directions.3: Coat a baking sheet with vegetable cooking spray.
directions.4: Wash and peel the potatoes.
directions.5: Cut the potatoes into 1/2-inch cubes, and put them in a large bowl.
directions.6: Put the oil, rosemary, and salt in a small bowl. Stir together.
directions.7: Pour the oil mix over the potatoes. Stir to coat the potatoes evenly.
directions.8: Spread the potatoes on the baking sheet.
directions.9: Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until lightly browned.

ingredients: 1/2 cup green pepper, chopped into 1-inch cubes
Roasted Potatoes.notes:
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions
Bell Peppers
Garlic
Herbs

directions.1: In a medium-sized bowl, mix potatoes, onions, green peppers, and garlic.
directions.2: Add vegetable oil, salt, and pepper to bowl. If using parsley and paprika, add that too. Mix well.
directions.3: Cover bowl and refrigerate for 15 minutes.
directions.4: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.5: Spread potato mixture evenly on a cookie sheet. Bake for about 35 minutes. Serve hot.

ingredients: 2 cups crispy rice or wheat cereal squares

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix all ingredients together and serve.

ingredients: 4 root vegetables (choose a variety from potatoes, rutabagas, turnips, parsnips, beets, sweet potatoes, etc.) (medium)
Roasted Root Vegetables.notes:
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Rutabagas
Turnips
Parsnips
Beets
Sweet Potatoes and Yams
Carrots
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Cut vegetables into large chunks.
directions.4: Place in a medium-sized bowl and pour oil over top. Add seasonings or Parmesan and mix well.
directions.5: Spread an even layer on a baking sheet or pan.
directions.6: Bake for 1 hour or until tender. Check a few vegetables to see if they are tender.

Roasted Tomatoes with Herbs.notes:
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Herbs
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 425 °F.
directions.3: Spray a large baking sheet with cooking oil spray.
directions.4: Cut each tomato in half. Place tomatoes on the sheet, cut side up.
directions.5: Drizzle tomatoes with 1/2 of the oil and season with pepper.
directions.6: Cook for 30 minutes, or until tomatoes are beginning to brown on the bottom.
directions.7: Mix the remaining oil, parsley, garlic, and cheese in a small bowl.
directions.8: Remove tomatoes from the oven and sprinkle the herb mixture over the tomatoes.
directions.9: Return to oven for another 10 minutes, or until spices begin to brown.

ingredients: 1 can tomatoes, low-sodium (peeled and whole, 14.5 ounces)
Round Steak Casserole.notes:
Menu Idea: round steak casserole, canned pears, lowfat milk
Learn more about:

Onions
Potatoes
Green Beans
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Season round steak lightly with garlic salt, salt and pepper.
directions.3: Cut into serving pieces and place in crock pot with sliced onion, which has been separated into rings.
directions.4: Add potatoes and green beans.
directions.5: Top with tomato soup and tomatoes.
directions.6: Cover and cook on Low for 8 hours.
directions.7: Remove cover during last half-hour if there is too much liquid.
directions.8: To cook in 2-quart crock pot, reduce ingredients slightly.

ingredients: 1 cup onions, cut into slivers or thin slices
1 cup cabbage, cut into slivers or thin slices
1/2 cup carrots, cut into very thin slices
Salata Ma Jibna (Salad with Parmesan Che.notes:
Salata Ma Jibna is a Sudanese dish.
Learn more about:

Onions
Cabbage
Carrots
Tomatoes
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a salad bowl, combine onions, cabbage, carrots, and tomatoes.
directions.3: Toss with olive oil, lemon juice, vinegar, salt, and pepper.
directions.4: Sprinkle garlic and Parmesan over salad.

ingredients: 1 can salmon, 16 ounces (OR two 5 oz cans of tuna in water, drained)
Salmon Burgers.notes: *Dry bread crumbs, crushed unsweetened cereal, or uncooked oatmeal can be used instead of cracker crumbs.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large bowl, mix all ingredients together. Mixture will be moist.
directions.3: Spray a large skillet with non-stick cooking spray. Heat skillet. Drop fish mixture onto the skillet using a 1/3 or 1/2 cup measuring cup. Brown on both sides.

Salmon Burgers and Sweet Potato Oven Fri.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with a glass of 100% berry juice blend.
Learn more about:

Sweet Potatoes
Onions
Bell Peppers
Lemons
Lettuce
Tomatoes

directions.1: Place oven rack in center, heat oven to 425 °F.
directions.2: Wash and scrub sweet potatoes, slice into wedges, length-wise.
directions.3: In a large bowl, toss potato wedges with canola oil and seasoning.
directions.4: Spread on cookie sheet. Roast in the oven, turning occasionally, until tender and golden brown, about 30 to 40 minutes.
directions.5: While sweet potatoes are roasting, prepare salmon burgers. Drain salmon; place in a medium mixing bowl and flake.
directions.6: Fold in green onions and red pepper, crushed crackers, lemon juice, egg whites, and yogurt.
directions.7: Shape into 4 patties.
directions.8: Coat large nonstick skillet lightly with cooking spray; heat.
directions.9: Cook salmon burgers until golden brown, turn, and continue cooking until other side is golden brown.
directions.10: Serve burgers with sliced tomatoes and lettuce, and sweet potato oven fries.

Salmon Loaf.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Celery
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 325 °F.
directions.3: Drain salmon and remove skin if desired. Mash bones with meat.
directions.4: Add the other ingredients.
directions.5: Add enough milk so that the mixture is moist but not runny.
directions.6: Place in a lightly oiled 9x5 inch loaf pan.
directions.7: Bake for 45 minutes.
directions.8: Serve.

ingredients: 1/3 cup bread crumbs or cracker crumbs
Salmon Patties.notes:
Other optional additions to patties: 1/2 teaspoon lemon pepper, 1/4 cup finely minced celery, 1 tablespoon finely minced bell pepper, 1/3 cup chopped onion, and/or 4 green onions, finely chopped.
Be Creative! Top with salsa or Pico de Gallo!

Learn more about:

Celery
Green Peppers
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash fresh vegetables (if using).
directions.3: Collect, mince, and measure all ingredients before starting to prepare the recipe.
directions.4: Open salmon, and drain liquid into a liquid measuring cup. Add lemon juice and cold water to the salmon liquid to make 1/2 cup liquid total, and set aside.
directions.5: Put the salmon in a separate mixing bowl. Mix in the celery (if using), green pepper (if using), and onion.
directions.6: In another small bowl, beat the eggs. Then, add them to the salmon mixture.
directions.7: Add the bread or cracker crumbs, flour, pepper, and the salmon liquid mixture to the salmon mixture, and stir until all ingredients are mixed together.
directions.8: Use 1/3 cup measuring cup to measure salmon mixture. Shape into a 1/2 inch thick patty, and place on a plate. Repeat to make 6 patties.
directions.9: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, then add 3 patties.
directions.10: Cook for about 2 to 3 minutes (or until golden brown) on each side.
directions.11: Remove patties from skillet, and place on a clean paper towel-lined plate to drain. Cook remaining 3 patties, then serve immediately. Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours. Eat within 3 to 5 days.

ingredients: 4 green onion (chopped, or 1/4 cup onion, or onion powder to taste)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Drain salmon and flake with a fork into a bowl.
directions.3: Mix in all other ingredients.
directions.4: Serve on bread, crackers, or a rice cake.
directions.5: Sprinkle chopped parsley to garnish.

Salsa Fresca.notes:
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Garlic
Onions
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash the vegetables. Cut the tomatoes into 1/2-inch pieces and put into a medium-sized bowl. Because they can burn the skin, an adult should seed and mince the jalapeños and add them to the tomatoes.
directions.3: Peel the garlic and mince. Peel the onion and cut into 1/4-inch pieces. Add the onion and garlic to the tomato mixture.
directions.4: Stir in the lime juice, salt, and pepper. Chop the cilantro and stir only until combined.

ingredients: 1 clove garlic (minced, or 1/8 teaspoon garlic powder)
2 cans pinto beans, low-sodium (15 ounces each, drained and rinsed)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat.
directions.3: Add the onion and garlic and cook until tender.
directions.4: Stir in the beans and salsa.
directions.5: Cook for 10 minutes.
directions.6: Serve over rice, pasta, or baked potato.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix all ingredients in a small bowl, using a spoon.
directions.3: Place mix into a container that allows you to shake to dispense.

ingredients: 1 can chunk light tuna (in water, 6.5 ounce can)
Sanchico Tuna Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Onions
Avocados
Mangos

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Drain tuna. Transfer to a mixing bowl and mix well with avocado for texture.
directions.3: Add tomatoes, onion, pepper, lime juice, salt, and mango.

Sarah\u2019s Green Bean Casserole.notes:
Learn more about:

Green Beans
Onions
Mushrooms

directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 °F.
directions.2: Blanch the green beans in boiling water for about 4 minutes for crisper beans or longer for a softer texture. Then plunge in ice water. Drain and set aside.
directions.3: Place diced onions and mushrooms in a microwaveable bowl and microwave for about 2 1/2 minutes on high to soften. Set aside.
directions.4: Melt the butter over medium heat. Once melted, stir in flour with a whisk and cook for about 1 minute (continuously whisking).
directions.5: Whisk in the milk and cook over low heat until you have a thick white sauce.
directions.6: Stir in Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, black pepper, and salt.
directions.7: Stir the drained green beans, onions, and mushrooms into the white sauce (including any liquid with the onions and mushrooms).
directions.8: Pour into a casserole dish sprayed with nonstick spray. Crush the crackers and toss cracker crumbs with olive oil and onion powder. Sprinkle over the top of the casserole.
directions.9: Bake at 350 °F for about 30 minutes or until crackers are golden brown.

Sarah\u2019s Spicy Curry Turkey Soup.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Celery
Carrots
Spinach
Potatoes
Cranberries

directions.1: Heat the olive oil and butter in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion and celery and cook for about 7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
directions.2: Stir in flour, curry powder, and cinnamon and cook for 2 to 3 minutes, stirring constantly.
directions.3: Pour in chicken broth and scrape up any brown bits at the bottom of the pan.
directions.4: Bring to a simmer. Then add carrots, spinach, potatoes, and turkey.
directions.5: Bring to a boil. Then reduce the heat to low.
directions.6: Simmer (covered) for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
directions.7: Serve in bowls and garnish with a spoonful of cranberry sauce.

ingredients: 2 cans sardines, water packed (4 oz cans, drained)
1 red or white onion (peeled and thinly sliced)
Sardine, Cucumber, and Tomato Sandwich.notes:
Canned tuna or salmon can be used instead of sardines
Learn more about:

Cucumbers
Lemons
Tomatoes
Onions

directions.1: Put 4 slices toasted bread on the cutting board. Arrange cucumber slices on top of each slice.
directions.2: Distribute the sardines evenly on top of the cucumber and using the fork, gently mash them. Spread the mashed sardines to cover the cucumber. Squeeze the lemon juice over the sardines.
directions.3: Put the tomato slices on top of the sardines. Add the red onion. Top with the remaining slices of toast and press down gently to hold the sandwich together.
directions.4: Cut the sandwich in half and serve right away.

ingredients: 4 cups chopped beet greens (2 bunches with stems removed)
2 cloves garlic, minced or 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
Saut\u00e9ed Beet Greens.notes:
No beet greens? Use other leafy greens such as mustard greens or chard.
Learn more about:

Beets
Garlic
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in a medium-sized pan over medium heat.
directions.3: Add the beet greens and garlic to the pan. Stir until just wilted, then reduce the heat to low and stir occasionally until soft, about 5 to 8 minutes.
directions.4: Stir in lemon juice, red pepper flakes, and salt. Serve right away or use in another recipe.

ingredients: 1 clove garlic, minced (or 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder)
1 medium cauliflower (grated or finely chopped, 4 to 5 cups)
1 tablespoon lemon juice or lime juice (optional)
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley or cilantro (optional)
Saut\u00e9ed Cauliflower Rice.notes:
