Use as a side dish or as a base for stir-fries, chili, or anything you might eat with rice.
Add any sautéed or roasted vegetables.
Top with grated or crumbled cheese.
Freeze extra lemon or lime juice to use later.

Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Cauliflower
Lemons
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in a large skillet or saucepan on medium heat. Add onion and cook until soft, 3 to 5 minutes.
directions.3: Add garlic, cauliflower, salt, and pepper. Stir until cauliflower is tender, 3 to 5 minutes.
directions.4: Stir in lemon juice and sprinkle with parsley, if desired. Serve warm.

ingredients: 2 walleye fillets (4–6 ounces each), thawed and patted dry
1 teaspoon chopped fresh tarragon or parsley (or 1/2 teaspoon dried)
Saut\u00e9ed Walleye with Tarragon.notes:
This recipe contains one or more ingredients considered to be traditional or indigenous to Native American communities in certain regions across North America.
Learn more about:

Herbs
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Season walleye on the flesh side with salt and pepper.
directions.3: Sprinkle with tarragon or parsley and press lightly into the flesh to help it stick.
directions.4: Melt the butter in a pan over medium high heat.
directions.5: Place the fillets seasoned side down in the pan, tilting the pan to make sure the butter surrounds the fillets, and cook for about 3 minutes.
directions.6: Gently flip the fillets and cook on the second side, about 2 minutes. Walleye should reach a final internal cook temperature of 145 °F as measured with a food thermometer before serving.
directions.7: Plate and serve immediately with lemon wedges.

ingredients: 1 cup lima beans (frozen, cooked and drained)
1 3/4 cups corn (15 1/2 ounce can, low-sodium, drained)
1 can tomatoes, low-sodium (14 1/2 ounce, broken up)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Brown ground beef in pan. Drain excess liquid.
directions.3: Add remaining ingredients except nutmeg. Cover and simmer 5 minutes or until thoroughly heated.
directions.4: Sprinkle with nutmeg before serving.

ingredients: 1/2 cup shredded low-sodium mozzarella or cheddar cheese
Savory Bread Pudding with Kale and Butte.notes:
It is important to use stale bread that has dried out. If you don’t have stale bread, put fresh bread in a preheated 250 °F oven and bake until dried, usually about 15 minutes.
Learn more about:

Onions
Kale
Butternut Squash

directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 °F. Lightly grease a 2-quart baking pan.
directions.2: Put a skillet over medium heat and when it is hot, add the oil. Add the onion and cook about 10 minutes, until tender.
directions.3: While the onion is cooking, put eggs and milk in a bowl and mix until combined.
directions.4: Add the cheese, bread, kale, squash, and salt and mix well. Let the mixture stand at least 15 minutes until the bread absorbs most of the milk.
directions.5: When the onion has finished cooking, add it to the bread mixture and mix well.
directions.6: Pour the mixture into the prepared pan and transfer to the oven.
directions.7: Bake uncovered for 50 to 60 minutes until lightly browned and set. Let stand 15 minutes before serving.

Savory Meatloaf Muffins.notes:
Combine meatloaf ingredients until well mixed, but don't over mix; too much mixing can make a meatloaf tough.
Safety Tip: Cook your meatloaves to 160 °F. Use a meat thermometer to test the temperature. You will know that your loaves will be completely and safely cooked without being dried out from overheating.

Learn more about:

Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Combine all ingredients and mix well.
directions.4: Spoon mixture and divide evenly into 12 greased muffin cups.
directions.5: Bake for 1 hour, or until temperature in center of meatloaf is 160 °F.
directions.6: Cool slightly before removing from muffin cups.

ingredients: 4 1/2 cups brown rice (cooked in unsalted water)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook rice according to directions on the package.
directions.3: Combine the cooked rice, scallions, and bouillon granules and mix well.
directions.4: Measure 1-cup portions and serve.

Scalloped Potatoes.notes:
Leave potato skins on for more nutrition!
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash potatoes; peel and slice into thin slices.
directions.3: Melt 1 tablespoon of margarine in heavy, deep skillet. Remove skillet from heat; spread half of potato slices in skillet.
directions.4: Cover potatoes with onions. Sprinkle half of flour and pepper over potato mixture.
directions.5: Add remaining potato slices, flour, and pepper. Cut 1 tablespoon of margarine into small pieces and place on top of potato mixture.
directions.6: Pour milk over potato mixture; bring to boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium low, cover, and cook until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes.

Scalloped Potatoes and Chicken with Fenn.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serving with 8 ounce glass of sparkling water and 1/2 orange, sliced.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Garlic

directions.1: Place rack in center of oven and preheat to 350 °F.
directions.2: Leaving skin on, thinly slice potatoes.
directions.3: Cut stalks and fronds from fennel bulb. Discard stalk. Thinly slice fennel bulb. Chop fennel fronts and set aside.
directions.4: Place potato and fennel slices in 2-quart covered baking dish, and add water to cover vegetables. Cover with lid and microwave on high for about 5 minutes. Let cool slightly and drain vegetables into a colander.
directions.5: Wipe baking dish dry and spray with cooking spray. Add vegetables back to dish and sprinkle with minced garlic.
directions.6: Cut chicken breasts in half (total of four pieces). Place atop the potato-fennel mix.
directions.7: In a bowl, mix melted margarine and flour into a smooth paste. Add 1 1/4 cups skim milk, salt, and pepper, stir until smooth. Pour over chicken, potatoes, and fennel. Cover baking dish and place in oven. Bake about 30 minutes.
directions.8: Mix remaining milk with sour cream. Increases oven temperature to 425 °F. Remove dish from oven. Spread with sour cream mixture and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and fennel fronds. Return to oven uncovered and bake an additional 10 minutes until top is golden and bubbling. Internal temperature of chicken should be 165 °F.

ingredients: 6 russet potatoes, medium, 3 to 4 inch (peeled and sliced into 1/4 inch slices)
Scalloped Potatoes II.notes:
Leave potato skins on for more nutrition!
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Prepare a large casserole baking pan by coating lightly with oil or cooking oil spray.
directions.3: Place a layer of potatoes in pan, using approximately 1/4 of potatoes.
directions.4: Sprinkle layer with 1/4 cup chopped raw onion, 1/2 tablespoon margarine, 1 tablespoon flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and sprinkling of black pepper.
directions.5: Repeat layers, making a total of 4.
directions.6: Meanwhile heat milk over low heat.
directions.7: Pour warm milk over all ingredients in casserole dish.
directions.8: Bake at 350 °F for 1 hour.
directions.9: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours.

Scrambled Tofu.notes:
Optional ingredients: garlic, watercress, mushrooms, cheese, bell peppers, green onions, and chop suey mix.
Learn more about:

Garlic
Mushrooms
Bell Pepper
Green Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Drain tofu.
directions.3: In small bowl, dice or mash tofu. For optional ingredients, crush garlic and/or slice watercress, mushrooms, cheese, bell peppers, and green onions.
directions.4: In a pan, melt butter. Add tofu. Add bean sprouts and optional ingredients. Saute over medium heat until lightly browned.
directions.5: Beat eggs and add to tofu mixture. Cook until firm.
directions.6: Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.
directions.7: Stir and cook until firm.

ingredients: 8 cups kale or collard greens (1 1/2 pounds)
Seared Greens.notes:
You can also try this recipe using turnip greens, mustard greens, spinach, swiss chard, or beet greens.
Learn more about:

Collard Greens
Kale
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Clean the greens thoroughly and cut stems away. Dry well and tear into salad pieces or slice across leaf into 1/2 inch pieces.
directions.3: In a large deep pot or skillet with a cover, sauté garlic in oil. Add greens in pan with 1 cup water.
directions.4: Cover pan and steam for 4 minutes.
directions.5: Uncover, stir constantly until greens shrink. Add salt and pepper and continue to stir on high until mixture is thoroughly wet.
directions.6: Sprinkle cider vinegar on mixture. Cover.
directions.7: Turn off heat. Let stand until ready to serve.

ingredients: 1/2 bell pepper (green or red - washed, seeded, and sliced)
1/4 cup Italian salad dressing (reduced calorie, fat free)
Seasoned Roasted Vegetables.notes:
Learn more about:

Zucchini
Yellow Squash
Potatoes
Onions
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Stir vegetables and dressing in large bowl.
directions.4: Spread vegetables in the center sheet of aluminum foil on top of baking sheet.
directions.5: Bring together and seal to make packet.
directions.6: Bake for 20 to 30 minutes.

ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, 90% lean (browned and drained)
Sensational Six-Layer Dinner.notes:
For variation, use peas or corn instead of green beans. Use your favorite cream soup instead of tomato soup.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Carrots
Onions
Green Beans
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Lightly oil or spray baking dish with cooking spray.
directions.3: Layer ingredients in order given. Cover.
directions.4: Bake at 350 °F for 45 minutes or until tender and thoroughly heated.
directions.5: Uncover and bake 15 more minutes.

ingredients: 4 cloves garlic, minced or 1 teaspoon garlic powder
Sesame Turnips and Carrots.notes:
Honey is not recommended for children under 1 year old.
Learn more about:

Turnips
Carrots
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a skillet on medium-high heat, add oil and sauté turnips, carrots, and salt until vegetables begin to soften.
directions.3: Stir in garlic and sesame seeds and cook until vegetables begin to brown.
directions.4: Stir in honey. Serve warm.

ingredients: 1 carton pudding mix (3 1/2 ounce box, instant vanilla)
2 bananas, peeled and sliced (or other sliced fruit)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place 2 cups of milk in a quart jar with tight-fitting lid.
directions.3: Add one small package of instant vanilla pudding mix to the jar; screw lid on jar.
directions.4: Shake until mixture is smooth.
directions.5: Place pieces of fruit in a serving bowl or paper cups.
directions.6: Pour pudding over fruit and chill.

ingredients: 1 can vegetable broth, low sodium (14.5 ounces)
Shepherd's Pie.notes:
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Green Beans
Corn
Carrots
Peas

directions.1: Place diced potatoes in saucepan. Cover with water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer (about 15 minutes).
directions.2: Drain potatoes and mash. Stir in milk and set aside.
directions.3: Preheat oven to 375 °F.
directions.4: Brown turkey in a large skillet. Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
directions.5: Add vegetables and broth. Bring to a slow boil.
directions.6: Spoon vegetable-meat mixture into an 8-inch square baking dish. Spread potatoes over mixture. Bake 25 minutes.
directions.7: Serve hot. Garnish with shredded cheese (optional).

ingredients: 4 winter squash (1 1/4 pounds of butternut, acorn, or pumpkin)
Shirini.notes:
Shirin means "sweet" in Kurdish. Shirini is a dessert commonly made with milk, dates, cashews, cardamom, and butter.
Food Safety Tips: Always wash squash, melons, or gourds even if the rind is not to be used. When cut, dirt and microorganisms on the outside could transfer inside to the flesh.

Learn more about:

Winter Squash
Pumpkins

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Boil the sugar and water until it forms a thick syrup.
directions.3: Wash the pumpkin, peel it, remove the seeds, cut into pieces, and cook in the syrup until it is very thick and almost all absorbed.
directions.4: Arrange the pumpkin on a plate and decorate with walnuts and cinnamon (optional).

ingredients: 3 pounds lamb bones (or lean beef ribs)
1/2 pound carrots, peeled and cut into chunks
Shorba (Lamb and Peanut Soup).notes:
Shorba is a Sudanese dish based around lamb. In Sudan, lamb bones commonly are used to flavor the soup-like dish.
Learn more about:

Onions
Carrots
Cabbage
Green Beans
Garlic
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a 6-quart saucepan, simmer lamb bones in 2 quarts of water and 2 teaspoons of salt (optional) for one hour.
directions.3: Add onions, carrots, cabbage, string beans, and garlic.
directions.4: Simmer for one hour until vegetables are thoroughly cooked.
directions.5: Remove lamb bones and purée the mixture.
directions.6: Add 4 tablespoons peanut butter thinned with lemon juice.
directions.7: Add cooked rice (optional).
directions.8: Add salt and pepper to taste.

ingredients: 1 container ricotta cheese (part-skim, 15 ounces or cottage cheese)
Short Cut Lasagna.notes:
Add browned, drained meat or cooked vegetables if desired. Mix with middle layer of sauce. Spinach would make a fantastic addition.

Spinach

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Spready 1/2 the sauce on the bottom of a 2-quart baking dish or pan.
directions.3: Layer half the dry noodles, ricotta, and Parmesan.
directions.4: Top with 1 cup sauce and layer rest of the noodles, ricotta, and mozzarella.
directions.5: Top with remaining spaghetti sauce.
directions.6: Bake 60 minutes at 350 °F. Remove and let is set for 20 minutes. Top with Parmesan cheese.

ingredients: 1/2 pound frozen cooked cocktail shrimp (thawed, peeled, and deveined)
1 8-oz can yellow corn kernels (no salt added, drained)
1 cup canned black beans (no salt added, drained and rinsed)
4 leaves Bibb lettuce or other leaf lettuce
Shrimp Confetti Salad Sandwich with Grap.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with a glass of non-fat milk and a red grape cluster.
Tips for selecting and storing grapes:

Grapes are fully ripe when they arrive at the supermarket.
Look for plump grapes with pliable green stems.
Keep grapes unwashed and refrigerated in a plastic bag until ready for use. Then rinse with cold water and serve, or add to recipes.



Learn more about:

Corn
Celery
Onions
Tomatoes
Lettuce

directions.1: Chop shrimp coarsely.
directions.2: Mix together shrimp salad ingredients (everything except for the bread, tomato slices, and lettuce).
directions.3: Divide salad evenly among 4 slices of bread; spread to edges of bread.
directions.4: Top with tomato slices, lettuce, and second bread slice.

ingredients: 2 cups beans, dried - pinto, black, or pink (rinsed)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place beans, water, onion, and bay leaf in a large pot.
directions.3: Cover and bring to a boil over high heat.
directions.4: Reduce heat to low. Simmer for 1 to 1 1/2 hours or until beans are tender.
directions.5: Remove bay leaf and stir in salt. Cook 15 minutes longer.
directions.6: Top each serving of simmered beans with 1/2 cup fresh salsa, or store beans in refrigerator for up to 3 days in a covered plastic or glass container.

ingredients: 1 pound cod or white fish fillets (cut into 1 inch pieces)
Simple Fish Tacos.notes:
Learn more about:

Herbs
Lemons
Cabbage
Tomatoes
Limes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a small bowl, combine sour cream, mayonnaise, cilantro, and 2 tablespoons seasoning mix.
directions.3: In a medium bowl, combine cod, vegetable oil, lemon juice, and remaining seasoning mix; pour into large skillet. Cook stirring constantly, over medium-high heat for 4 to 5 minutes or until cod flakes easily when tested with a fork.
directions.4: Fill warm tortillas with fish mixture.
directions.5: Top with cabbage, tomato, sour cream mixture, lime wedges, and taco sauce.

ingredients: 1 cup low fat milk (or optional coconut milk or almond milk)
1 cup frozen fruit (all one fruit or a combination of mixed frozen fruit)
Simple Green Smoothie.notes:
Consume within 24 hours.
Learn more about:

Kale
Spinach
Bananas
Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a blender, blend the kale or spinach and the liquid of your choice.
directions.3: Add in the rest of the ingredients, blending after each item.
directions.4: Serve and enjoy, cold.
directions.5: Reserve the leftover smoothie in the refrigerator for later in the day or the next day.

ingredients: 1 can black beans, low sodium (15 ounces)
Simple Stuffed Peppers.notes:
Green bell peppers used for nutritional analysis and costing purposes.
Learn more about:

Bell Peppers
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Cook brown rice according to package directions.
directions.4: Wash the peppers under running water.
directions.5: Cut the tops off the peppers and spoon out the seeds.
directions.6: Drain and rinse the black beans.
directions.7: Combine the beans, rice, salsa, and salt (optional).
directions.8: Spoon about 3 tablespoons of the mixture into the bottom of each pepper.
directions.9: Place a slice of tomato on top of the mixture and sprinkle with 2 tablespoons of cheese.
directions.10: Repeat steps 8 and 9 to fill the pepper completely, but do not top with cheese.
directions.11: Bake peppers for 30 minutes.
directions.12: Top each pepper with 2 tablespoons of cheese and continue baking for 15 minutes more.

Kale

directions.1: Wash kale. Set aside to drain water off.
directions.2: Cut tomatoes in half and lightly toss in bowl with balsamic vinegar, oil, and pinch of salt and pepper. Set aside.
directions.3: In a salad bowl, mix tuna and juice from the can gently with the squeeze of 1/2 lemon and a pinch of pepper.
directions.4: Massage kale for about 3 minutes to soften it.
directions.5: Add the kale and 1/2 the tomatoes to the tuna. Gently toss until all is coated with dressing.
directions.6: Add remaining tomatoes.
directions.7: Squeeze remaining lemon all over and serve.

Skillet Catfish.notes:
Use cod or tilapia instead of catfish.
Learn more about:

Herbs
Lemons
Limes

directions.1: Make the spice rub. Put the cornmeal, oregano, cayenne pepper, thyme, paprika, salt, and pepper on a plate and combine well.
directions.2: Dredge both sides of the catfish in the spice mixture.
directions.3: Put the skillet on the stove and turn the heat to high.
directions.4: When the skillet is hot, add the oil. Add the fish and cook about 4 minutes on each side, until browned and cooked throughout.
directions.5: Serve right away garnished with lemon or lime wedges.

ingredients: 8 ounces lasagna noodles (or 4 cups of any other type of pasta, uncooked)
1 container of ricotta cheese, part-skim, 15 ounces (or cottage cheese)
1 package frozen spinach, thawed & squeezed dry (10 ounces, or chopped broccoli)
Skillet Lasagna.notes:
Thaw spinach in the refrigerator overnight or in the microwave on low power. Once thawed, wrap the spinach in a clean towel, and twist to wring out the water. 
Learn more about:

Spinach
Broccoli

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook the noodles as directed on the package. Drain and set aside.
directions.3: In a small bowl, mix the ricotta cheese (or cottage cheese), 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, and Italian seasoning.
directions.4: Spray a large skillet well with cooking spray. Do NOT place skillet on heat until all ingredients are in skillet.
directions.5: Spread half of the jar of sauce in skillet. Top with half the cooked noodles (4 lasagna noodles).
directions.6: Spread half of the cheese mixture over the noodles. Top with half the spinach or broccoli.
directions.7: Sprinkle half the mozzarella cheese over the vegetables.
directions.8: Repeat with the remaining noodles, the remaining cheese mixture, the remaining vegetables, the remaining sauce, and the remaining mozzarella cheese.
directions.9: Sprinkle with the rest of the Parmesan cheese. Cover.
directions.10: Turn on the stove top to medium-low until the cheese is melted (approximately 20 minutes). Allow to stand for 5 minutes before serving.
directions.11: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours. Eat within 3 to 5 days.

ingredients: 1 package broccoli (10 ounce, frozen, can also use mustard greens, collard greens or spinach)
2 cans stewed tomatoes, low sodium (about 30 oz)

oregano, basil, or hot pepper (other spices to taste, optional)
Skillet Meals.notes:
Learn morre about:

Broccoli
Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Steam greens in the stewed tomatoes using a small pan, pot, or electric skillet on medium-high heat.
directions.3: Cook greens 10 to 20 minutes, until they are as soft as you like them. Stir gently.
directions.4: Add the rice, canned beans, and seasonings.
directions.5: Cook until heated through.

Skillet Noodles and Beef.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Brown ground beef in a large skillet. Drain and rinse to remove fat.
directions.3: Add onion, tomato sauce, water, and spices. Cover and bring to a boil.
directions.4: Add noodles. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
directions.5: Defrost spinach in the microwave. Stir spinach into skillet mixture. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
directions.6: Stir mixture. Spoon cottage cheese on top and sprinkle with shredded mozzarella. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Add water if mixture gets too dry.

ingredients: 1/2 pound ground turkey, 85% lean (or ground sausage or beef)
8 ounces uncooked tube pasta (ziti, penne, or macaroni)
2 cups fresh or frozen vegetables (try zuccini and carrots)
Skillet Pasta Dinner.notes:
Frozen vegetables used for nutritional analysis and costing purposes.

Onions
Garlic
Tomatoes

Carrots

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Brown the ground meat, onion, and garlic in a skillet or heavy saucepan. Drain off any grease.
directions.3: Add the tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, and uncooked pasta.
directions.4: Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
directions.5: Add the fresh or frozen vegetables. Stir and continue cooking until the pasta and vegetables are tender (about 10 more minutes).

ingredients: seasoning, such as salt, pepper, seasoning salt, onion powder or garlic powder (optional)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Season the chicken. In a lightly oiled skillet over medium-high heat, sauté the chicken for one minute on each side until lightly browned.
directions.3: Cover the skillet with a tight-fitting lid. Reduce the heat to low. Cook for 10 minutes. Do not lift the lid.
directions.4: Turn off the heat. Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes. Do not remove the lid.
directions.5: The chicken is safely cooked when the internal temperature is at least 165 °F. Check in the thickest part with a food thermometer. If not done, cover and return to low heat for 3 to 5 minutes and check for doneness.

ingredients: 2 cups sliced mushrooms (white button or baby Portobello)
1 green bell pepper (thinly sliced, about 1 cup)
Skinny Pizza.notes:
MyPlate Tip: To make "personalized pizzas," set up a pizza-making station in the kitchen. Use low-fat cheese and cut up vegetables or fruits for toppings. Let kids choose their own favorites then pop pizzas into the oven to cook.
Serving Suggestion: Serve pizzas with Citrus Salad for a surprisingly refreshing meal.

Learn more about:

Mushrooms
Bell Peppers
Onions
Garlic
Tomatoes

directions.1: Heat oven to 400 °F.
directions.2: Place tortillas on 2 large baking sheets.
directions.3: Cook, flipping once, until crisp (about 10 minutes). Set aside.
directions.4: Meanwhile, heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms, peppers, onions, and garlic.
directions.5: Cook until all vegetables are soft and tender (about 10 minutes). Set aside.
directions.6: Spread tortilla crust with 2 tablespoons tomato sauce, 1/4 cup vegetable mixture, 2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese, and 1/2 teaspoon of Parmesan cheese. Repeat with remaining crusts and topping ingredients.
directions.7: Transfer pizzas to same baking sheets.
directions.8: Cook until cheese is melted and edges of tortillas are golden brown (about 10 minutes).

ingredients: 6 whole wheat buns (split in half to make 12)
Sloppy Garden Joes.notes:
You can also use 8 ounce of fresh mushrooms instead of canned. 
Learn more about:

Onions
Carrots
Bell Peppers
Tomatoes
Mushrooms

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Sauté onions, carrots, green pepper, and ground turkey or chicken in a pan over medium heat for 5 minutes.
directions.3: Add tomato sauce, crushed tomatoes, mushrooms, barbecue sauce, and seasonings and bring to boil.
directions.4: Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
directions.5: Uncover and cook for an additional 3 minutes or until thick.
directions.6: Serve open-faced on toasted or plain whole-wheat buns.
directions.7: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours.

ingredients: 1 pound pinto beans (16 ounce dried, rinsed)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix beans, water, onion, and chili powder in slow cooker.
directions.3: Cover and cook on low for 7 hours or until tender. Drain.
directions.4: Stir in barbecue sauce, ketchup, mustard, and pepper sauce.
directions.5: Cook on high for 15 minutes or until hot through.

ingredients: 2 pounds stew meat (cut into 1 inch cubes)
add herbs as desired (bay leaf, basil, oregano, etc.) (optional)
Slow Cooker Beef Stew.notes:

Garlic
Carrots
Potatoes

Celery

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place meat in slow cooker.
directions.3: Mix flour, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl, and pour over meat; stir to coat.
directions.4: Add remaining ingredients and stir to mix.
directions.5: Cover and cook on low for 8 to 10 hours or high for 4 to 6 hours.
directions.6: Stir stew thoroughly before serving. If using bay leaf, discard before serving.

ingredients: oregano, basil, or other herbs (1/2 teaspoon, optional)
Slow Cooker Hamburger Stew.notes:

Onions
Carrots
Potatoes
Celery
Tomatoes
herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Brown ground beef in a medium fry pan. Drain fat.
directions.3: Place beef, chopped vegetables, tomatoes, and water in slow cooker.
directions.4: Cook on low 8 to 10 hours or on high for 4 to 6 hours.

ingredients: 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped (or 2 tablespoons dried)
2 teaspoons beef bouillon (or 2 cubes beef bouillon)
Slow Cooker Lentil Soup.notes:

Herbs
Carrots
Onions
Celery

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix all ingredients together in slow cooker.
directions.3: Cook on low for 8 to 10 hours or high for 4 to 5 hours.
directions.4: Serve hot with crackers or bread.

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups complete bran and wheat flakes ready-to-eat cereal (crushed to 3/4 cup)
3/4 cup 100% apple juice or apple cider
Slow Cooker Pork Stew over Brown Rice.notes:
Learn more about:

Carrots
Onions
Herbs
Garlic

directions.1: Trim fat from pork.
directions.2: Spray large pan with non-stick cooking spray. Cook half of the pork at a time until browned.
directions.3: In a 4 to 6 quart crockery cooker, layer carrots, onion, thyme, pepper, salt, and garlic. Sprinkle with cereal and cherries.
directions.4: Top with pork and pour apple juice or cider over contents in the cooker.
directions.5: Cover and cook on low for 7 to 8 hours or on high for 3 1/2 to 4 hours.
directions.6: Prepare the brown rice according to package directions toward the end of the stew cooking time. (Brown rice typically takes about 40 to 45 minutes to cook.)
directions.7: Stir pork mixture and serve over 1/2 cup brown rice.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cut the beef on a diagonal, across the grain into slices 1 inch wide and place in a slow cooker.
directions.3: Combine the remaining ingredients and pour over the meat.
directions.4: Mix the meat and sauce together.
directions.5: Cover and cook on low for 3 to 5 hours.
directions.6: Serve on toasted hamburger buns with a mixed green salad.

Smoked Ham Hocks with Lima Beans.notes:
Ham hocks may be salty enough already. Taste the dish before adding optional salt.
Serve this traditional southern dish like a soup or use a slotted spoon to take out the beans and meat. Serve over brown rice.
For extra flavor and color, add diced carrots and celery.
Use a leftover meaty ham bone or smoked neck bones in place of the ham hocks.

Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic

directions.1: Peel, rinse, and chop onion. Peel and mince garlic.
directions.2: In a large pot over high heat, add ham hocks and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer. Add onion and garlic. Cover and cook until meat is tender and internal temperature registers 145 °F on a food thermometer, about 30 to 40 minutes.
directions.3: Transfer ham hocks to a clean cutting board. Let cool.
directions.4: Add lima beans to pot. Cook according to package directions.
directions.5: When ham hocks are cool, shred meat from the bone, removing any fat. Return to pot. Stir in pepper. If using salt, stir in now.

ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika or ground chipotle pepper
16 ounces salmon (skinless, about 4 ounces per fillet)
Smoky Mustard-Maple Salmon.notes:
Smoked paprika is made from smoke-dried, red peppers and adds earthy, smoky flavor. It can be used in many types of savory dishes. Look for different types of paprika at large supermarkets or online.
Wild-caught salmon from the Pacific (Alaska and Washington) are more sustainably fished and have a larger, more stable population.

directions.1: Preheat oven to 450 °F.
directions.2: Line a baking sheet with foil and coat with cooking spray.
directions.3: Combine mustard, maple syrup, paprika (or chipotle), pepper, and salt in a small bowl.
directions.4: Place salmon fillets on the prepared baking sheet.
directions.5: Spread the mustard mixture evenly on the salmon.
directions.6: Roast until just cooked through (approximately 8 to 12 minutes).

ingredients: 14 cups mustard greens, or turnip, collard, kale, or mixture (about 2 pounds)
Smothered Greens.notes:
Learn more about:

Garlic
Herbs
Ginger
Onions
Greens

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Prepare greens by washing thoroughly and removing stems.
directions.3: Tear or slice leaves into bite-sized pieces.
directions.4: Place all ingredients except greens into large saucepan and bring to a boil.
directions.5: Add greens to turkey stock. Cook 20 to 30 minutes until tender.

Snappy Cole Slaw.notes:
Refrigeration is needed before serving.

Learn more about:

Cabbage

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and shred the cabbage with a knife or grater. Put in a mixing bowl.
directions.3: Bring the vinegar and water to a boil in the saucepan. Remove from heat and add other ingredients except cabbage to the saucepan.
directions.4: Continue to cook this mixture in the saucepan until the sugar is dissolved and hot, then pour over the shredded cabbage.
directions.5: Toss. Refrigerate until chilled to blend flavors.

ingredients: 1 cup vegetables, frozen or fresh (cut into bite-sized pieces)

1/2 can kidney beans (about 7 ounces) or other canned beans (low-sodium)
dill weed, optional (fresh snipped or dry, to taste)
Snappy Rice Dish.notes:
Try this recipe with peas, corn, carrots, or whatever veggies you like!
Learn more about:

Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook the vegetables in the chicken broth (or water) using a small pan, pot, or electric skillet, on medium-high heat.*
directions.3: Cook the vegetables the way you like them (firm or soft), stirring gently. Add more broth as needed to keep the vegetables moist.
directions.4: Add the rice, canned beans, and seasonings. Steam fry until heated through.

ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, thawed, skin and bone removed from each piece
2/3 tablespoon taco seasoning or chili powder (optional)
Soft Chicken Taco.notes:
Tip for cooking chicken: The recommended safe minimum internal temperature for chicken is 165 °F, as measured by a food thermometer.

Garlic
Bell Peppers
Onions
Lettuce
Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: In a large bowl, mix chicken, vegetable oil, garlic, salt, and pepper.
directions.2: If using taco seasoning or chili powder, add that too.
directions.3: Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and place it in the refrigerator for about 30 minutes.
directions.4: While the chicken is in the refrigerator, cook the pepper and onion on a stovetop over medium heat until done (about 12 minutes).
directions.5: Cook the chicken over medium heat. Cook each side about 10 to 15 minutes.
directions.6: Place chicken on a plate. Let it cool for 5 minutes. Cut the chicken into strips.
directions.7: To make the tacos, put chicken on the tortilla first. Add peppers and onion strips next. Top with lettuce, tomato, and salsa. If using parsley or cilantro, add that too.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 425 °F. Lightly grease 2 baking sheets.
directions.3: In large bowl, sprinkle yeast over warm water (if water is too hot, it will kill the yeast). Stir until well blended.
directions.4: Combine white and wheat flour in a separate bowl.
directions.5: Stir in sugar, 1/2 teaspoon salt and 2-1/2 to 3 cups flour to make a soft, sticky dough. Turn dough onto well-floured surface.
directions.6: To knead, fold dough in half and push dough flat with heels of hands. Turn dough 1/4 turn. Repeat for 5 to 7 minutes. If needed, add more flour until dough is smooth and elastic. Dough should not stick to hands or counter.
directions.7: Cut dough into 12 even pieces (about golf-ball sized).

Somali Summer Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Apples
Bell Peppers
Tomatoes
Cucumbers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large bowl, combine oil and lemon juice.
directions.3: Dice all the fruits and vegetables and then add to the bowl.
directions.4: Add salt and pepper to taste (optional).
directions.5: Serve chilled.
directions.6: Best served within 24 hours.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F. Lightly spray and 8 inch square pan with vegetable oil cooking spray.
directions.3: Mix dry ingredients in an medium-sized mixing bowl.
directions.4: Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well by hand.
directions.5: Pour the batter into the sprayed pan and shake to make it level.
directions.6: Bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 25 minutes.
directions.7: Allow to cool, then cut into 12 squares.

South of the Border Dip.notes: Serve with baked tortilla chips, crackers, or bite-sized vegetables.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix the sour cream, yogurt, and salsa.
directions.3: Store the dip in a covered container if you don’t plan to eat it right away.
directions.4: Keep the dip in the fridge until you serve it.

ingredients: 3 cups canned corn, low sodium (drained and rinsed)
2 cans black beans, low-sodium (15.5 ounces each, drained and rinsed)
1 can diced tomatoes with green chilies (10 ounces)
South of the Border Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Corn
Tomatoes
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix the salad ingredients in a large bowl.
directions.3: Mix the dressing ingredients in a small bowl.
directions.4: Pour dressing over corn mixture and mix well.
directions.5: Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.

ingredients: 2 boxes instant vanilla pudding and pie-filling mix (3.4 ounces each)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix 3 1/2 cups of the milk with the pudding mixes. Beat the pudding mixture with a wire whisk for 2 minutes until it is well blended. Let stand for 5 minutes.
directions.3: Fold 1 cup of the whipped topping into the pudding mix.
directions.4: Arrange a layer of wafers on the bottom and sides of a 2-quart serving bowl. Drizzle 2 tablespoons of the remaining milk over the wafers. Add a layer of banana slices and top with one-third of the pudding.
directions.5: Repeat layers, drizzling each wafer layer with remaining milk and ending with pudding. Spread the remaining whipped topping over the pudding.
directions.6: Refrigerate for at least 3 hours before serving.

ingredients: 5 green bell pepper (medium, halved and seeded, or use red or yellow peppers)
1 can tomatoes with chilies (10 1/2 ounce, diced and undrained)
1/2 can whole kernel corn, low-sodium (8 1/2 ounce, drained)
Southwestern Pepper Cups.notes:
Learn more about:

Bell Peppers
Onions
Garlic
Tomatoes
Corn

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Blanch peppers in boiling water 2 to 3 minutes. Drain. Set aside.
directions.3: Cook onion and garlic in oil in medium skillet over medium-high heat for 3 minutes.
directions.4: Combine rice, tomatoes with chilies, corn, and onion mixture. Mix well.
directions.5: Spoon into pepper halves, place on baking sheet coated with cooking spray.
directions.6: Bake at 350 °F for 10 minutes or until hot. Sprinkle with cheese.
directions.7: Bake again at 350 °F for 5 to 10 minutes or until hot and cheese melts.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Slice the orange to make round slices and set aside.
directions.3: Place 4 chicken breasts in a 1-gallon sized plastic zipper bag.
directions.4: Add the liquid to the bag with the chicken.
directions.5: Zipper the bag closed and gently massage to mix the liquids and evenly cover the chicken inside the bag.
directions.6: Let the chicken marinate in the bag in the refrigerator for 4 or more hours.
directions.7: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.8: Spray shallow oven-proof baking dish with non-stick spray large enough to place chicken in single layer in the baking dish.
directions.9: Remove the chicken from the bag, place in a single layer in the baking dish. Throw away the zipper bag from the chicken.
directions.10: Bake chicken uncovered for 20 minutes.
directions.11: Turn the chicken over, cover with orange slices that were set aside, and bake 15 more minutes (total of 35 minutes).
directions.12: Check with a food thermometer. Temperature should reach 165 °F.
directions.13: Serve chicken topped with an orange slice from the baking dish if desired.

ingredients: 1 pound whole wheat spaghetti, uncooked (or your favorite pasta shape)
1 package 10-ounce frozen spinach, thawed, well drained
Spaghetti and Spinach Pesto.notes:
Serving Suggestion: Serve with grilled chicken, side salad, skim milk, and apple slices.
Learn more about:

Spinach
Onions
Garlic

directions.1: In a blender (or food processor), combine spinach, oil, Parmesan cheese, parsley, garlic, salt, and basil. Mix at medium speed until finely chopped.
directions.2: Melt margarine in water. With blender or processor running, gradually pour in melted margarine mixture until blended.
directions.3: Cook pasta according to package directions.
directions.4: Toss pesto with cooked pasta.
directions.5: Sprinkle feta on top and serve.

ingredients: 2 teaspoons dried basil (or 1/2 cup fresh basil, chopped)
Spaghetti Squash with Tomatoes, Basil, a.notes:
Learn more about:

Spaghetti Squash
Herbs
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place the 2 squash halves, cut side down, in glass baking dish. Add about 1/4 cup water and cover with plastic wrap. Microwave on high 12 minutes or until soft when pressed. Let stand covered for 3 minutes.
directions.3: In a large bowl, whisk oil, basil, oregano and 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese. Stir in tomatoes and season lightly with salt and pepper to taste.
directions.4: Scrape squash out with a fork, add strands to tomato mixture, and toss until combined. Sprinkle with remaining 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese.

ingredients: 1 pound lean ground beef (90% or leaner)
Spaghetti with Quick Meat Sauce.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Carrots
Celery
Garlic
Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain.
directions.3: Meanwhile, heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
directions.4: Add onion, carrot, and celery and cook, stirring occasionally, until the onion is beginning to brown, 5 to 8 minutes.
directions.5: Stir in garlic and Italian seasoning; cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
directions.6: Add beef and cook, stirring and breaking up with a spoon, until no longer pink, 3 to 5 minutes.
directions.7: Increase heat to high. Stir in tomatoes and cook until thickened, 4 to 6 minutes.
directions.8: Stir in parsley and salt. Serve the sauce over the pasta, sprinkled with cheese.

ingredients: 1 pound perch fillets, fresh or frozen
Spanish Baked Fish.notes:
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Onions
Garlic
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 350 °F.
directions.3: Lightly grease the baking dish with butter or margarine.
directions.4: Separate the fish into 4 fillets or pieces.
directions.5: Put the fish pieces in the baking dish.
directions.6: Peel the onion, and cut it into slices.
directions.7: Stir the onion, tomato sauce, and spices together in a small bowl.
directions.8: Pour the onion-spice mix evenly over the fish pieces.
directions.9: Bake about 10 to 20 minutes, until the fish flakes easily with a fork.

directions.1: Preheat the oven to 400 °F.
directions.2: Put the potatoes in a non-stick skillet on the stove and cover with cold water. Turn the heat to medium-high and cook about 15 minutes until the potatoes are easily pierced with a knife.
directions.3: Drain the potatoes well and set aside to cool. Then peel and cut into 1-inch cubes.
directions.4: Put the eggs, salt, and pepper in the bowl and mix well with a whisk.
directions.5: Return the skillet on the stove and turn the heat to medium-high. Add the oil. Add onion and cook about 5 minutes until soft. Add the cubed potatoes.
directions.6: Pour the egg mixture over the potatoes and onions. Press down with a spatula to make an even layer and shake gently to prevent sticking. Lower to medium heat and cook about 7 minutes.
directions.7: Transfer the skillet to the oven and cook until the frittata is completely set, about 5 minutes.
directions.8: Gently loosen frittata from the pan. Place a serving plate over the skillet and carefully invert the frittata onto the plate.
directions.9: Slice into 4 wedges. Serve warm.

ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil (or vegetable cooking spray)
Pepper and garlic salt with herbs (to taste)
Spanish Omelet.notes:
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions
Zucchini
Bell Peppers
Mushrooms

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 375 °F.
directions.3: Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender.
directions.4: In a nonstick pan, add oil or vegetable spray and warm at medium heat.
directions.5: Add the onion and sauté until brown. Add vegetables and sauté until tender but not brown.
directions.6: In a medium mixing bowl, slightly beat the eggs and egg whites, pepper, garlic salt, and mozzarella cheese. Stir egg cheese mixture into the cooked vegetables.
directions.7: Oil or spray a 10-inch pie pan or ovenproof skillet. Transfer potatoes and eggs mixture to pan. Spread with parmesan cheese and bake omelet until firm and brown on top, about 20 to 30 minutes.

ingredients: 1 can canned chopped tomatoes, low-sodium (14.5 ounces, undrained)
Spanish Rice.notes:
Learn more about:

Bell Peppers
Onions
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Brown green pepper and onion in oil until tender.
directions.3: Stir in the spices, rice, tomatoes with juice, and water.
directions.4: Cover and cook over low heat for 20 minutes or until rice is done.

Speedy Burritos.notes:
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions
Bell Peppers
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large skillet, heat oil on medium-high setting.
directions.3: Add onion, green pepper, potatoes, and garlic. Cook until potatoes are tender, about 10 minutes. Raw potatoes may need longer; check if done with a fork.
directions.4: Reduce heat to medium setting, spread potato mix out to the sides of the skillet, leaving a space in the middle for the eggs. Add the eggs and scramble them until cooked (do not mix potatoes until eggs are cooked firm). Stir all ingredients together.
directions.5: Wrap tortillas around the filling and top with salsa and cheese.

ingredients: 16 ounces salmon (fresh or frozen, or any white fish)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: If using frozen fish, thaw in refrigerator according to package directions.
directions.3: Preheat oven to 350 °F.
directions.4: Separate (or cut) fish into 4 pieces. Place fish in a 13x9x2 inch baking pan.
directions.5: Combine paprika, garlic and onion powders, pepper, oregano, and thyme in a small bowl.
directions.6: Sprinkle herb mixture (from previous step) and lemon juice evenly over the fish. Then drizzle melted margarine on top.
directions.7: Bake until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 20 to 25 minutes.

ingredients: 1 pound cod fillets, fresh or frozen, skinless and thawed (or other white fleshed fish)
Spicy Baked Fish II.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Bell Peppers
Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Oil or spray a baking dish with vegetable spray.
directions.3: Cut fish into four pieces and place in baking dish.
directions.4: Top fish with onions, green peppers, tomatoes, and seasoning. Bake about 20 minutes or until fish flakes.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Coat the baking sheet with vegetable cooking spray.
directions.4: Wash the squash. Cut it in half lengthwise. Remove the seeds. Cut the squash into 1/2 inch slices.
directions.5: Place the squash on the baking sheet. Sprinkle with salt.
directions.6: Melt the margarine on low heat in a small saucepan.
directions.7: Add the brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger to the saucepan.
directions.8: Spread the margarine mix on the squash.
directions.9: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until tender.

ingredients: 2 cups carrots, cut into 2 inch sticks
1 1/2 cups squash, cut into 2 inch sticks
1/8 cup vegetable or chicken broth, low-sodium
Spicy Carrots and Squash.notes:
Try this recipe without brown sugar.
Learn more about:

Carrots
Summer Squash

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash, peel, and cut carrots. Wash and cut up squash.
directions.3: Combine carrots and broth in saucepan. Cover and cook over medium heat about 5 minutes.
directions.4: Add squash and cook 5 more minutes or until vegetables are just tender. Add more broth, if necessary, to keep from burning.
directions.5: Stir vinegar, brown sugar, and mustard into vegetables.
directions.6: Cook for a few minutes over medium heat until most of the liquid cooks off.

ingredients: 1/4 pound chicken, thawed, cut up, and skin removed
6 small red potatoes, chopped (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium sliced potatoes)
1/4 cup white rice, uncooked (or brown rice)
1 cup fresh peas (or 1/2 can, about 8 ounces, low-sodium green peas)
cayenne or jalapeño chilies, diced (1/2 teaspoon, optional)
parsley or cilantro, chopped (1/2 cup, optional)
Spicy Chicken and Potato Soup.notes:
Tip for cooking chicken: The recommended safe minimum internal temperature for chicken is 165 °F, as measured with a food thermometer.
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Potatoes
Peas
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large pot, brown onion and garlic in oil over medium to high heat for 5 minutes.
directions.3: Add chicken to pot and brown for about 5 minutes.
directions.4: Add water, potatoes, rice, and chili powder to pot.
directions.5: Bring pot to a boil, and cook for 15 minutes.
directions.6: Lower heat and cook for about 15 to 20 minutes. Stir pot every 10 minutes.
directions.7: Add peas and cook for about 8 minutes. If using cayenne or jalapeño chilies, add that too. Mix well.
directions.8: Remove pot from heat. If using parsley or cilantro, add that now.
directions.9: Mix well and cover for 5 minutes. Serve hot.

ingredients: 1 cup pineapple chunks, in its own juice
Spicy Fruit Cup.notes:
Learn more about:

Strawberries
Oranges
Pears
Pineapples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cut the strawberries in half.
directions.3: Open the can of mandarin oranges. Drain off the syrup.
directions.4: Open the can of pears. Drain off the juice. Slice the pears.
directions.5: Open the can of pineapple, but don’t drain off the juice.
directions.6: Put the undrained pineapple, orange juice, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a mixing bowl. Stir together.
directions.7: Carefully stir in the mandarin oranges, pears, and strawberries.
directions.8: Refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours before serving.

ingredients: 2 packages frozen cut okra (10 ounces each)
1 jalapeño pepper (fresh, or habanero pepper, pierced 3 times with fork)
Spicy Okra.notes:
Learn more about:

Okra
Onions
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Rinse okra in a colander under hot water.
directions.3: Heat oil in a 10-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat. Sauté onion for about 3 minutes.
directions.4: Add tomatoes (including juice) and jalapeño (or habanero) pepper, and boil. Stir the mixture for 8 minutes.
directions.5: Add okra and cook, gently stirring, until okra is tender, about 5 minutes.
directions.6: Stir in salt and pepper and discard the jalapeño (or habanero) pepper.

ingredients: 8 large chicken thighs (trimmed of excess fat)

directions.1: Put chicken, hot sauce, mustard, thyme, and garlic in the bowl and mix well. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour or up to 24 hours.
directions.2: Heat the oven to 450 °F.
directions.3: Put the chicken on a baking sheet and sprinkle with the salt and pepper.
directions.4: Place in the oven and bake about 50 minutes until crispy and crackling. Serve right away.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine all ingredients except chicken in saucepan.
directions.3: Simmer for 15 minutes.
directions.4: Place chicken on large platter and brush with half the sauce mixture.
directions.5: Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in refrigerator for 1 hour.
directions.6: Remove plastic wrap from chicken. Place chicken on baking sheet lined with aluminum foil and broil for 10 minutes on each side to seal in juices.
directions.7: Remove from broiler and add remaining sauce to chicken. Cover with aluminum foil and bake at 350 °F for 30 minutes.

ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, or turkey, 7% fat (93% lean)
16 ounces frozen spinach chopped (may substitute with 2 bunches of fresh spinach)
Spinach and Meat Cakes.notes:
Learn more about:

Spinach
Onions
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat frying pan (no oil).
directions.3: Combine all ingredients except brown rice in a large mixing bowl. Mix well.
directions.4: Form mixture into 12 small balls. Place in frying pan and flatten into patties using a spatula.
directions.5: Cook over medium heat until cooked on both sides.
directions.6: Serve over brown rice.

ingredients: 3 yellow banana chili peppers (seeded, deveined, and minced)
1 cup enchilada sauce (14 ounce can, preferably green)
8 corn tortillas (6 inch, cut in half)
2 packages frozen chopped spinach (10 ounce, thawed)
6 1/2 ounces reduced fat Monterey jack cheese (grated)
Spinach and Mushroom Enchilada Casserole.notes:
Allow casserole to stand at room temperature 5 minutes before serving. Serve with pinto or black beans and salad.
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Mushrooms
Herbs
Spinach

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in a very large non-stick skillet. Add onion, garlic, and peppers and stir. Add mushrooms and cook about 15 to 20 minutes, until liquid evaporates. (If pan is not large enough, cook mushrooms in batches.)
directions.3: Pour half of the enchilada sauce into a 13x9 inch baking dish.
directions.4: Arrange 8 tortilla halves over the sauce in the baking dish. Preheat the oven to 350 °F. When mushrooms are cooked, stir in the salt and crumble in the oregano leaves. Drain the spinach, squeeze it dry, and mix it thoroughly with the mushroom mixture. Spoon half the mushroom mixture into the baking dish, carefully covering tortillas.
directions.5: Set aside 1/4 cup (about 1 ounce) of grated cheese. Sprinkle the rest of the cheese on top of the mushroom mixture. Layer with the remaining 8 tortilla halves, then the remaining mushroom mixture and enchilada sauce. Sprinkle top of casserole with the remaining 1/4 cup cheese. Cover baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes, or until casserole is steaming hot in the center.

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups black beans, low-sodium (canned, drained, and rinsed)
Spinach Black Bean Salad.notes:
Top your salad with other vegetables, such as mushrooms, peppers, cucumbers, zucchini, yellow squash, or red onions.
Add cooked chicken, egg, or tuna for more protein.
Add cubes of cheddar, Swiss, or smoked Gouda cheese.
Fruit makes a great addition! Try dried cranberries, cherries, raisins, or apricots or fresh berries in season.

Learn more about:

Spinach
Herbs
Tomatoes
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large bowl, combine vinegar, oil, mustard, garlic, oregano, basil, and nutmeg.
directions.3: Wash, drain, and chop spinach.
directions.4: Add spinach, black beans, tomatoes, and onions to vinegar and oil. Toss well and serve.

Spinach Potato Pancakes.notes:
Learn more about:

Zucchini
Potatoes
Onions
Spinach

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine the first eight ingredients in a bowl.
directions.3: Stir in egg and mix well.
directions.4: Drop batter in 1/4 cup sizes onto a well-greased hot griddle and flatten to form patties.
directions.5: Fry until golden brown; turn and cook until the second side is lightly browned. Drain on paper towels and serve with applesauce, if desired.

ingredients: 2/3 cup fresh spinach (washed and cut into thin strips)
1/2 cup thinly sliced green onion (including tops)
Spinach Rice Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Spinach
Celery
Onion

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine dressing, soy sauce, and sugar. Stir into chilled rice.
directions.3: Cover and chill salad.
directions.4: Add celery, onion, and spinach before serving.
directions.5: Shake on bacon bits if desired.

ingredients: 1 cup dried figs (about 16 figs or one 7 ounce package)
1/2 cup light honey mustard or poppy seed dressing
Spinach Salad with Apples and Eggs.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with a glass of 100% grape juice together with vanilla or lemon low-fat yogurt.
Learn more about:

Apples
Spinach

directions.1: To hard boil eggs: Place eggs in saucepan large enough to hold them in a single layer. Add cold water to cover eggs by 1 inch. Heat over high heat just to boiling. Remove from heat and cover. Let eggs stand in hot water about 12 minutes. Drain and fill pan with cold water; let sit 10 to 15 minutes. Peel and slice. (If making ahead, refrigerate cooked unpeeled eggs.)
directions.2: Prepare other ingredients while eggs are cooking and cooling.
directions.3: Wash, slice, and core apples.
directions.4: Cut apples and dried figs into bite-sized chunks.
directions.5: Wash and drain spinach.
directions.6: To plate, divide ingredients evenly among four plates, top spinach with apples, eggs, dried figs, and croutons. Drizzle with dressing

ingredients: 1 package baby spinach, 10 ounces, washed (or kale or other greens)
Spinach Salad with Apples and Raisins.notes:
Granny Smith apples are recommended for salad, but any apple on hand will work. Try decreasing or cutting out the sugar if you like your salad less sweet.

Learn more about:

Spinach
Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine spinach, apples, and raisins.
directions.3: Mix all dressing ingredients and pour over salad just prior to serving.

ingredients: 1 package spinach (10-ounce frozen, thawed and drained)
1 teaspoon garlic and herb seasoning (example: Mrs. Dash)
Spinach Stuffed Potatoes.notes:
You can use part-skim mozzarella cheese in place of lowfat cheddar cheese.
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Onions
Spinach

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Thaw the spinach before you cook this recipe! After it thaws, drain any extra water from the spinach.
directions.3: Preheat the oven to 350 °F.
directions.4: Wash and scrub the potatoes.
directions.5: Bake the potatoes in for 1 hour till they’re tender and you can pierce them with a fork.
directions.6: Wash and chop the green onion until you get 1/4 cup onion.
directions.7: Put the sour cream, tofu, spinach, onion, pepper, and cheese in a mixing bowl. Mix well.
directions.8: When the potatoes are baked, let them cool. Then use a spoon to scoop out the inside of the potato. Add the inside of the potato to the sour cream mix. Stir together.
directions.9: Stuff the potato skin shells with the mixture. Sprinkle the potatoes with the garlic and herb seasoning.
directions.10: Bake the potatoes for 20 to 25 minutes until they’re a little brown. Add extra cheese on top if desired.

ingredients: 1 can canned diced tomatoes, low-sodium (15.5 ounces)
1 can canned corn, low-sodium (15.2 ounces, drained)
Spinach, Tomatoes, and Corn.notes:
Learn more about:

Spinach
Tomatoes
Corn

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place all ingredients in a saucepan. Cover.
directions.3: Heat thoroughly, about 10 minutes. Add seasonings to taste.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix yogurt, cinnamon, and orange juice in a medium bowl.
directions.3: Wash and chop the fruit and add
directions.4: to the yogurt mixture. Stir and serve.

Split Pea Soup.notes:
Optional: Cook a ham bone or pieces of ham in the soup. Remove bone and serve meat in soup.
Learn more about:

Onions
Peas

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Chop onion. Cook in margarine in a large pan until tender.
directions.3: Wash and drain split peas.
directions.4: Add water, split peas, and salt to onion. Bring to boiling.
directions.5: Lower heat and cover pan. Simmer about 2 hours, until thickened.

ingredients: 3/4 cup sugar snap peas, or green beans
Spring Vegetable Saut\u00e9.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Potatoes
Carrots
Asparagus
Peas
Green Beans
Radishes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat the oil in a skillet. Cook the onion for 2 minutes, then add the garlic and cook another minute
directions.3: Stir in the potatoes and carrots. Cover, turn the heat to low, and cook until almost tender, about 4 minutes.
directions.4: If the vegetables start to brown, add a tablespoon or two of water.
directions.5: Now add the asparagus, peas, radishes, salt, pepper, and dill. Cook, stirring often, until just tender -- about 4 minutes more.
directions.6: Serve immediately.

ingredients: 1/4 head of red cabbage (about 2 cups, finely shredded)
1/2 cup canned artichoke hearts (drained and chopped)
salt and pepper (freshly ground black pepper, optional, to taste)
Spring Vegetable Soup.notes:
Learn more about:

Cabbage
Tomatoes
Peas
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In large soup pot, heat oil over medium heat. Sauté cabbage, tomatoes, artichoke hearts, and peas for 10 minutes.
directions.3: Add vegetable juice and water. Bring to boil. Reduce heat, add basil, and simmer for 10 minutes, or until all vegetables are tender and soup is piping hot.
directions.4: Serve in individual serving bowls. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

ingredients: 3/4 cup wheat and barley nugget cereal

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix the wheat and barley nugget cereal, bran cereal, sunflower seeds, and almonds in a medium bowl.
directions.3: Add the raisins, the bananas, and half of the strawberries.
directions.4: Gently stir in the yogurt and divide between two bowls.
directions.5: Scatter the remaining strawberries over the top and enjoy!

ingredients: 1/2 cup bell pepper (red or green, sliced)
Spunky Vegetable Pizza.notes:
Learn more about:

Broccoli
Carrots
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 450 °F.
directions.3: Spoon pizza sauce on pizza shell.
directions.4: Put pizza shell on a cookie sheet. Arrange vegetables over sauce. Sprinkle on the cheese.
directions.5: Bake for 10 minutes.
directions.6: When baked, cool pizza for 3 minutes before slicing. Cut into 8 wedges.

ingredients: 1 summer squash, medium (peeled, seeds removed, diced)
1 teaspoon Adobo seasoning (combination or garlic, coriander, salt, and cumin)
lemon or lime juice (2 tablespoons, optional)
Squash Salsa.notes:
Out of season idea - Use 1 can diced tomatoes in place of fresh tomatoes.
Quick salsa - Combine black beans, chopped summer squash, and a jar or your favorite salsa.
Hot Salsa - Add chopped, fresh hot peppers or canned jalapeño peppers. Remember to wash your hands well after handling hot peppers.
Nutrient analysis and costing for recipe does not include cooked rice, tortilla chips, or noodles.

Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Bell Peppers
Onions
Summer Squash
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine all ingredients except cheese. Let sit for 30 minutes.
directions.3: Spoon over tortilla chips, cooked rice, or noodles.
directions.4: Top with grated, part-skim mozzarella cheese. Serve hot or cold!

ingredients: 5 cups chicken or vegetable broth, low-sodium
Squash Soup.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Carrots
Garlic
Tomatoes
Winter Squash
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large saucepan, warm oil over medium heat.
directions.3: Stir in onions, carrots, and garlic.
directions.4: Cook for about 5 minutes, covered.
directions.5: Stir in the tomato puree, chicken broth, cooked squash, and herbs.
directions.6: Bring soup to a simmer and cook, covered, for 30 minutes.

ingredients: 3 cups thinly sliced squash (use zucchini or yellow squash)
1 teaspoon dried parsley (or 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley)
Squash Squares.notes:
To freeze: Cool, and cut into squares. Freeze squares on a cookie sheet. when they are frozen, put into freezer bags. When ready to use, take out of the freezer bag, place in microwaveable covered container. Reheat in microwave at medium setting.
Try 8 egg whites in place of whole egg for less cholesterol and fat.
Add other thinly chopped fresh veggies into the mix -- green or red sweet peppers, spinach, broccoli.
Try using the Better Baking Mix recipe instead of biscuit mix.

Summer Squash/ Zucchini
Onions
Herbs
Carrots

directions.2: Mix all ingredients thoroughly and pour into a greased 13x9 baking dish.
directions.3: Bake 25 minutes, or until bubbly and brown, in a 350 °F oven.

directions.13: Serve with a sprinkle of parsley and cheese.

Garlic
Onions
Tomatoes
Potatoes

directions.3: In a large skillet, heat oil and sauté garlic until garlic is golden.
directions.4: Add steak, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Cook for 6 minutes, stirring beef until brown.
directions.5: Add onion and tomato. Cook until onion is transparent. Serve with boiled potatoes.

Ginger
Garlic
Carrots

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix spices, soy sauce, and water; set aside.

ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, boneless, skinless, cut into strips
1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh ginger (or 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger)

To avoid peanuts or peanut butter, try this stir-fry with sunflower seeds or sunflower seed butter.
Learn more about:

Ginger
Carrots
Cabbage
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Bring 4 cups water to boil in a 2 to 3 quart saucepan. Add noodles, cover, and remove from heat (do not add flavor packets). Wait one minute. Drain noodles and set aside.
directions.3: In a small saucepan, combine peanut butter, soy sauce and 1/2 cup water. Heat over low heat, stirring until smooth. Remove from heat.
directions.4: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat (350 °F in an electric skillet). Add chicken and cook until no longer pink when cut, about 3 to 5 minutes.
directions.5: Add red pepper, ginger, and carrots and cook for 2 to 3 minutes. Add cabbage and cook 3 to 4 minutes or until cabbage is crisp-tender.
directions.6: Stir in green onion, cooked noodles, and peanut sauce. Toss and serve right away.

ingredients: 4 potatoes (medium, peeled and sliced 1/4 inch thick)

Onions
Potatoes
Cabbage

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in large skillet or Dutch oven. Add onions and stir over medium heat until golden.
directions.3: Add potatoes and chicken stock. Cover tightly, reduce heat to low and simmer until potatoes are almost tender.
directions.4: Add cabbage, cover and simmer for another 5 minutes.
directions.5: Remove cover, sprinkle with cheese and nuts.
directions.6: Let stand just until cheese is melted, about 2 minutes.

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups extra-sharp cheddar cheese, finely shredded

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan.
directions.3: Saute the chopped onion in the oil. Add the flour and cook for 1 minute.
directions.4: Add the chilies, chicken broth, chicken and garlic powder. Simmer uncovered for 5 minutes.

directions.6: Tear the tortillas into strips and divide into thirds. Add them to the pan and cook until they are hot, stirring with a spoon from time to time.
directions.7: Sprinkle the cheese over the enchiladas. Cover the pan and cook until the cheese has melted. Serve immediately.

ingredients: 1 can kidney beans, low-sodium (15 1/2 ounce, drain and save liquid)

Tomatoes
Onions
Corn

directions.2: Cook beef in hot skillet until lightly browned. Drain off fat.
directions.3: Stir in remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil.

ingredients: 1 can low sodium white beans (drained and rinsed; 15 ounce can)

Strawberries

Herbs

directions.4: In a medium bowl, toss all ingredients except spinach and vinaigrette.

Strawberries
Bananas

directions.5: Add the banana and yogurt.

directions.2: In a 10 to 12 ounce glass, alternately layer the yogurt-banana mixture, strawberries, and cereal.

Create your own yogurt pops and experiment with different flavors or try out one of these recipes:

Strawberry Yogurt Pops
Tropical Yogurt Pops

directions.1: Cut fruit into small pieces.

directions.3: Divide into 4 small paper cups (or 8 ice cubes) and place in popsicle sticks (or cut paper straws).

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and watr.

Other Stuffing Options:

Rice + Turkey Stuffing: 1 cup squash pulp, 1 pound cooked ground turkey, 2 cups cooked brown rice, 1 can low-sodium condensed cream of mushroom soup, 2 tablespoons shredded cheddar cheese
	 
Cornbread Stuffing: 2 cups squash pulp, 2 cups cornbread stuffing from a mix, dry, 1 cup diced cook chicken or ham, 1/4 cup raisins, 1/4 cup almonds or other nuts

Summer Squash
Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and cut squash in half, lengthwise. Remove the large seeds.
directions.3: Steam the squash, skin side down, in a small amount of water in a fry pan or skillet until slightly tender (but not mushy).

Stuffed Tomatoes.notes:
If you don’t have a box of breadcrumbs, make your own. Toast 4 slices of bread. Crush with a rolling pin or the side of a jar to make breadcrumbs. If you don’t have breadcrumbs or bread, crush 3 cups of a flaked cereal instead.

Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Peel the onion. Chop it into small pieces.

ingredients: 1 serving of Better Baking Mix (1 cup)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Lightly grease baking sheet.
directions.3: In a mixing bowl, combine baking mix, sugar, cinnamon, and raisins (optional). Stir to mix.
directions.4: Put oil, egg, and vanilla in a small bowl. Beat with a fork to mix.
directions.5: Add oil and egg mix to the dry ingredients.
directions.6: Stir to combine. Dough will be thick.
directions.7: Measure level tablespoons of dough. Drop on cookie sheet about 2 inches apart. Dough with spread into cookies 2 1/2 to 3 inches wide as it bakes.
directions.8: Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until edges start to turn brown. Be careful not to overbake.
directions.9: Remove cookies from baking sheet while still warm.

Oranges

Serving Suggestions: Serve with a glass of 100% apple juice and hummus with cucumber slices and carrot or celery sticks.

Notes on Raisins:

Raisins are fat- and cholesterol-free, naturally low in sodium, and loaded with antioxidants.
Just 1/4 cup of raisins is equivalent to 1/2 cup of fruit.
Raisins are the most economical fruit per serving.

directions.1: Place tapenade ingredients in food processor.
directions.2: Run until raisins, olives, and walnuts are finely chopped.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
