directions.1: Put sweet potatoes and water in a skillet and bring to a boil over high heat.
directions.2: Reduce heat to low and cook about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the water has been absorbed by the sweet potatoes.
directions.3: Add oil, sausage, onion, bell pepper and garlic to the skillet with the sweet potatoes.  Cook about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the onion is lightly browned and the sweet potatoes are tender.
directions.4: Divide the hash between 4 plates and return the skillet to the stove.
directions.5: Reheat the skillet over medium high heat and when it is hot, add the remaining 1 teaspoon oil.
directions.6: Add the eggs, one at a time, and cook about 3 to 5 minutes until the whites are solid and the yolks begin to thicken but are not hard. Flip the egg and cook for one more minute.
directions.7: Top sweet potato hash with an egg and serve right away.

ingredients: 1 cup complete pancake and waffle mix (or 1 8-ounce package)
1/2 cup mashed sweet potatoes -- or winter squash or pumpkin (baked or canned)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine all ingredients and stir just until large lumps disappear. Note: Over-stirring will result in tough pancakes.
directions.3: Pour slightly less than 1/4 cup batter for each pancake onto skillet or electric griddle heated to 350 to 375 °F.
directions.4: When pancakes bubble around edges and towards center, sprinkle with chopped nuts (if you choose). Then, flip pancakes.
directions.5: Pancake is done when bottoms are golden brown.
directions.6: Serve with applesauce or syrup.

ingredients: 3 medium sweet potatoes or yams (orange flesh)
1 pound cremini and/or white button mushrooms, quartered
Sweet Potato Pancakes with Balsamic Mapl.notes:
Serving Suggestions: Serve with 8 ounces non-fat milk and 1 cup of field greens dressed with olive oil and vinegar.
Learn more about:

Sweet Potatoes
Mushrooms

directions.1: Microwave sweet potatoes until soft; let cool. Peel and mash potatoes, using an electric mixer.
directions.2: Add milk, egg, and vegetable oil to potatoes; mix. Sift together dry ingredients and add to potato mixture. Mix on low until just blended.
directions.3: Heat non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat; coat skillet with cooking spray.
directions.4: Use 1/4 cup of batter per pancake, ladling into hot skillet. Wait until pancake bubbles and looks slightly dry on top before flipping over.
directions.5: While pancakes are cooking, heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in another skillet (do not use non-stick) over medium flame.
directions.6: Add quartered mushrooms and toss coat with oil. Let simmer, stirring occasionally, until juices run.
directions.7: Add maple syrup and balsamic vinegar to pan. Let simmer until sauce reduces and thickens.
directions.8: To serve, stack 2 or 3 pancakes, alternating with balsamic maple mushrooms.

Sweet Potato Patties.notes:
For variety, add some finely chopped apple.
Learn more about:

Sweet Potatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash the sweet potatoes.
directions.3: Bake the sweet potatoes in a microwave until they are soft.
directions.4: Remove the peels from the sweet potatoes.
directions.5: Put the sweet potatoes in a medium bowl. Mash them with a fork.
directions.6: Crush the bread crumbs on a cutting board with a rolling pin or jar.
directions.7: Put the crushed bread crumbs in a small bowl.
directions.8: Shape sweet potato into 6 small patties.
directions.9: Roll each patty in the crushed crumbs.
directions.10: Heat the oil in a frying pan on medium heat.
directions.11: Brown each patty on both sides in the oil.

Sweet Potato Pie.notes:
Learn more about:

Oranges
Sweet Potatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Beat egg whites well.
directions.3: Add sugar, orange juice, orange rind, spices, margarine, and salt.
directions.4: Add mashed sweet potatoes and mix thoroughly.
directions.5: Pour into pie shell and bake in preheated 350 °F oven for 1 hour or until firm.

Sweet Potato Pone.notes:
Sweet Potato Pone is a Liberian dish often served as a dessert following a family meal.
Learn more about:

Sweet Potatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a 3 quart saucepan, combine sweet potatoes, molasses, ginger, baking powder, salt, and vegetable oil.
directions.3: Simmer slowly, stirring constantly, for 10 minutes.
directions.4: Pour into well-greased 9 inch baking pan.
directions.5: Bake at 325 °F for 30 minutes, stirring every five minutes for the first 20 minutes.
directions.6: Smooth down the top and allow to brown.
directions.7: Cut into squares and serve hot or cold.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In order listed, put ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.
directions.3: Store in the refrigerator for up to one week.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Wash and scrub potatoes well. Cut the potatoes in half, lengthwise and then into wedges.
directions.4: Place potatoes in large mixing bowl, toss with the olive oil until potatoes are well coated.
directions.5: Sprinkle the seasonings and corn meal over potatoes, toss again until coated.
directions.6: Arrange the potatoes on a baking sheet and bake for approximately 30 minutes until potatoes are golden brown.

ingredients: 3 cups lettuce (use butterhead or any other head of lettuce, torn into small pieces)
16 ounces ground turkey or ground beef
1 can pinto beans, low-sodium (15 1/2 ounce, drained)
Taco Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Lettuce
Tomatoes
Green Peppers
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put lettuce in large bowl. Add tomatoes and green pepper.
directions.3: Brown meat and onion in fry pan. Drain off fat and liquid.
directions.4: Mix meat, beans, and salsa. Add to salad mixture.
directions.5: Serve with additional salsa. Refrigerate leftovers.

Taco Salad II.notes:
Learn more about:

Lettuce
Onions
Tomatoes
Corn

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Prepare dressing in mixing yogurt and salsa, then set aside.
directions.3: Brown ground beef and drain any fat. Add beans, cumin, and chili powder and heat through.
directions.4: Toss lettuce, tomatoes, onion, and cheese in large bowl.
directions.5: Spoon on meat and bean mixture and top with broken tortilla chips.
directions.6: Offer dressing on the side.
directions.7: Refrigerate leftovers within two hours.

ingredients: 3 cups corn (2-15.5 ounce low-sodium cans, rinsed and drained)
2 cans red kidney beans, low-sodium (15.5 ounces each, rinsed and drained)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook meat in a pot over medium heat until brown.
directions.3: Put meat in a strainer to drain fat. Rinse with hot water.
directions.4: Mix all the ingredients in a pot and cook on low for an hour.

ingredients: 1/2 cup pasta, uncooked (such as bowties, shells, macaroni, etc.)
1/2 cucumber (medium, peeled, seeded, and coarsely chopped)
1/2 red pepper (sliced, could use green or yellow)
1 tablespoon dried parsley (can use fresh if available)
Tangy Crisp Vegetable and Pasta Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Cucumbers
Carrots
Bell Peppers
Broccoli
Onions
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook pasta according to package directions, but do not add salt to cooking water. Drain, rinse with cool water, and drain again.
directions.3: In a small saucepan, combine vinegar, sugar, salt, garlic powder, and black pepper. Stir and heat over medium heat until sugar is dissolved, but do not boil. Let cool.
directions.4: Rinse, drain, and chop remaining ingredients. Combine in a shallow container, such as an 8x8 inch pan.
directions.5: Add cooked pasta and vinegar mixture. Mix gently.
directions.6: Cover and refrigerate overnight to allow flavors to blend.
directions.7: Top with parsley and serve cold.
directions.8: Cover and refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours.

ingredients: 6 us fluid ounces juice concentrate (frozen orange/pineapple, thawed)
Tangy Dressing.notes:
Use this dressing on your favorite salad, as a dip, or as an ingredient in this Summer Salad!
Learn more about:

Oranges

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix milk, concentrate, and nutmeg.
directions.3: Shake well before using.

ingredients: 1 cup Mandarin oranges, canned in light syrup
1 1/2 tablespoons lime juice (juice of one lime)
Tangy Jicama Slaw.notes:
Learn more about:

Oranges
Limes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cut the jicama in half so you have a flat side for stability.
directions.3: Peel the jicama using a small sharp knife.
directions.4: Cut the jicama in small strips or grate it using a large hand grater.
directions.5: Stir all the ingredients together in a bowl and enjoy.

Tastee Burgers.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Carrots
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place lentils in a colander, rinse in cold water, and drain.
directions.3: In a medium saucepan, bring water to a boil. Add lentils, reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for 15 minutes.
directions.4: Add onion and carrots. Cook 15 minutes more or until lentils are tender.
directions.5: Remove from heat and cool slightly.
directions.6: Stir in bread crumbs, egg, garlic powder, oregano, and salt.
directions.7: Melt margarine in large skillet. Drop lentil mixture by rounded 1/2 cupsful into hot margarine. Flatten mounds into patties and cook until firm and golden brown on both sides.
directions.8: Top each patty with a thin slice of cheese.
directions.9: Serve immediately.
directions.10: Refrigerate leftovers within two hours.

ingredients: 4 teaspoons lemon juice (freshly squeezed (1 tablespoon + 1 teaspoon))
Tasty Chicken and Veggie Packets.notes:
For a video demonstration of the preparation of this recipe, see Nutrition.gov.
Optional ingredients are not included in the nutrient or cost analysis.
Learn more about:

Onions
Carrots
Bell Peppers
Celery 
Zucchini
Garlic
Herbs
Ginger 
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Cut four large rectangles of parchment paper or aluminum foil and fold in half to create a crease. Unfold.
directions.4: Place each chicken breast in a large square of foil or parchment paper and season with salt and pepper.
directions.5: Top chicken with your choice of vegetables and seasonings.
directions.6: Drizzle each packet with 1/2 teaspoon oil and 1 teaspoon lemon juice.
directions.7: Fold the parchment paper or foil in half and then crimp around the edges tightly in 1/4-inch folds to create a half moon shape.
directions.8: Using a spatula, transfer the packets to a baking sheet. Bake until the chicken is cooked to an internal temperature of 165 °F, about 20 minutes, depending the thickness of the chicken breast.

ingredients: 4 cod fillets (4 ounces each, can also use tilapia, sole, hake, flounder, or other white fish)
Tasty Fish and Veggie Packets.notes:
See a video demonstration of the preparation of this recipe on Youtube.
Optional ingredients are not included in the nutrient or cost analysis.

Onions
Carrots
Bell Peppers
Celery

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Cut four large rectangles of parchment paper or aluminum foil and fold in half to crease. Unfold.
directions.4: Put each fish fillet in a large square of parchment paper and season with salt and pepper.
directions.5: Top fish with your choice of vegetables and seasonings.
directions.6: Drizzle each packet with 1/2 teaspoon oil and 1 teaspoon lemon juice.
directions.7: Fold the parchment paper or foil in half and then crimp around the edges tightly in 1/4-inch folds to create a half moon shape.
directions.8: Using a spatula, transfer the packets to a baking sheet. Bake until the fish is cooked to an internal temperature of 145 °F, about 10 to 12 minutes, depending the thickness of the fish.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Peel and chop the onion.
directions.3: Chop the celery into small pieces.
directions.4: Put the celery and onion in a saucepan.
directions.5: Add 1/2 cup chicken broth (save the other cup of chicken broth for later).
directions.6: Cook these ingredients on low heat. Let the broth simmer for 2 to 3 minutes.
directions.7: In a small bowl, mix the dry milk, flour, and pepper. Add them into the 1 cup of chicken broth that hasn't been cooked yet. Beat till smooth.
directions.8: Add this mix to the celery, onion, and broth.
directions.9: Cook over medium heat till the soup thickens.

ingredients: 1 container of yogurt, non-fat plain (8 ounces)
Tasty Veggie Dip.notes: A tasty addition to fresh veggies or a good sauce for tacos.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix together ingredients.
directions.3: Keep this simple dip in the fridge.

ingredients: 4 tablespoons cheddar cheese, shredded reduced fat
Ten Minute Corn Chowder.notes:
Learn more about:

Onion
Garlic
Herbs
Corn

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the oil and sauté the onion and garlic until golden, about 2 minutes.
directions.3: Meanwhile, place the flour, milk, mustard, and seasonings in a small bowl and mix well.
directions.4: Add the milk mixture to the skillet followed by the corn; mix well until the mixture comes to a boil and thickens, for about 3 minutes. Stir frequently to keep the mixture from burning.
directions.5: Divide into four bowls and top each with 1 tablespoon of shredded cheese.

ingredients: 1 pound ground turkey, 85% lean (or thinly sliced)
Teriyaki Lettuce Wraps.notes:
Ground or thinly sliced beef or pork can be substituted for turkey.
Learn more about:

Lettuce

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix the water, cornstarch, and teriyaki sauce.
directions.3: Add meat and water chestnuts.
directions.4: Heat oil in a skillet or heavy saucepan and add meat mixture; stir until cooked through.
directions.5: Serve in a lettuce leaf.

ingredients: 8 taco shells (or flour tortillas, wheat or white)
Terrific Bean Taco.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Lettuce
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Stir fry chopped onion in vegetable oil.
directions.3: Stir in refried beans. Heat thoroughly.
directions.4: Spread refried bean mixture in taco shell or on tortilla.
directions.5: Sprinkle with shredded cheese, lettuce, chopped tomatoes, and taco sauce, as desired.

ingredients: 1 can of black beans (no salt added)
1 pound lean ground beef (turkey or chicken)
Tex-Mex Skillet.notes:
Use any type of cooked beans in place of the black beans.
For a vegetarian option, use an extra can of drained and rinsed beans in place of the meat.
To increase heat, leave a few seeds from the jalapeño in the salsa. Or, season with an extra pinch of cayenne pepper.
Top with rinsed and chopped tomatoes, green onions, low-fat sour cream, or low-fat plain yogurt, if you like.

Learn more about:

Lettuce
Bell Peppers
Tomatoes
Onions
Garlic
Corn

directions.1: Rinse lettuce, bell pepper, tomato, and jalapeño. Rinse and peel onion. Peel garlic.
directions.2: Chop or shred lettuce into bite-sized pieces. Mince garlic. Cut the jalapeño and bell peppers in half. Remove seeds with the tip of a knife. Dice peppers.
directions.3: Over a small bowl, grate tomato and onion using the coarse side of a box grater. Collect all pulp and juices.
directions.4: Grate cheddar cheese.
directions.5: In a colander, drain and rinse beans.
directions.6: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, cook meat, bell pepper, and garlic until meat is lightly browned. Drain to remove fat.
directions.7: Stir in frozen corn, beans, water, and spices. Bring mixture to a boil. Lower heat and cover. Simmer for 10 minutes, or until most liquid is gone.
directions.8: While meat mixture is simmering, make a salsa. Add jalapeño and a pinch of salt to the grated tomato and onion. Stir and set aside.
directions.9: Divide the meat mixture evenly among the 8 tortillas. Top each with grated cheese, salsa, and lettuce. Roll up and serve.

ingredients: 4 cups cooked brown rice (regular or instant)
2 tablespoons peanut or canola oil, divided
1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into 1" cubes
1 red bell pepper, cut into chunks
2 cups cut broccoli florets and stems
Thai Pineapple and Chicken.notes:
Serve with 8 ounces non-fat milk.
Learn more about:

Garlic
Bell Peppers
Onions
Broccoli
Pineapples
Limes
Herbs

directions.1: Cook rice according to package directions.
directions.2: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet. Add cubed chicken, stir fry 4 to 5 minutes until chicken is done. Remove from skillet.
directions.3: Heat remaining oil. Add garlic and cook 1 minute.
directions.4: Add bell pepper, onion, and broccoli; cook 5 minutes.
directions.5: Add pineapple; cook an additional 3 to 4 minutes.
directions.6: Return chicken to skillet and stir in juice from 1/2 lime, fish sauce, chili sauce, and cilantro. Cook 1 more minute.
directions.7: Serve over brown rice with lime wedges.

The Bosnian Pot.notes:
Suggest serving with pita bread.
Bosnian cuisine contains lots of fresh produce. Tomatoes, peppers, carrots, and beans are common in everyday menus.
To reduce cost, frozen and/or canned vegetables can be substituted for fresh vegetables.

Cabbage
Carrots
Tomatoes
Potatoes
Onions
Garlic
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Dice all the vegetables.
directions.3: Combine with the meat and seasonings in a large pot.
directions.4: Add enough water to completely cover the mixture and add the oil and vinegar.
directions.5: Cook, covered, for two to three hours on low heat until everything is well done.

ingredients: 3 sweet pickle relish packets (2/3 tablespoon packets each)
Thousand Island Dressing.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Celery
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and warm water.
directions.2: Mix ingredients together.
directions.3: Chill and serve over vegetables or on a salad.

ingredients: 1 cup green beans, cut (canned or cooked)
2 cups yellow wax beans (canned or cooked)

Green Beans
Bell Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix beans, vegetables and garlic cloves in a large bowl.
directions.3: Mix vinegar, oil, and sugar in a saucepan. Heat until sugar dissolves. Cool slightly.
directions.4: Stir seasonings into vinegar mixture. Pour over vegetables. Toss lightly. Chill overnight.
directions.5: Remove garlic before serving.

ingredients: 4 cloves garlic, minced or 1 teaspoon garlic powder
2 cups diced summer or winter squash (fresh or frozen)
1 1/2 cups corn (fresh or frozen) or a 15-oz can (drained and rinsed)
1 1/2 cups cooked beans (any type) or a 15-oz can (low-sodium, drained and rinsed)
1 can (14.5 ounces) low-sodium diced tomatoes or 2 cups diced fresh
Three Sisters Soup.notes:
Try This: Change the vegetables and beans based on what you have on hand. Instead of cumin, try 2 to 3 teaspoons of Italian seasoning or 1 tablespoon of curry powder.

Carrots
Onions
Garlic
Summer Squash
Winter Squash
Corn
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in a large pan on medium heat. Add carrot and onion and sauté until onions have begun to turn slightly brown, about 8 to 10 minutes.
directions.3: Add garlic, squash, and corn and continue to stir for another 3 to 4 minutes.
directions.4: Add beans, tomatoes, broth, cumin, and pepper.
directions.5: Allow soup to come to a boil and then turn heat down to a simmer until all vegetables are tender to taste (15 to 30 minutes, depending on the vegetables used).

ingredients: 3 cups red potatoes, cubed (or 1 1/2 cans, about 24 ounces, low-sodium sliced potatoes, drained)
2 tomatoes, diced (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium diced tomatoes, drained)
1/2 cup frozen corn kernels (or 1/4 can, about 4 ounces, low-sodium whole kernel corn, drained)
1/2 cup yellow squash, diced (or 1/4 can, about 4 ounces, low-sodium sweet potatoes, drained and diced)
1/2 cup green squash, diced (or 1/4 can, about 4 ounces, low-sodium carrots, drained)
1/2 can (about 8 ounces) low-sodium kidney beans, drained
Three Sisters Stew.notes:
Tip for cooking ground beef: The recommended safe minimum internal temperature for ground beef is 160 °F, as measured with a food thermometer.
See how to make this recipe and more on USDA’s MyPlate Kitchen YouTube site.

Onions
Potatoes
Tomatoes
Corn
Yellow Squash

directions.1: In a small skillet, brown ground beef and onions over medium to high heat for 8 to 10 minutes. Drain fat.
directions.2: In a large pot, combine cooked ground beef, water, and red potatoes.
directions.3: Bring the pot to a boil and cook for 15 minutes.
directions.4: Add all the other ingredients to the pot and bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer for about 25 minutes.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 325 °F.
directions.3: Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl.
directions.4: Using two knives, cut peanut butter into dry ingredients until it appears coarse and crumbly.
directions.5: In a small bowl, beat together egg white and milk. Add to dry ingredients and mix well.
directions.6: Spread mixture into a greased loaf pan. Bake at 325 °F for 1 hour and 10 minutes.
directions.7: Cool for 10 minutes and remove from pan.

ingredients: 4 sticks reduced-fat string mozzarella string cheese
Tic Tac Toe Veggie Pizza.notes:
Learn more about:

Carrots
Bell Peppers
Zucchini

directions.1: Place rack in middle of oven and pre-heat oven to 400 °F.
directions.2: For Xs, cut carrot and bell pepper into small sticks about 2 inches long. For Os, cut summer squash into 12 slices. For grid, pull apart each cheese stick to make 4 strips.
directions.3: Place pita rounds on baking sheet and spread pasta sauce on each.
directions.4: Let kids build tic tac toe pizzas with cheese and vegetables.
directions.5: Bake about 10 minutes or until cheese is bubbling.

Tofu Salad.notes:
You may substitute yellow mustard for brown mustard.
Learn more about:

Celery
Onions
Bell Peppers
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Prepare tofu by draining the water from the package and placing tofu between two plates. Put a heavy object on top and let stand for 10 to 15 minutes. Drain the water that collects on the bottom plate every few minutes.
directions.3: In a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise, mustard, and soy sauce.
directions.4: In a medium bowl, combine the diced tofu, celery, onion, pepper, and parley; stir in the mayonnaise mixture and toss gently to coat.
directions.5: Refrigerate covered until the flavors are blended -- at least one hour.
directions.6: Use as a sandwich filling or on top of whole grain crackers.

ingredients: 1 head broccoli (broken into florets, stems chopped)
1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro (or basil leaves)
Tofu with Broccoli.notes:
Learn more about:

Garlic
Onions
Broccoli
Herbs

directions.1: Put the tofu on a cutting board and cut it in half and then cut each half into 4 equal pieces.
directions.2: Put 2 layers of paper towel on a cutting board and put the tofu on top. Let drain at least 20 minutes (and up to 2 hours).
directions.3: Place a skillet over medium heat and when hot, add 2 teaspoons oil. Add the tofu, one piece at a time, and cook until golden, about 3 minutes per side. Remove the tofu to a plate and set aside.
directions.4: Reheat the skillet and when it is hot, add remaining 2 teaspoons oil. Add garlic and scallions and cook until just golden, about 2 minutes. Add the broccoli and water and raise the heat to high. Cook until the broccoli is tender, about 4 minutes.
directions.5: Return the tofu to the pan and add the remaining ingredients. Stir well.
directions.6: Serve with a side of brown rice.

ingredients: 1 package tofu, silken, firm or extra firm (14 ounce - patted dry and cut into ½ inch cubes)
4 cups spinach leaves, fresh (washed and dried, or 1- 10 ounce box frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry)
Tofu, Tomato, and Spinach Soup.notes:
Add extra vegetables that you have on hand, such as peppers, spinach, avocado, kale, etc. for more flavor and nutrients!
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Tomatoes
Spinach
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat a 3 quart saucepan over medium heat; add oil and chopped onion. Cook onion until softened, but not brown. Stir in garlic and cook just until fragrant.
directions.3: Add chicken broth. Bring to a boil. Add tomatoes and tofu. Lower heat and simmer until tomatoes are soft but not mushy (this takes just a couple of minutes).
directions.4: Stir in green onions (optional), spinach, ground pepper and cilantro. Cook just until spinach is wilted.
directions.5: Remove from heat. Taste for seasoning. Serve hot.

Tomato and Cucumber Salad.notes:
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Cucumbers
Onions
Bell Peppers
Herbs
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large bowl, combine the salad ingredients.
directions.3: In a small bowl, mix the dressing ingredients together.
directions.4: Pour the dressing over the salad. Mix well.
directions.5: Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.

Tomato and Garlic Omelet.notes:
Learn more about:

Garlic
Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash your hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 300 °F.
directions.3: Cut the bread into cubes; toss with oil and garlic in a small bowl. Spread the cubes in a single layer on a baking sheet and toast in the oven for 15 to 25 minutes, or until golden brown, tossing once or twice. Transfer to a plate to cool.
directions.4: Spray a medium pan with nonstick cooking spray and heat over medium-high heat. Pour in egg substitute.
directions.5: When the egg begins to set, spread evenly across the bottom of the pan and reduce the heat to low.
directions.6: Once the top layer of egg is almost cooked, sprinkle the cheese and basil on top and scatter the tomatoes and bread over half of the omelet; fold the unfilled omelet half over the filling. Slide the omelet on a plate and serve.

ingredients: 1 pound ziti pasta (or bow tie pasta)
1 cup kidney beans (cooked or low-sodium canned drained, or try garbanzo beans or black beans)
mozzarella cheese, fat-free (1 cup, or provolone cheese, cubed or shredded, optional)
Tomato Basil and Bean Pasta Salad.notes:
Optional ingredients, walnuts and mozzarella, are not included in nutrition analysis and cost estimate.
Add other fresh chopped vegetables such as cucumbers, peppers, small summer squash, carrots, broccoli, or cauliflower.
Use your favorite salad dressing instead of making your own.
Use cooked rice or cooked, cut up potatoes in place of pasta.

Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and cool.
directions.3: In a small mixing bowl, whisk together vegetable oil, vinegar, Dijon-style mustard, and pepper to make vinaigrette.
directions.4: In a large mixing bowl, combine pasta, beans, basil, and tomatoes. Pour vinaigrette over top and toss together. Cover and chill at least 1 hour.
directions.5: If desired, add nuts and cheese just before serving, tossing again to combine.

ingredients: 2 mini French bread (or Italian, cut into 1/2 inch diagonal slices)
Tomato Basil Bruschetta.notes:
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Garlic
Onions
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 °F.
directions.3: Combine tomatoes, garlic, onion, basil, and olive oil in a bowl. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste (optional). Set aside.
directions.4: Arrange bread on a baking sheet in a single layer. Bake about 5 to 7 minutes until it begins to brown slightly.
directions.5: Remove bread from oven and transfer to a serving platter.
directions.6: Serve the tomato mixture in a bowl with a serving spoon and let everyone help themselves. Or place some on each slice of bread before serving. If adding the tomato mixture yourself, add it at the last minute or the bread may become soggy.

ingredients: 2 garlic clove (crushed, or 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder)
1 can tomatoes, low-sodium (14 1/2 ounce, drained and chopped)
2/3 cup non-fat dry milk (+ 2 cups water or substitute 2 cups nonfat milk)
Tomato Basil Soup.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a medium saucepan, cook onion in oil over medium heat, stirring frequently until golden brown, about 4 minutes.
directions.3: Add garlic and cook 1 minute longer. Add chopped tomatoes.
directions.4: Cook uncovered over medium heat for 10 minutes.
directions.5: Spoon 3/4 of mixture into food processor or blender container; puree until smooth. Return to saucepan.
directions.6: Add red pepper, basil, and reconstitute milk to the soup. Heat until hot, but do not boil. Season to taste with salt and pepper (optional). Serve immediately.

ingredients: 1 cup pasta, small whole grain (shell, penne, or ziti)
Tomato N' Cheese Pasta.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Tomatoes
Herbs

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook pasta according to package directions; drain.
directions.3: In a small saucepan, cook onion and garlic in oil until tender.
directions.4: Stir in tomatoes, basil, oregano, sugar, and pepper.
directions.5: Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered for 15 minutes. Add pasta to sauce.
directions.6: Transfer to a greased 1-quart baking dish. Top with cheeses.
directions.7: Bake, uncovered at 375 °F for 10 to 15 minutes or until cheese is melted.

Tortellini Soup.notes:
Learn more about:

Peas
Herbs
Tomatoes
Carrots
Celery

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Rinse beans. Put into a 4 or 5 quart heavy pot with 8 cups of water. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium, cover, and simmer until the beans are tender (1 1/4 to 1 1/2 hours).
directions.3: Add 4 cups water, seasonings, tortellini, and, if desired, 1 cup each coarsely chopped carrots and celery. Return to boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 1/2 hour, until tortellini and vegetables are tender.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 degrees.
directions.3: Place tortillas in a stack on cutting board. With a sharp knife, cut stack into eight pieces, forming triangles or wedges.
directions.4: Lay tortillas pieces out in single layer on baking sheet. Set aside while making dip.
directions.5: Open canned beans. Pour beans in colander; rinse and drain. Place beans in a small mixing bowl and mash with a potato masher. Spread beans over bottom of baking dish.
directions.6: Measure salsa and spread over beans.
directions.7: Measure sour cream and spread over beans.
directions.8: Grate and measure cheese; sprinkle over bean mixture.
directions.9: Place lettuce wedge on cutting board. Slice into thin strips; set aside.
directions.10: Place both the baking sheet with tortilla pieces and the dip in preheated oven. Bake about 8 minutes or until tortilla pieces are crisp and dip is bubbly. Sprinkle lettuce over dip and serve with tortilla chips.

ingredients: 1 can refried beans, fat-free, low-sodium (16 ounce)
2 ounces fresh or canned green chili peppers (diced)
3 cups vegetables, such as broccoli, mushrooms, spinach, and red bell pepper (chopped)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Brush one side of each of two tortillas with water. Press the wet sides of the tortillas together to form a thick crust for the pizza.
directions.3: Brush the outside of the tortillas with a small amount of oil or margarine. Evenly brown both sides in a heated frying pan. Repeat with the rest of the tortillas. Set aside.
directions.4: Heat refried beans, onion, and half of the chili peppers together in a medium saucepan, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat.
directions.5: Spread about 1/3 cup of the bean mixture on each tortilla pizza. Sprinkle with 1 Tablespoon taco sauce, then top with 1/2 cup of the chopped vegetables, 1 teaspoon chili peppers, and 1 Tablespoon cheese for each pizza.
directions.6: Return to frying pan and heat until cheese melts. Top with cilantro, if desired. Serve immediately.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350°F.
directions.3: On a baking sheet, arrange tortillas or tostadas in a single layer. If using tortillas, spray both sides with non-stick cooking spray and bake for 4 minutes or until crisp.
directions.4: Mix chili powder into refried beans, if desired.
directions.5: Spoon 1/3 cup of refried beans on each tostada. Sprinkle with cheese.
directions.6: Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted.
directions.7: Top each tostada with lettuce and tomato.
directions.8: Serve with salsa and sour cream (optional).

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Turn on oven to 350°F.
directions.3: Place tortillas on a cookie sheet and put in oven for 10 minutes or until crispy.
directions.4: Wash and cut your lettuce and tomatoes.
directions.5: Spread two large tablespoons of refried beans on each tortilla.
directions.6: Top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, and grated cheese.
directions.7: Serve immediately and refrigerate leftovers.

Trail Mix Bars.notes: Children under one year of age should not consume honey.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Combine dry ingredients in bowl.
directions.3: Combine honey and sugar in pan and bring to a boil.
directions.4: Add peanut butter and vanilla, stir until peanut butter melts.
directions.5: Pour mixture over cereal and mix well.
directions.6: Press into a 13x9" pan and cool.

ingredients: square corn, rice or wheat cereal (1 cup)
Trail Treat.notes:
Ingredients used for costing and nutritional analysis:

round oat cereal
popcorn
raisins
peanuts

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Choose the ingredients you want to use.
directions.3: Measure the suggested amounts of chosen ingredients and add to mixing bowl.
directions.4: Mix ingredients using stirring spoon and divide evenly into 4 storage bags.
directions.5: Enjoy your Trail Treat.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place orange juice in bowl.
directions.3: Wash apple and dry. Remove the seeds and dice. Coat apple surfaces with orange juice to prevent browning.
directions.4: Peel orange and break into sections. Cut sections into small pieces.
directions.5: Peel and slice banana into 1/4 inch circles.
directions.6: Combine all fruit and orange juice lightly in a bowl and mix together. Chill or serve immediately.

directions.1: Mix oats, milk, yogurt and allspice in two bowls or glass jars.
directions.2: Cover and refrigerate overnight.
directions.3: Just before serving, add pineapple, banana, and almonds.

ingredients: 1/2 cup pineapple pieces (fresh, canned, or frozen)
Tropical Yogurt Pops.notes:
Create your own yogurt pops and experiment with different flavors or try out one of these recipes:

Banana Cocoa Yogurt Pops
Strawberry Yogurt Pops
Strawberry Kiwi Yogurt Pops

directions.1: Place all ingredients into blender.
directions.2: Blend on high until smooth.
directions.3: Pour into 4 small paper cups (or 8 ice cubes) and place in popsicle sticks (or cut paper straws).
directions.4: Freeze.
directions.5: Enjoy as a frozen treat!

ingredients: 1 can tuna, packed in water (12 ounces)
2 Pita bread, whole wheat (cut in half)
Tuna Apple Salad.notes: See how to make this recipe and more on USDA’s MyPlate Kitchen YouTube site.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a small bowl, stir together tuna, onion, apple, celery, raisins, and 2 Tablespoons of dressing.
directions.3: In another bowl, toss together salad greens with remaining dressing.
directions.4: Carefully open pita breads and fill with equal amounts of greens and tuna salad.

ingredients: 1 apple (such as Fuji or Pink Lady Washington)
8 leaves lettuce (Bibb, Romaine, green, or red leaf)
Tuna Apple Salad Sandwich.notes: Serving Suggestions: Serve with an 8 oz. glass of 100% orange juice.

directions.1: Cut apple in quarters; remove core and chop.
directions.2: In a medium size bowl, mix all salad ingredients, except tuna.
directions.3: Gently fold in tuna.
directions.4: Make sandwiches,using lettuce and whole-grain bread (toasted, if desired), and fill with tuna apple salad.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350°F.
directions.3: Drain tuna and break the meat apart with a fork.
directions.4: Wash and chop the celery and dice the cheese.
directions.5: Mix tuna, celery, cheese, light mayonnaise, dried onion, salt, and pepper into a medium mixing bowl with a wooden spoon.
directions.6: Spread tuna mixture on six of the pieces of whole wheat bread and place a single slice of bread on top of each (you will make a total of 6 sandwiches).
directions.7: Put each sandwich on a square of aluminum foil, then wrap the foil around sandwiches, folding edges securely
directions.8: Bake about 20 minutes or until hot in the middle. Cool slightly before serving.

ingredients: 1 can tuna, drained (6.5 ounces, packed in water)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook spaghetti according to package, drain.
directions.3: Heat oil in a large skillet or pan over medium heat. Add onion and broccoli (or zucchini). Cook until softened.
directions.4: Stir in tomato-based pasta sauce. Bring to a boil. Turn heat to low and simmer for 3 minutes.
directions.5: Add drained tuna into the sauce mixture. Stir just enough to heat the tuns.
directions.6: Add salt and pepper to taste (optional). Add cooked spaghetti to the sauce. Stir the pasta and sauce mixture until mixed together uniformly.
directions.7: Optional: Add 2 Tablespoons Parmesan cheese to cooked mixture of pasta and sauce.
directions.8: Serve hot.

ingredients: 12 ounces pasta shells, or other pasta
1 can cream of mushroom soup, reduced sodium (10.75 ounces, or cream of celery, chicken or cheddar)
2 cans tuna (6.5 ounces each, packed in water)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Cook pasta according to package directions and drain.
directions.3: In a large skillet or pot, cook onion and pepper in oil.
directions.4: Add cream soup, diced tomatoes and tuna to onion and pepper.
directions.5: Mix with pasta. Put in baking dish.
directions.6: Cook at 350°F or for 25 minutes until bubbly.
directions.7: Top with cheese if desired and return to oven for 5 minutes to melt.

ingredients: 1 can tuna fish, packed in water (6.5 ounces, drained)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix tuna with mayonnaise.

ingredients: 2 cans tuna, drained (6.5 ounces each, water packed)
Tuna Salad II.notes:
Optional:

Try apples or mandarin oranges instead of grapes.
Add shredded carrots.
May also serve on crackers, tortillas, or bread.

Learn more about:

Celery
Grapes
Lettuce

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a medium-sized bowl, combine drained tuna, celery, mayonnaise and yogurt and stir.
directions.3: Add grapes to mixture and stir gently.
directions.4: Cover and chill until ready to serve.
directions.5: Serve over lettuce leaves.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place lettuce, vegetables, oil, vinegar and herbs in a large salad bowl. Toss together.
directions.3: Mix ingredients for tuna salad in another medium sized mixing bowl.
directions.4: Assemble salad by placing greens on a large plate. Top with a scoop of tuna salad.

ingredients: 5 ounces canned tuna, packed in water, drained and flaked
1 can chopped green chilies (1-4.25 oz. can)
2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro or parsley

directions.1: In large bowl combine tuna, green chilies, celery, red onion, mayonnaise and chopped cilantro; toss to mix well.
directions.2: Top bottom half of each roll with lettuce leaves; top with some tuna mixture and top half of roll.

ingredients: 2 cups carrot (raw, chopped or any of your favorite raw veggies)
2 1/2 cups celery (raw, chopped or any of your favorite raw veggies)
1 can tuna, in water (6.5 ounce light, drained and flaked)
1 can white beans (15 ounces, or your favorite beans)
1/2 teaspoon dried dill (or 1 tablespoon fresh dill)
Tuna Veggie Antipasto.notes:
Use salad to fill a pita for a crunchy sandwich.
Serve on fresh, washed leafy lettuce.
Add cooked rice or pasta.
Try balsamic vinegar or ½ cup of your favorite salad dressing.
Be creative and try different herbs and veggie combinations!

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and trim vegetables. Chop into bite size pieces. Place in large bowl.
directions.3: Combine vinegar, dill (or other herbs), garlic and oil. Pour over vegetables.
directions.4: Drain and rinse beans. Break up tuna into smaller chunks.
directions.5: Combine vegetables, beans and tuna; toss gently.
directions.6: Marinate salad overnight to combine flavors.
directions.7: Chill and serve as a light summer lunch or as a picnic side dish.

ingredients: 8 ounces turkey breast, thinly sliced (or you can use fat free, low-sodium deli turkey)

directions.1: Mix the yogurt, dill, onion, pepper and chopped cucumbers.
directions.2: Divide the yogurt/cucumber mixture on all 8 slices of bread.
directions.3: Top the whole wheat bread with turkey and cucumber slices.
directions.4: Cover with the white bread slices.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Chop onions.
directions.3: Combine onions, turkey, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce and parsley. Mix well.
directions.4: Shape mixture into four patties.
directions.5: Fry in a pan on medium heat or grill until internal temperature reaches 165 degrees F.

ingredients: 2 tablespoons margarine (or butter or turkey drippings)
1 1/2 cups chicken or turkey broth, low-sodium
2 1/2 ounces giblets (cooked and chopped, approximately 1/2 cup)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Melt margarine in skillet over low heat. Mix in flour and salt. Stir and heat until bubbly.
directions.3: Add broth slowly, stirring constantly. Cook over low heat for 5- 10 minutes.
directions.4: Add the cooked giblets. Heat a few minutes to blend flavors.
directions.5: Store leftovers in refrigerator within 2 hours.

ingredients: 1 tablespoon onion (dehydrated, or one small onion, minced)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
directions.3: Combine all ingredients and mix well.
directions.4: Bake in loaf pan for 25 minutes or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165 degrees. Check the temperature with a meat thermometer.
directions.5: Cut into five slices and serve.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix ground turkey, bread crumbs, egg, onions, and mustard in a large bowl. Shape into 4 patties, about 1/2 inch thick.
directions.3: Spray a large skillet with cooking spray. Add patties and cook, turning once to brown other side. Cook until golden brown outside and white inside, about 10 minutes. Remove.
directions.4: Add chicken broth to skillet and boil over high heat until slightly thickened, about 1 to 2 minutes. Pour sauce over patties.
directions.5: Serve on buns.

ingredients: 8 ounces cream cheese, low-fat (garlic and herb)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place tortillas on microwaveable plate or paper towel; microwave uncovered on HIGH 10 - 15 seconds to soften.
directions.3: Spread about 2 Tablespoons cream cheese over each tortilla. Top with a slice of turkey, chopped tomatoes and spinach.
directions.4: Roll up lightly; then wrap in plastic wrap. Refrigerate 2 - 3 hours to blend flavors. Cut each roll into eight 1-inch slices. Arrange with cut side down on serving plate.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix turkey, celery, potato, onion, and green pepper.
directions.3: Mix salad dressing, mustard and salt. Stir lightly into turkey mixture.
directions.4: Chill.

ingredients: 2 cups cooked turkey breast (cut into julienne strips)
Turkey Salad with Orange Vinaigrette.notes:
You can substitute 1 1/2 teaspoons dried chopped onion for the chopped fresh onion or as recommended on the dried onion container. Prepare the dressing at least 10 minutes before you need it to allow the dried onion to re-hydrate from the fluids in the dressing.

Use white meat leftovers if you've prepared a whole turkey and not just the breast portion.

Another way to add crunch to your salad would be to use 4 tablespoons chopped walnuts instead of the celery.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a jar with tight-fitting lid, combine all vinaigrette ingredients; shake well. If you don't have a container with a tight-fitting lid, place ingredients in a small mixing bowl and mix together with a whisk.
directions.3: In large bowl, combine all salad ingredients; toss gently.
directions.4: Serve with vinaigrette. If desired, garnish with fresh strawberries.

ingredients: 1 garlic clove (finely chopped, or 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder)
Italian seasoning or oregano, basil or thyme (to taste, optional)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in medium saucepan. Add onion, garlic, carrots and celery and stir for 2 minutes
directions.3: Add potatoes, tomatoes, and water to pan. Bring to a boil, then lower heat and simmer 30 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Add turkey and cook another five minutes or until heated.
directions.4: Season to taste before serving. Refrigerate leftovers.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Rinse and core cabbage. Carefully remove 10 outer leaves, place in saucepan, and cover with boiling water. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove and drain cooked cabbage leaves on paper towels.
directions.3: Shred 1/2 cup of raw cabbage and set aside.
directions.4: Brown ground beef and turkey and minced onion in skillet. Drain fat.
directions.5: Place cooked and drained meat mixture, bread crumbs, water, and pepper into mixing bowl.
directions.6: Drain tomatoes, reserving liquid, and add 1/2 cup of tomato juice from can to meat mixture. Mix well; then place 1/4 cup of filling on each parboiled, drained cabbage leaf. Place folded side down in skillet.
directions.7: Add tomatoes, sliced onion, water, shredded cabbage, and carrot. Cover and simmer about 1 hour (or until cabbage is tender), basting occasionally.
directions.8: Remove cabbage rolls to serving platter; keep warm.
directions.9: Mix lemon juice, brown sugar, and cornstarch together in small bowl. Add to vegetables and liquid in skillet, and cook, stirring occasionally, until thickened and clear. Serve over cabbage rolls.

ingredients: 2 cups cooked turkey (cut into bite-size pieces, or 2 cups ground turkey, browned in a skillet and drained)
1/4 cup Cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese (shredded, low-fat)
Turkey Tostadas.notes:
Recipe analysis includes light meat turkey without skin.
Learn more about:

Tomatoes
Lettuce
Onions
Avocados

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and prepare vegetables.
directions.3: In a large skillet over medium heat, combine turkey, taco seasoning, and water.
directions.4: Bring mixture to boil, reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
directions.5: Place tortillas on a cooking sheet. Bake at 375° for 4-7 minutes or until tortillas are crispy.
directions.6: Spread tortillas with a tablespoon of beans. Top with 1/4 meat mixture and cheese.
directions.7: Return tortillas to oven to cook for 2-3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
directions.8: Top with tomatoes, lettuce, onions and taco sauce. Garnish with yogurt and guacamole, if desired.

Turnip Pancakes.notes:
No rice vinegar? Try apple cider vinegar instead.
Learn more about: 

Garlic
Turnips
Onions
Carrots

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large bowl, mix flour, pepper, egg, garlic, soy sauce, and water in a bowl until smooth.
directions.3: Stir in the turnip, carrot and green onion
directions.4: Heat half of oil in a large skillet over medium heat (350 degrees F in an electric skillet). Pour about 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake into skillet. Flatten with a fork into a 3-inch circle.
directions.5: Cook until edges look dry and bottom is golden, about 3 to 4 minutes. Turn once. Cook until bottom is golden and crispy. Repeat with remaining batter, adding remaining oil as needed. Pancakes will be moist in the center.
directions.6: Combine dipping sauce ingredients in a small bowl. Serve with warm pancakes.

Turtle Apple.notes:
Adults: Make sure you use sharp knife to cut apple in half, remove core and discard. Using can opener, open mandarin oranges and discard sharp edged lid.
Learn more about

Apples

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash apple. Cut in half (see notes).
directions.3: Place apple half in center of small plate.
directions.4: Put mandarin oranges next to apple for arms, legs, and head.
directions.5: Enjoy your Turtle Apple.

ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary (or 1 teaspoon dried rosemary)
2 1/2 cups frozen green beans (thawed, 12 oz. bag)
Tuscan Potato Skillet.notes: Use whatever type of potatoes you have on hand, are on sale, or offer the best price.

directions.1: Cut each potato into 4 wedges. Place in a large microwave-safe bowl and season with salt and pepper. Microwave on HIGH for 4 minutes. Stir and microwave for 4 minutes more.
directions.2: While potatoes are cooking, cut each chicken tenderloin into 4 equal pieces.
directions.3: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes or until nicely browned, stirring frequently.
directions.4: Add remaining oil and potatoes; cook and stir for 5 minutes more to brown potatoes and fully cook chicken.
directions.5: Stir in rosemary, garlic, green beans, lemon zest and juice. Cook for a few minutes more to heat through. Season to taste with salt and pepper

ingredients: 1/2 can (about 8 ounces) low-sodium kidney beans, drained
Two Bean Chili.notes:
Tip for cooking with ground beef: The recommended safe minimum internal temperature for ground beef is 160 degrees F, as measured with a food thermometer.
Tip: USDA Foods macaroni products such as spaghetti, rotini, and macaroni are great additions to chili.

directions.1: In a medium-size pot, brown ground beef over medium to high heat for 8 to 10 minutes. Drain fat.
directions.2: Add kidney beans, vegetarian beans, onions, chili powder, tomato juice, and pepper.
directions.3: Cook over low heat for about 40 minutes. Serve hot.

Uncooked Tomato Sauce.notes: Add a can of white or black beans, drained, for extra protein before tossing with pasta or rice.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Chop tomatoes and mix with all the remaining ingredients in a large bowl.
directions.3: Let the mixture stand at room temperature for about 20 minutes. Toss with hot cooked pasta or rice and top with grated Romano or Parmesan cheese.

ingredients: 16 ounces turkey (cooked, cut into 1/2 inch cubes)
2 packages vegetables, fresh or frozen (10 ounce package, chopped)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat fry pan. Add oil and heat on high temperature.
directions.3: Add ginger, garlic, turkey and vegetables. Stir fry about 1 minute to coat with oil.
directions.4: Adjust heat to prevent scorching. Add sugar. If vegetables are tender, stop cooking at this time.
directions.5: If the vegetables are firm, add 1-2 tablespoons of water, cover and cook for 2 minutes or until tender.
directions.6: Serve at once, or if you wish to add a gravy:
directions.7: Mix the gravy ingredients well, pour over vegetables and turkey, cook for 30 seconds.

ingredients: 3 cups mixed vegetables, frozen or fresh (chopped, no salt or fat added)
1/2 cup Swiss cheese (cut into small pieces)
Vegetable Cheese Soup.notes: Store leftovers covered in the refrigerator.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Bring 2 cups water to a boil. Add vegetables, onions, salt and curry powder. Cook, covered, until almost tender.
directions.3: Mix dry milk, 1 cup water and cornstarch together. Add to partially cooked vegetables.
directions.4: Cook over medium heat, stirring often, until thickened.
directions.5: Add cheese and stir until melted. Add more water if too thick.
directions.6: Top with back and green onions if desired.

ingredients: 3 cans 16 ounce low-sodium dark red kidney beans (drained and rinsed)

directions.1: Put the pot over medium heat and when it is hot, add the oil. Add the onions, zucchini, sweet potatoes, garlic and spices and cook, stirring from time to time, 20 minutes.
directions.2: Add the kidney beans and tomatoes. Stir and cook, covered, until the squash is tender, about 30 minutes.
directions.3: Add the corn and cook until warmed throughout.
directions.4: Serve right away or transfer to a container once cooled. Refrigerate up to 5 days.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix together all ingredients.

ingredients: 1/4 cup onion, chopped (could also use green onion)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Make 2 cups of cooked white rice. Use the package directions to make the rice.
directions.3: Chop 1/2 cup of celery and 1/4 cup of onion.
directions.4: Heat the oil in a skillet or large frying pan.
directions.5: Add the celery and onion. Stir fry for 2 minutes.
directions.6: Add the vegetables to the pan. Keep stirring the vegetables until they are tender-crisp.
directions.7: Add the cooked rice.
directions.8: Sprinkle with soy sauce and pepper.
directions.9: Stir fry for 2 minutes until the rice is heated and the flavors are blended.

ingredients: 1 cup bell pepper (green or other color)
3 jalapeno chiles (finely chopped, seeded if desired)
Vegetable Medley with Salsa Dip.notes: Feel free to serve with whatever vegetables you have on hand. Could also be served with crackers.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Arrange vegetables on a platter.
directions.3: In a small bowl, mix sour cream and salsa. Serve.

Vegetable Pinwheels.notes:
Be creative! Add washed, chopped fresh cilantro or spices like cumin and chili powder in step #2. 
Learn more about:

Corn
Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Drain the corn and green chilis.  Collect, chop and measure all ingredients before starting to prepare the recipe.
directions.3: Mix cream cheese, corn, green chilies, onions and salsa together in a bowl.
directions.4: Spread mixture on tortillas, roll up tightly, and wrap in plastic wrap.
directions.5: Cut in 1-inch slices, and serve immediately, or store in the refrigerator until ready to serve.

ingredients: 1 can Mexican or Italian style tomatoes, low-sodium (14 1/2 ounce)
1 green bell pepper (optional - if using seeded and chopped)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Heat oil in medium-size saucepan over medium heat.
directions.3: Cook the rice until just golden brown, about 5 minutes.
directions.4: Add 1/2 cup of chicken broth if moisture is needed.
directions.5: Add onions and garlic and cook for a minute or two.
directions.6: Stir in the tomatoes and their juice, the rest of the chicken broth, salt and bell pepper (if using). Bring to a boil.
directions.7: Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the broth is absorbed.

ingredients: 1 can whole kernel corn (12 ounce, drained)
1 can diced tomatoes (reserve 1/3 cup liquid), low-sodium
Vegetable Salad.notes: Feel free to add other vegetables like green beans to the recipe. Instead of canned vegetables you could also use a 16 ounce bag of frozen vegetables. However, analysis was done with ingredients as specified in the recipe.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Drain corn, carrots and chickpeas. Throw away liquid. Rinse vegetables and drain again.
directions.3: Drain tomatoes but save 1/3 cup of the liquid.
directions.4: Mix corn, carrots, chickpeas, tomatoes, onion, and green pepper in a large bowl.
directions.5: Mix together all other ingredients in a separate bowl.
directions.6: Pour over vegetables.
directions.7: Cover and set aside for at least 3 hours in the refrigerator.

Vegetable Snake.notes: Adults: Use a sharp knife to slice the cucumber and tomato into thin slices crosswise.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash ingredients.
directions.3: Put cucumber slices (see notes) on a small plate to form a snake.
directions.4: Add 2 slices of tomatoes for eyes.
directions.5: Enjoy your Vegetable Snake.

ingredients: 3 ears corn (or 1 can low-sodium whole kernel corn)
1 pound fresh carrots, peeled and diced (or 1 can low-sodium carrots, about 15 ounces)
2 pounds potatoes, peeled and diced (or 2 cans low-sodium sliced potatoes, about 15 ounces each)
Vegetable Soup with Chicken.notes: Tip for cooking chicken: The recommended safe minimum internal temperature for chicken is 165 degrees F, as measured with a food thermometer.

directions.1: In a large pot, heat the chicken and water over medium to high heat until hot.
directions.2: Cut the kernels off the ears of corn.
directions.3: Add the corn kernels and all other ingredients to the pot and boil for 10 seconds.
directions.4: Lower the heat and simmer for about 30 minutes.

ingredients: 1 3/4 cups sweet corn, 15 ounces, rinsed and drained, low-sodium (or 2 ears of fresh corn, cut off the cob)
Vegetable Stew.notes:
Learn more about:

Potatoes
Carrots
Summer Squash
Corn
Garlic
Onions
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put water and bouillon in large pot and bring to a boil.
directions.3: Add potatoes and carrots and simmer for 5 minutes.
directions.4: Add remaining ingredients, except for tomatoes, and continue cooking for 15 minutes over medium heat.
directions.5: Remove 4 chunks of squash and puree in blender.
directions.6: Return pureed mixture to pot and let cook for 10 minutes more.
directions.7: Add tomatoes and cook for another 5 minutes.
directions.8: Remove from heat and let sit for 10 minutes to allow stew to thicken.

ingredients: 1/2 pound medium shaped whole wheat pasta (cooked)
1 red bell pepper (cored and seeded and chopped)
1 can 14.5 ounce low-sodium diced tomatoes (including the liquid)
1/2 cup plain yogurt (or light or heavy cream)

directions.1: To cook the pasta, fill a pot halfway with water. Bring it to a boil over high heat. When it has boiled, add the pasta and cook until just tender about 12 minutes. Drain the pasta and set aside.
directions.2: While the pasta is cooking, cook the stroganoff: Put a skillet over medium heat and when it is hot, add the oil.  Add the onion, garlic, carrots, zucchini, pepper and dried basil and cook until soft and golden, about 20 minutes.
directions.3: Add the tomatoes and cook until the sauce comes together, about 20 minutes.
directions.4: Put the yogurt and tomato paste in the bowl, stirring until smooth.
directions.5: Turn the heat off and move the vegetables in the skillet to one side. Gradually add the tomato paste mixture to the other side of the skillet, stirring all the while. Turn the heat to low and cook about 5 minutes, until heated through.
directions.6: Add the cooked pasta and stir until mixed.

ingredients: 1 green bell pepper (cut into 1/4 inch pieces)
2 cans whole tomatoes, low sodium (28 ounces total - cut into 1/4 inch pieces or 8 medium fresh tomatoes)
2 summer squash (medium - cut in to 1/4 inch pieces)
1 can kidney beans, low-sodium (16 ounce, rinsed)
Vegetarian Chili.notes:
Learn more about:

Onions
Garlic
Zucchini and Summer Squash
Bell Pepper
Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large pot saute onions, bell pepper, garlic, and jalapeno in oil over medium high heat for about 5 minutes - stirring often.
directions.3: Add chili powder, cumin, half of the chopped cilantro, salt and pepper, and continue cooking for another 3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
directions.4: Add the tomatoes, zucchini, squash, and bring mixture to a simmer.
directions.5: Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
directions.6: Add beans, and continue to simmer for another 5 minutes.
directions.7: Serve the mixture hot. Put remaining cilantro on top.

ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes (increase to 1 teaspoon if you like food spicy)
2 1/2 cups collard greens (stems removed and chopped*)
Vegetarian Collard Greens.notes:
* Preparing collard greens: First, remove any damaged outer leaves. Fill a large bowl with cold water, and dunk the greens. Swish them around for a few minutes to help loosen any dirt on the leaves. Pour out the dirty water and fill the bowl with clean water. Swish the leaves under the clean water again to remove any additional dirt. Continue this process until the water in the bowl remains clear. To cut collard greens, fold each leaf in half with the stem at the fold crease. Either cut or tear the stem off. Stack several leaves on top of each other and roll the leaves up. Cut the roll of leaves into 1-inch thick pieces.
** Removing tomato seeds: Turn the tomato on its side so the stem faces to the right. Cut the tomato down the center and use a ¼ teaspoon to spoon out the seeds.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash all vegetables,* and remove seeds from the tomatoes.**
directions.3: Collect, chop, and measure all ingredients before starting to prepare the recipe.
directions.4: Heat the oil and butter in a large pot over medium heat.
directions.5: Add the onion, and cook for about 2 minutes until slightly soft.
directions.6: Add the red pepper flakes and garlic, and cook for 1 minute. Add the chopped collard greens, and cook for another minute.
directions.7: Add the broth, cover, and bring to a simmer. Cook for about 40 minutes until the greens are tender.
directions.8: Add tomatoes.
directions.9: Taste, and add a small amount of salt and black pepper if desired.
directions.10: Serve hot.
directions.11: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours. Eat within 3 to 5 days.

Vegetarian Matzo Ball Soup.notes: Recipe cost can be reduced by substituting dried dill for fresh dill.

directions.1: Stir together eggs, oil, and vegetable stock in a small bowl. Add matzo meal, dill, and salt. Stir until evenly combined. Cover and refrigerate 15 minutes to 8 hours.
directions.2: Bring large pot of water to a boil; add a dash of salt. Using olive oiled hands, form dough into 12 1-inch balls.
directions.3: Drop the balls one at a time into the boiling water. Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a medium skillet, heat oil. cook onions, garlic and zucchini in oil for 5 minutes on medium heat.
directions.3: Add remaining ingredients and simmer covered for 45 minutes. Serve over pasta.

Vegetarian Stuffed Peppers.notes: Add any type of beans to add protein to this recipe.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 425°F. Lightly oil a large shallow baking pan.
directions.3: Cut peppers in half lengthwise and remove seeds. Arrange peppers cut sides up in baking pan and lightly oil cut edges of stems.
directions.4: Halve cherry tomatoes and chop onion and basil. Finely chop garlic.
directions.5: In a bowl toss tomatoes, onion, basil, garlic, olive oil. salt and pepper to taste
directions.6: Spoon equal portions of mixture into peppers and roast in upper third of oven until peppers are tender, about 20 minutes.

ingredients: 2 green or red bell pepper (seeded and chopped)
1 can black beans, low-sodium (15 ounce, drained and rinsed)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a nonstick pan, sauté bell peppers and onion for 5 minutes over medium heat. Add beans, stir well. Reduce heat to low and simmer about 5 minutes.
directions.3: In a small bowl, combine mangos, lime juice, cilantro, and avocado. Reserve 1/2 mixture for topping.
directions.4: Fill warmed tortillas with 1/4 bean mixture and 1/4 mango mixture.
directions.5: Fold ends of the tortillas over. Roll up to make wraps. Top veggie bean wraps with remaining mango mixture.

ingredients: 1 can (about 15 ounces) low-sodium whole kernel corn, finely chopped
1 teaspoon cayenne or jalapeño chilies, seeds removed and finely chopped, (optional)

directions.1: In a large bowl, combine corn and cornmeal.
directions.2: Add onions, green pepper, rice, chili powder, and pepper. If using cayenne and jalapeño chilies, add them too. Mix well.
directions.3: Form the burger mixture into 6 equal patties about 1/2 inch thick, and refrigerate for 1 hour.
directions.4: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
directions.5: Spray both sides of the patties with nonstick cooking spray.
directions.6: In a large pan, brown both sides of the patties over medium to high heat for 5 to 8 minutes.
directions.7: Bake the patties in the oven for 10 minutes.
directions.8: Toast the flour tortillas in the oven for 8 minutes.
directions.9: Place patty on half of tortilla and fold tortilla over to serve like a taco.

ingredients: 6 ounces spaghetti noodles (or thin flat egg noodles)
1 cup bell pepper (green or red, finely chopped)
Veggie Chow Mein.notes:
Learn more about

Onions
Carrots
Celery
Broccoli
Bell Pepper
Garlic

Add other vegetables as desired. Top with chives.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Prepare noodles according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
directions.3: Cook onion and garlic with oil in frying pan for 1 minute over medium/high heat.
directions.4: Add carrot, chicken bouillon, and pepper sauce. Stir.
directions.5: Add broccoli, celery, and bell pepper and continue to stir.
directions.6: Reduce heat to low and add noodles and soy sauce. Mix well over low heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
directions.7: Add salt and pepper to taste.

Veggie Dip.notes:
Serve with slices of row vegetables such as carrots, celery, cucumbers, zucchini, broccoli, turnips, cauliflower, or green pepper.
Try adding 1/4 teaspoon of black pepper and 1/2 teaspoon dried dill week for extra flavor. Source: Colorado State University. Eating Smart Being Active Recipes.

directions.1: Lávese las manos con agua y jabón.
directions.2: Measure cottage cheese and put in bowl or blender.
directions.3: Beat with a fork or mixer, or in a blender, until cottage cheese is smooth.
directions.4: Add the other ingredients. Stir together.
directions.5: Store the dip in the fridge for 1 to 2 hours to let the flavors blend.

Veggie Noodles.notes: Fresh or frozen vegetables can be used. Just cook them before tossing with pasta.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Boil water in a cooking pot. Add the pasta. Turn down the heat to medium-low; cook according to box directions. Pour pasta and water into colander to drain.
directions.3: Add vegetables and spaghetti sauce to cooking pot. Cook over medium-low heat just until the vegetables are hot.
directions.4: Return cooked, drained pasta back to cooking pot and mix together.
directions.5: Sprinkle with cheese just before serving.

ingredients: 1/4 cup finely chopped mushrooms (or your favorite vegetables)
2 tablespoons shredded cheddar cheese (or your favorite cheese)
Veggie Omelet in a Mug.notes:
To make a meal, serve with a slice of whole grain toast and fruit.
Learn more about vegetables and what's in season now.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Lightly grease the inside of a 12-ounce microwave-safe mug.
directions.3: Use a fork to combine the eggs, milk, salt and pepper in the mug and stir well.  Mix in the vegetables and cheese.
directions.4: Microwave on HIGH for 45 seconds. Stir. Return to the microwave and cook on HIGH until the mixture has puffed and set, 60 to 90 seconds. The omelet may look wet on the top but it will dry as it cools.
directions.5: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours.

ingredients: 1 pita, whole wheat (cut around the sides, into flats)
Veggie Pizza Pita Pockets.notes:
1 Tablespoon each of broccoli and red onion used for costing and nutrition analysis.
Tips:

Layering the cheese over the raw veggies will help them cook; the melting cheese essentially steams the veggies in the microwave. If you prefer softer veggies, they can be steamed before being put on the pizza.
A tomato sauce with added flavors will be a nice kick to this pizza; also, mild salsa will add a different flavor.
Many sliced cheeses come in low-fat varieties and could be substituted for mozzarella. Or you could mix and match.
Veggie pizza is a great way to get your daily servings of veggies. A mix of veggies - such as greens (spinach, broccoli), seeded (zucchini, peppers, tomatoes), and roots/fungi (onion, garlic, mushroom) - will complement each other if used in variety.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place one pita round, on plate.
directions.3: Spread 2 Tablespoons of tomato sauce on pizza.
directions.4: Sprinkle various chopped vegetable over sauce.
directions.5: Layer two slices of cheese on top of sauce.
directions.6: Cover with the other half of pita round.
directions.7: Microwave 35-45 seconds, or until cheese melts.
directions.8: Slice in half, let cool, and enjoy!

ingredients: 1 green bell pepper (washed, seeded and chopped)
Veggie Quesadillas.notes:
Other Ideas

Try a variety of vegetables: eggplant, tomatoes, mushrooms, green beans, cauliflower, garlic, corn or spinach.
Season with fresh herbs - parsley, basil, cilantro, oregano, or dill.
Sprinkle dry herbs - Italian seasoning, chili powder, cumin, or your favorite.
Top with your favorite spicy salsa.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Spray pan with cooking oil spray.
directions.3: Cook vegetables on medium heat for 4-5 minutes, stirring frequently. Remove from pan.
directions.4: Spray pan with cooking spray. Place tortilla in the pan. Sprinkle with half the vegetables and half of the cheese.
directions.5: Place the other tortilla on top. Cook on medium heat for 4-6 minutes or until the cheese starts to melt and the bottom tortilla starts to brown.
directions.6: Flip quesadilla. Cook for 4 minutes or until tortilla browns.
directions.7: Repeat steps 3-5.
directions.8: Cut each quesadilla in half. Serve with salsa.

ingredients: 1 3/4 cups corn (low-sodium can, frozen, or cut from cob)

directions.4: Add diced tomatoes and continue cooking for 3 minutes.

Zucchini

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash vegetables.
directions.3: Remove the broccoli flowers from stems, cut the flowers into small florets and put into mixing bowl.
directions.4: Peel carrots and cut off the ends. Grate carrots and put into mixing bowl.
directions.5: Slice the zucchini into thin slices. Cut each slice into quarters and put into bowl.
directions.6: Grate the cheese and put into a separate bowl.
directions.7: Measure oregano, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder and mix together.
directions.8: Heat oil in a skillet. Put the spices in the heated oil and then add the mixture of vegetables to the pan. Stir vegetables with a wooden spoon and saute about 5 minutes. When the vegetables are slightly tender, remove from heat.
directions.9: Spoon vegetable mixture into the pita. Top the hot vegetables with 1 ounce grated cheese.

ingredients: 1/2 cup dried fruit (try raisins, apricots, dates)
1/2 cup apple, chopped (about 1/3 of a medium apple)
Very Berry Muesli.notes:
Muesli makes a delicious breakfast. Try drizzling with milk.
Substitute any frozen, canned and drained, or fresh chopped fruit for apples and blueberries.
Flavor boosters: cinnamon, grated orange peel.
Learn more about blueberries and apples.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In medium bowl, mix oats, yogurt and milk.
directions.3: Cover and refrigerate for 6 to 12 hours.
directions.4: Add dried and fresh fruit, and mix gently.
directions.5: Serve scoops of muesli in small dishes. Sprinkle each serving with chopped nuts.

Very Berry Smoothie.notes: Get an additional food group in your smoothie by adding 1 cup of spinach or kale.

directions.1: Peel and slice the banana.
directions.2: Gather all ingredients and combine in a blender.
directions.3: Cover and blend until smooth.
directions.4: Serve right away or pour into ice cube trays and freeze. During the week, pop out the cubes for a quick on-the-go breakfast.

ingredients: 1/2 pound ahi (yellowfin) tuna steak (fresh or frozen)
1 large head lettuce (Boston, Romaine or Bibb) (washed, dried, and torn into bite-sized pieces)
1/4 cup lemon juice, fresh or bottled
Vidalia Onion and Tomato Salad with Gril.notes: Serving Suggestions: Serve with an 8 oz. glass of non-fat milk and a slice of whole-grain bread.

directions.1: Heat grill.
directions.2: Whisk together dressing ingredients in a small bowl.
directions.3: Cut tuna into 1" chunks and skewer and place on two-three 3" skewers; brush lightly with olive oil. Season lightly with salt and pepper.
directions.4: Grill skewered tuna until fish is opaque and flakes with a fork (145 °F); remove from grill.
directions.5: In a large bowl, toss dressing with all vegetable ingredients. To serve, divide salad on four individual plates; top with tuna.

ingredients: 6 tablespoons vegetable oil (olive, canola, avacado, etc.)
4 tablespoons vinegar (cider, balsamic, or red wine vinegars)
1/4 teaspoon mustard (yellow, dijon, or brown mustards)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix all ingredients together.
directions.3: Serve.

Waldorf Salad.notes:
Serve this dish with a whole wheat roll for a hearty meal.
