Apples
Celery
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
directions.3: Place chopped walnuts on a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes. Stir occasionally until they are evenly toasted.
directions.4: Combine apples, celery, nuts, and raisins.
directions.5: Stir together yogurt, sugar, and lemon juice. Pour over apple mixture and toss lightly.
directions.6: Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours.

ingredients: 1 pound walleye, thawed, cut into chunks (2- 8 ounce fillets)
2 tablespoons fresh parsley or green onions, chopped
Walleye Chowder.notes:
If you want to cut back on sodium, swap the bacon for turkey bacon or ham, or prepare without it.
Optional: Add a cup of traditional hominy or scorched corn
This recipe contains one or more ingredients considered to be traditional or indigenous to Native American communities in certain regions across North America.

directions.1: Heat butter in a large pot over medium-high heat. Add celery and onions and sauté until softened.
directions.2: Stir in flour to form a roux (a mixture of fat and flour used to thicken sauces or soups). Slowly whisk in the milk.
directions.3: Add the potatoes and bacon and stir gently. Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes or until potatoes are cooked through.
directions.4: Add fish chunks and cook for an additional 6-8 minutes or until fish reaches the appropriate internal temperature.
directions.5: Season to taste with salt and pepper. Garnish with parsley or green onions and serve.

Watermelon Gazpacho.notes: Serving Suggestions: Serve with an 8 oz. glass of non-fat milk and whole-grain pita bread/chips with hummus.

directions.1: In a small bowl, mix 1 cup of cubed watermelon and 1/2 of chopped cucumber; set aside.
directions.2: Process remaining ingredients in a food processor or blender until puréed.
directions.3: Transfer all ingredients to a large bowl and stir.
directions.4: Refrigerate until ready to serve.

ingredients: 4 teaspoons chili powder, or to taste
2 cups beef broth, 99% fat free, reduced sodium

directions.1: Cook wheat berries in 3 cups of water for 1 hour until tender; add more water if necessary, drain.
directions.2: Rinse with cool water and drain thoroughly.
directions.3: In the microwave on medium heat, cook onion, green and yellow pepper for 1 minute, or until desired softness.
directions.4: In a 4-quart pot, combine remaining ingredients with wheat berries and microwaved vegetables.
directions.5: On stovetop, bring to a boil and simmer uncovered 1 hour or until desired consistency is reached, stirring occasionally.

ingredients: 1 whole-wheat French baguette, cut into 12 thin slices along the bias
1 cup canned navy beans, rinsed and drained

directions.1: Slice the baguette on the diagonal into thin slices (about 12 slices for a baguette).
directions.2: In a large sauté pan, heat 2 T of the olive oil over medium heat.
directions.3: Place the bread slices in the pan and cook on medium high heat until sizzling and golden. Before flipping the bread, add an additional tablespoon of olive oil to the pan and cook the second side until golden.
directions.4: For the topping, cook the onions and the remaining tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat until the onions are soft, about 7 minutes.
directions.5: Add the garlic, basil and oregano and cook another minute or two, until fragrant.
directions.6: Add beans and continue cooking for another five minutes on low heat. Add the tomatoes and turn off the heat, allowing tomatoes to warm without cooking.
directions.7: Drizzle the balsamic vinegar into the pan and gently stir.
directions.8: Scoop heaping spoonfuls of the tomato-bean mixture onto the grilled bread and enjoy.

ingredients: 1 can green chilies, drained, diced (4 oz)
2 cans Great Northern Beans, canned (15.5 ounce can, low sodium)
1 can chicken broth, low-sodium (14.5 oz can)
White Chicken Chili.notes: To reduce sodium content of soups, drain and rinse canned beans, use low-sodium broth, and add your own spices instead of using a seasoning packet.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a large saucepan, heat oil. Add onion and cook until tender.
directions.3: Add green chilies, beans (do not drain), chicken broth, garlic powder, pepper, ground cumin, and chicken. Bring to a boil.
directions.4: Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes or until desired thickness.
directions.5: Serve hot, topped with cheese.
directions.6: Add parsley if desired.

ingredients: 1 chopped green chili (can adjust to taste)
6 corn tortillas (toasted and cut into 1 inch squares)
White Chili.notes:
*See our recipe to learn how to cook beans.
Learn more about:

Bell pepper
Onions
Garlic

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Sauté peppers and onion in olive oil.
directions.3: Add green chili, garlic, spices and chicken broth. Simmer for 20 minutes.
directions.4: Add milk, cooked beans, and cooked chicken. Allow to thicken before adding cilantro. Heat through.
directions.5: Top chili with crisp tortillas before serving.

ingredients: 1 cup milk, non-fat (or 1/3 cup powdered milk and water to equal 1 cup)
White Sauce - Thin.notes: Use for cream soups and stews.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a small pot, melt butter over low heat.
directions.3: Add flour, salt, and pepper to mixture.
directions.4: Add milk gradually.
directions.5: Heat to boiling, stir constantly until mixture is smooth and bubbly. (The consistency should be like thin cream.)
directions.6: Remove from heat.

Whole Grain Strawberry Pancakes.notes: The "Grain Chain," a group of MyPlate National Strategic Partners committed to promoting and supporting grains, offers a series of recipes featuring whole grains. Members include American Bakers Association, Wheat Food Council, Grains Food Foundation, National Pasta Association, USA Rice Federation, General Mills, and Kellogg's.

ingredients: 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning (or as needed, to sprinkle on)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Spread each slice of bread with one teaspoon oil.
directions.3: Sprinkle with garlic powder and Italian seasoning.
directions.4: Cut each slice into 3 equal parts.
directions.5: Bake at 300 degrees for about 25 minutes or until crisp and lightly browned.

ingredients: 1/4 cup margarine or butter (melted, or 1/4 cup vegetable oil)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Lightly oil or coat with non-stick spray the cups of a 12 cup muffin pan, or use paper muffin cups.
directions.3: Mix together white sugar and cinnamon for topping and set aside.
directions.4: In a large bowl, stir together flour, salt, baking powder and brown sugar. In a glass liquid measuring cup, measure milk, then add eggs, vanilla (if using), and melted shortening or oil. Mix with a fork until egg is well combined with other ingredients.
directions.5: Pour milk mixture over flour mixture and stir with a spoon, about 20 strokes, until flour is just moistened. Batter will be lumpy and thick.
directions.6: Fill prepared muffin cups about 2/3 full with batter. Sprinkle about 1/4 teaspoon of cinnamon/sugar topping over each muffin.
directions.7: Bake in oven for 20 to 25 minutes until golden brown. Serve warm. Leftovers may be frozen.

Wild Rice Muffins.notes:
This recipe contains one or more ingredients considered to be traditional or indigenous to Native American communities in certain regions across North America.
Learn more about:

Bananas

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat the oven to 400 °F. Spray a 12-cup muffin pan with cooking spray.
directions.3: In a medium bowl, mix bakery mix, sugar, and cinnamon.
directions.4: In a separate bowl, mix bananas, milk, and applesauce.
directions.5: Add banana mixture to dry mixture and stir.
directions.6: Fold in wild rice and nuts.
directions.7: Spoon 1/4 cup of the batter into each muffin cup. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.

Winter Crisp.notes:
Learn more about:

Lemons
Apples
Cranberries

ingredients: 1 package vanilla instant pudding (3.5 ounce package)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: In a medium bowl, dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Cool at least 30 minutes.
directions.3: Pour milk into large mixing bowl and add pudding mix. Using an electric mixer, beat 1 minute.
directions.4: Gradually add and beat in gelatin mixture. Pour into a 9x13 inch baking pan. Chill in fridge for several hours.
directions.5: Cut fun shapes with cookie cutters or knife. Store in refrigerator.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Prick potatoes with fork. Bake at 425°F for 60 minutes or until fork is easily inserted.
directions.3: Cut potatoes in half lengthwise. Carefully scoop out potato, leaving about 1/2 inch of pulp inside shell. Mash pulp in large bowl.
directions.4: Mix in by hand remaining ingredients except Parmesan cheese. Spoon mixture into potato shells.
directions.5: Sprinkle top with 1/4 teaspoon of Parmesan cheese.
directions.6: Place on baking sheet and return to oven. Bake 15-20 minutes or until tops are golden brown.

ingredients: 12 ounces frozen jumbo shrimp (peeled and deveined, no-sodium-added)
1 medium fresh zucchini (cut in small chunks)
Yellow Potato and Red Pepper Shrimp Saut.notes: Serving Suggestions: Serve with an 8 oz. glass of fat-free (skim) milk, one slice whole-grain bread, and 1/2 peach, sliced.

ingredients: 2 cups yogurt, low fat (or fat-free, any flavor*)
other optional fruit (raspberries, peaches, pineapple and/or mangos)
Yogurt Berry Parfait.notes:
*Low-fat vanilla yogurt used for costing and nutrient analysis.
Note: Optional ingredients are not included in the nutrient or cost analysis.
Learn more about:

Bananas
Blueberries
Strawberries

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Line up 4 parfait or other tall glasses.
directions.3: Spoon 1/2 cup of yogurt into each glass.
directions.4: Sprinkle with granola.
directions.5: Top with about 1/4 cup of fruit.

Yogurt Pops.notes:
Here are some good flavor mixes for yogurt pops:
- Lemon yogurt with orange juice
- Vanilla yogurt with raspberry juice

You can buy popsicle sticks in a crafts store, or in the crafts department of a discount store.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put the yogurt and juice in a bowl.
directions.3: Stir together well.
directions.4: Pour the mix into paper cups.
directions.5: Stick a popsicle stick in the center of the mix in the cup.
directions.6: Place the yogurt pops in the freezer until they turn solid.

ingredients: 6 us fluid ounces frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Pour yogurt into melted juice concentrated and stir until smooth.
directions.3: Place cups together on a baking sheet.
directions.4: Pour yogurt/juice mixture into paper cups.
directions.5: Cover the cups with a sheet of aluminum foil.
directions.6: Insert stick for each popsicle by making a slit in foil over the center of each cup.
directions.7: Freeze popsicles until firm.
directions.8: Run warm water on the outside of each cup to loosen each popsicle from the cup.

ingredients: 2/3 tablespoon frozen fruit juice concentrated (2 teaspoons, thawed)
Yogurt Smoothie in a Bag.notes:
Orange juice concentrate used for costing and nutrition analysis.

Oranges

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place ingredients in a heavy duty snack-sized plastic bag.
directions.3: Squish the bag until all ingredients are mixed, then stick a straw in a bag to drink the smoothie.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix sugar, yeast, water, and flours together.
directions.3: Rub inside of bowl with oil. Place dough in bowl and flip to coat with oil. Let rise 30 minutes.
directions.4: Punch down dough and divide into 16 portions. Shape into a ball and poke a hole through the middle with your fingers.
directions.5: Place on a well-greased baking sheet and cover with a towel to rise again for 15-20 minutes. Put 2 inches of water in a pot and heat to boiling.
directions.6: Using a slotted spoon, gently place each bagel into a rapidly boiling water for 1 minute on each side. Remove and dry on a towel. Place back on baking sheet. If desired, sprinkle bagels with cinnamon/sugar or salt.
directions.7: Bake at 475°F for 8-12 minutes.

ingredients: 1/3 cup beans, low-sodium canned or cooked (pinto work great)
Yummy Bean Dip.notes:
Enjoy dip with your favorite veggies, corn chips, pita bread wedges, or whole-wheat crackers.
Canned pinto beans used for costing and nutrition analysis.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Place beans in a small, resealable plastic bag. Sqeeze out extra air and seal. Mash beans with fingers.
directions.3: Add yogurt and salsa. Seal bag and mix with fingers.
directions.4: Open bag or cut off corner of bag and squeeze out dip.

ingredients: 4 cups shredded cabbage (16 ounce bag of coleslaw mix)
Zesty Citrus Coleslaw.notes:
Learn more about:

Cabbage
Citrus Fruits

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Mix together the coleslaw mix, peanuts (if using), and mandarin oranges in a large bowl.
directions.3: Stir in the Italian salad dressing and soy sauce.

Zesty Herb Salad Dressing.notes:
Try this dressing on cut vegetables or salad. After serving, keep any leftover dressing in the fridge.
Learn more about:
- Tomatoes
- Oranges

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Put all the ingredients in a jar or bottle with a lid.
directions.3: Put on the lid. Shake well.
directions.4: Chill in the fridge for at least 1 hour before serving.

ingredients: 1/2 pound fish fillets (whitefish, cod or halibut)
Zesty Lemon Fish.notes:
Halibut used for costing and nutrition analysis.
Learn more about:

Onions
Lemons

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Separate fish into two serving size pieces. Place on an ungreased baking sheet.
directions.3: Top with onion slices.
directions.4: Drizzle lemon juice and oil evenly over fish.
directions.5: Sprinkle lemon pepper, parsley, and dust with paprika (optional).
directions.6: Cover and let stand for 5 minutes. Bake at 350°F for 20 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with fork.

ingredients: 1 tablespoon butter alternative spread (0 g trans fat)
parsley, fresh (1 Tablespoon, for appearance, optional)

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Bring about 2 cups of water to a gentle boil in saucepan.
directions.3: Add carrots and cinnamon. Cook for about 10 minutes, until just tender.
directions.4: While carrots are cooking, wash an orange and cut in half.
directions.5: Squeeze juice out of the orange (remove seeds).
directions.6: Use a sharp paring knife to carefully remove the orange 'zest' from the peel. Try not to get any of the white part as it will taste bitter. Cut the zest into small slices.
directions.7: When carrots are done, drain well.
directions.8: Add the honey, margarine and orange zest and toss into mix. Serve while hot.

ingredients: 2 cups whole grain rotini pasta, uncooked¹

Zesty Skillet Zucchini.notes:
Serve this dish over rice or noodles, or eat it “as is.”
Learn more about:
- Tomatoes
- Onions
- Mushrooms
- Zucchini

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Peel the onion. Chop it into small pieces.
directions.3: Chop the tomato.
directions.4: Drain the water from the can of mushrooms.
directions.5: Cut each zucchini into thin slices.
directions.6: Put the tomato juice and pepper in a skillet or pan. Cook on high heat for 3 minutes.
directions.7: Add the onion, tomato, and mushrooms.
directions.8: Reduce the heat to medium-high. Cover and cook for 5 minutes.
directions.9: Add the zucchini. Cover and cook for another 5 to 7 minutes.

ingredients: 20 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breast (cut into 3/4-inch pieces)
Zingy Lemon Chicken Pasta.notes: Serving Suggestions: Serve with steamed broccoli, skim milk, apple slices.

directions.1: Combine flour, salt, pepper and cayenne in a saucepan; gradually add chicken broth and skim milk, stirring with a wire whisk until smooth.
directions.2: Place over medium heat and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened. Add mustard and lemon juice. Allow to cool.
directions.3: Heat margarine and oil in a skillet. Add chicken pieces, green onions and garlic. Sauté until chicken is just firm and cooked through, about 10 minutes.
directions.4: Prepare pasta according to package directions and drain. Combine sauce, chicken and pasta mixture.
directions.5: Put into a 2 ½-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle top with almonds, chopped chives and paprika (if using).
directions.6: Bake at 375° for 10 minutes or until heated through.

ingredients: 2 tomatoes (peeled and diced, or a 16 ounce can of diced tomatoes, drained)
Zucchini And Tomatoes.notes:
Learn more about:
- Onions
- Garlic
- Zucchini
-Tomatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
directions.3: Add onion and garlic.
directions.4: Cook until tender, about 5 to 7 minutes.
directions.5: Add zucchini, tomatoes and seasonings.
directions.6: Cover pan, reduce heat, cook until vegetables are tender, about 20 minutes.

Zucchini Au Gratin.notes:
Can be served over rice or noodles. Green pepper can be used instead of onion. Summer squash can be used instead of zucchini.
Learn more about:
- Zucchini
- Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and slice vegetables. Place zucchini, onion, water, margarine, and pepper in a frying pan. Cover and cook over medium heat for one minute.
directions.3: Remove cover and cook until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.
directions.4: Turn with large spoon to cook evenly.
directions.5: Sprinkle with cheese; toss lightly.
directions.6: Serve at once.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Preheat oven to 325 degrees and lightly grease and flour a 9 x 5 loaf pan.
directions.3: In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs lightly. Add sugar, oil, zucchini, and vanilla and beat.
directions.4: In a separate bowl, measure dry ingredients and stir to combine. Add raisins.
directions.5: Add dry ingredients to the egg mixture. Stir just until all ingredients are moistened.
directions.6: Spoon into loaf pan.
directions.7: Bake at 325 degrees for 50 minutes. Test for doneness by inserting a toothpick in the center. It should come out dry.
directions.8: Allow loaf to cool 5 to 10 minutes before turning out onto a cooling rack.
directions.9: Serve warm or allow to cool before slicing.

ingredients: 1 can tomatoes, low-sodium (Italian stewed, cut up)
Zucchini Casserole.notes:
Instead of using the Italian stewed tomatoes, you could use fresh diced tomatoes with some Italian spices added.
Learn more about:
- Onions
- Tomatoes
- Zucchini
- Winter squash
- Potatoes

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Brown sausage and onion together in a skillet; drain. Mix all ingredients together and place in a casserole dish.
directions.3: Cover with foil and bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.

Zucchini Coleslaw.notes:
Learn more about:
- Zucchini
- Cabbage
- Carrots
- Onions

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Drain zucchini by pressing between layers of paper towels.
directions.3: Put zucchini in large bowl; add cabbage, carrot, onions and radishes.
directions.4: In a small bowl, combine remaining ingredients.
directions.5: Pour over vegetables and toss well.
directions.6: Cover and chill at least one hour.

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Grate zucchini and mix with the other ingredients, except the oil. Blend well.
directions.3: Form the mixture into patties 3-4 inches in diameter.
directions.4: Heat the oil. Cook pancakes for 3-4 minutes per side. Remove and drain on paper towels.

ingredients: 1 tablespoon garlic and herb seasoning mix
1/4 cup cheese, low-fat shredded (use your favorite)
Zucchini Recipe.notes:
Learn more about:

Zucchini
Onions
Green Peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Wash and slice zucchini and measure out about 2 cups.
directions.3: Dice up the onion and green pepper, and set aside along with the zucchini.
directions.4: Stir the egg and milk together and set aside.
directions.5: Sauté the vegetables in 2 Tablespoons oil until tender on medium heat. Remove from the pan.
directions.6: Scramble the egg mixture until cooked thoroughly. Stir in the vegetable mixture and fold together.
directions.7: Cook together until temperature reaches 145 °F.
directions.8: Sprinkle the seasoning and cheese on top. When the cheese is melted, serve warm.

Zucchini Stir Fry.notes:
Learn more about:
- Zucchini
- Yellow squash
- Onions
- Red peppers

directions.1: Wash hands with soap and water.
directions.2: Peel the onion. Cut it into thin slices.
directions.3: Slice the yellow squash into thin round pieces.
directions.4: Slice the zucchini into thin round pieces.
directions.5: Chop the red pepper into small pieces.
directions.6: Heat the oil in a frying pan or stir-fry pan. Add the onion slices.
directions.7: Cook over medium heat, stirring quickly for 1 minute.
directions.8: Add the spices and stir a few times.
directions.9: Add remaining vegetables and cook for 3 to 5 minutes until vegetables are just tender.
